column3:
Alabama Pain Physicians serves Birmingham, Alabama with comprehensive pain management solutions for patients seeking relief from chronic and acute conditions. Our dedicated team combines advanced diagnostic techniques with personalized treatment plans to help patients regain function and improve quality of life. With convenient locations in both Birmingham and Bessemer, we make pain relief accessible to residents throughout the region.

At Alabama Pain Physicians, we offer a wide range of interventional pain management treatments tailored to each patient's unique needs. Our physicians utilize cutting-edge technology and evidence-based procedures to establish accurate diagnoses and effective treatment plans. We specialize in:

- Spinal cord stimulation

- Joint injections

- Epidural steroid injections

- Radiofrequency ablation

- Nerve blocks

- Medication management

- Physical therapy coordination

Comprehensive Approach to Pain Relief

Our goal is to minimize pain while maximizing function through a multidisciplinary approach. We treat various conditions including back pain, neck pain, sciatica, arthritis, neuropathy, and complex regional pain syndrome. Each treatment plan is customized based on thorough evaluation and patient history.

Experienced Pain Management Specialists

Our board-certified physicians bring extensive training and experience in pain medicine. They completed advanced fellowships at prestigious institutions and stay current with the latest developments in interventional pain techniques. This expertise allows them to address even the most challenging pain conditions with confidence.

Patient-Centered Care

We prioritize patient education and involvement in the treatment process. During consultations, our doctors take time to explain pain sources and treatment options in clear, understandable terms. This collaborative approach leads to better outcomes and higher patient satisfaction.

Visit our Birmingham location at 2868 Acton Rd, Birmingham, AL 35243, or call us at +1 205-332-3160 to schedule your consultation. For more information about our services, visit our website at https://bamapain.com/.
column11: Alabama Pain Physicians is proud to be Birmingham's choice for pain management. Our goal is to provide comprehensive, compassionate care for patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. We utilize cutting edge technology and advanced procedures to establish an accurate diagnosis and treatment plan to ultimately minimize pain and increase function. With locations in both the Birmingham and Bessemer areas, it has never been easier to seek help for pain relief.

Nesbitt Pain Associates PC in Birmingham, Alabama serves patients seeking relief from chronic and acute pain conditions throughout the region. Our dedicated team provides comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each individual's needs. Located conveniently at 2700 10th Ave S, Building 2, Suite 444, we combine advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to help patients regain control of their lives.

At Nesbitt Pain Associates, we offer a wide range of interventional pain procedures and treatment options. Our approach integrates medication management, minimally invasive procedures, and rehabilitation techniques to address various pain conditions. We specialize in treating back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndrome. Our physicians are skilled in performing epidural steroid injections, facet joint injections, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation.

Expert Medical Team

Our clinic is led by board-certified pain management specialists with extensive training in anesthesiology and pain medicine. Our physicians completed their education at prestigious medical institutions and bring years of clinical experience to each patient interaction. We stay current with the latest advancements in pain management through ongoing professional development and research participation.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in creating individualized treatment plans that address the root causes of pain. During your first visit, our team conducts thorough evaluations to understand your pain history. We take time to explain your condition and treatment options in clear, understandable terms. Our goal is to improve your quality of life while minimizing medication dependence when possible.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with our pain management specialists, please call us at +1 205-723-0088. You can also visit our website at https://www.nesbittpain.com/ for more information about our services and to access patient resources. Our Birmingham office welcomes new patients and accepts most major insurance plans.

Dr. Barlow is the best. He truly cares for his patients. He will take all the time you need. He listens and uses those anointed hands to perform the exact procedure that is needed for your problem. He hasn't missed it yet for me. The ladies in the procedure room are perfect. The prep nurses are phenomenal.|I have been a patient of Nesbitt pain for many years, and I must say that I have never had  a complaint.  The staff is very professional and very kind and personable!  I am not sure what I would do without Dr Nesbitt and his staff!  His nurse Wendy is awesome as well and always returning calls and looking after your best interest.  She has a caring heart and is the true example of a nurse and what a nurse should be!|I have never had a better experience with any doctor like I have with Dr. Nesbitt. He never gives up on you and he is so encouraging and gives a new out look a on finding whats going on. From his office staff and his P.A. Carly and so amazing Mrs. Wendy. If you want some one who cares about helping you and the pain you are going through, Dr. Nesbitt is the one to doctor you need in your life. Amazing bedside manners and excellent when telling what procedure he is gonna do. Always takes time for any questions or concerns you might have. Thank You Dr.Nesbitt for all you have done for me and my pain. Your simply amazing!!!!!|I'm recently joining the team of Nesbitt. The doctor I have is so detailed. Explained everything to me about my pain. Took time with me and seemed very concerned about my problem. I feel appreciated for choosing them. The office staff was very professional and pleasant. It's strictly business over here. It's not grumpy employees where everyone seemed overworked and under payed, which maybe a possibility but the employees seemed to know how to stay focus on their job and stay prosistent. So far so good.|I was sent to Dr Barlow for scalene block.  Let me just say best staff.  All the staff members were compassionate and caring.  Dr Barlow took time with me prior to my procedure to go over it with me in detail.  He had already reviewed my referral in depth and the back ground history.  I was very impressed.  It is so hard these days to find caring compassionate Dr that listen, and actually want help patients get back to the best quality of life. He understood my goals and he made sure I understood purpose of the block.  He was very encouraging as well.  If I ever have to go back to see him or have the opportunity to recommend, I would do so in a heart beat.  I was not a number nor "just another patient",  I was someone he wanted to help.  That's what matters and you just don't see that today. So thank you Dr Barlow and your team!  Keep doing what you all do!  Keep making a difference, and not just physically!|I have been a patient since 2010. Everyone is professional, kind and sincere. Dr. Barlow is excellent! He listens and really sees me as a person, not just a patient. He always asks about my family and that means a lot. Allison see's me in between my visits with Dr. Barlow. She's always professional, empathetic and she also listens. Listening to a patient is crucial in Dr. Patient relationships. We then together decide which path to take. A couple of years back I had a heart attack right when I got to the office. I couldn't ask to be in better hands than all the staff that helped me, talked to me, encouraged me. Anyone that needs pain management, I highly recommend Nesbitt Pain Associates. I from personal experience can honestly say you will be very happy with your decision. God bless everyone!|All of the nurses were very professional, but also friendly. Dr. Barlow's bedside manner is great, but more importantly his technique is spot on and relieves my pain. Highly Recommended.|These guys and gals took great care Of me!! I was very nervous but they helped to make me feel Comfortable and relaxed.
They explained everything to me before they did the actual procedure, and They explained to me the aftercare and the why. They said be lazy as possible For the next three 3/4 days, no lifting and told me the why. I would absolutely use this team of doctors And nurses again, no doubt. 
The atmosphere was that of a Close nit family.
Thank you all for taking such good care of me
On my way to physical recovery. We have a ways to go, but I am so very grateful for you all.

column2: Tennessee Valley Pain Consultants - Huntsville Hospital Pain Center
column3:
Tennessee Valley Pain Consultants serves Huntsville, Alabama and surrounding communities as a premier pain management center. Located within the Huntsville Hospital Pain Center, our team of specialists brings decades of combined experience to patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. We understand that pain affects every aspect of your life, which is why we offer comprehensive treatment plans tailored to each individual's needs.

Our physician team provides state-of-the-art diagnostic procedures to accurately identify the source of your pain. We utilize advanced imaging techniques and diagnostic tools to ensure precise treatment planning. Our therapeutic approaches include:

- Interventional pain procedures including epidural injections and nerve blocks

- Medication management with careful monitoring and personalized dosing

- Physical rehabilitation programs designed to restore function

- Psychological counseling to address the emotional aspects of chronic pain

- Coping strategies that empower patients in their daily lives

Expert Physician Team

The specialists at Tennessee Valley Pain Consultants rank among the most experienced pain management physicians in the region. Our doctors have completed extensive training at prestigious medical institutions, with many holding board certifications in pain medicine, anesthesiology, and related specialties. This expertise allows us to offer advanced treatments for complex pain conditions that might not respond to conventional approaches.

Conditions We Treat

We specialize in treating a wide range of pain conditions including:

- Back and neck pain

- Joint pain and arthritis

- Neuropathic pain

- Cancer-related pain

- Post-surgical pain

- Complex regional pain syndrome

- Fibromyalgia

Patient-Centered Approach

At Tennessee Valley Pain Consultants, we believe in treating the whole person, not just the pain. Our multidisciplinary approach addresses both the physical and emotional aspects of pain management. We work closely with each patient to develop customized treatment plans that improve quality of life and maximize function.

Visit us at our convenient location:

201 Governors Dr SW, Suites 300 & 400

Huntsville, AL 35801

Contact us today:

Phone: +1 256-265-7246

Website: https://tnvalleypain.com/

Living Healthy MD in Huntsville, Alabama serves the local community with comprehensive pain management solutions and integrated wellness services. Dr. John Roberts, having practiced in Huntsville for over 20 years, established this innovative clinic to offer a different approach to healthcare. While maintaining his expertise in pain management, Dr. Roberts has expanded Living Healthy MD's services to create a synergistic healthcare experience focused on improving patients' quality of life, energy, and vitality.

The clinic specializes in treating various chronic pain conditions using evidence-based approaches. Patients receive personalized treatment plans addressing their specific pain concerns. Dr. Roberts combines traditional pain management techniques with innovative therapies to provide effective relief. The clinic's approach focuses on both immediate pain relief and long-term management strategies.

Integrated Wellness Approach

What sets Living Healthy MD apart is its holistic view of health. Beyond pain management, the clinic offers complementary services that work together to enhance overall wellbeing. This integrated approach addresses the interconnected nature of physical health, creating more comprehensive treatment outcomes. Patients benefit from coordinated care under one roof.

Dr. Roberts' Experience and Expertise

With over two decades of medical practice in Huntsville, Dr. Roberts brings extensive experience to his clinic. His decision to create Living Healthy MD stemmed from recognizing the need for more comprehensive healthcare solutions. His approach combines years of clinical expertise with a forward-thinking vision for patient care. Dr. Roberts remains committed to staying current with medical advancements.

Visit Living Healthy MD

The clinic is conveniently located at 3626 Memorial Pkwy SW, Huntsville, AL 35801. Patients can schedule appointments by calling +1 256-715-7483 or visiting the clinic's website at https://livinghealthymd.com/. The facility offers a comfortable environment designed for patient comfort and care excellence.
column11: Dr. John Roberts has practiced in Huntsville for over 20 years and has decided to open a new and different type of clinic. While he will still be practicing Pain Management, he will also offer a wide array of services at Living Healthy MD. The synergy of these options will provide a excellent opportunity to enjoy the best quality of life possible with energy and vitality.

Our clinic offers a complete range of pain management treatments including:

I had my first appointment today and I was very impressed.  Dr. Bell was great. I felt I was listened to and understood without any judgment.  We talked and she came up with a plan we both agreed on. I wasn't pressured into a procedure like you are at most pain clinics.  She did mention one but she said we could talk about in the future if it was something I wanted. Everyone was was so nice and professional.  The nurse practitioner she was training was also very nice and made me feel at ease unfortunately I can't remember her name, I believe it was Mary Beth but if I'm wrong I apologize. I was in and out in a little over a hour. Now I see why all the reviews are so great for this clinic.  If your in chronic pain I recommend you give this clinic a try.|I have seen a lot of doctors and specialists of the last 20 years for facial and neck injuries and I'm almost always leaving feeling defeated and back to square one. I met Dr. P about 2 years ago and it's been life changing. I've never met a doctor so genuine, kind and caring. (All of the staff is the same way and it definitely shows that they are so happy where they work and who they work for). He is such a good listener and has never made me feel judged (which has been a problem of mine as a younger, heavily tattooed girl).
I'm so thankful for Dr. Pitkanen and all of his wonderful staff for helping me live a more comfortable life and being so warm and welcoming to me every single time.|On 12-26-24 Dr Benton Pitkanen did a epidural steroid injection on my back. I was totally satisfied with my results. The staff from the the front to the back was friendly and professional I loved my experience and I will recommend him to anyone who's dealing with pain great Dr and a great team of workers Thanks for your great service|Everyone was courteous, professional  and very efficient.   Dr. Pitkanen was very knowledgeable and took time to explain my diagnosis.   He thoroughly discussed a treatment plan with me and answered all my questions.   It was like a breath of fresh air to have someone take time to explain everything and not just talk at me .  For the first time in a long time, I felt heard.  Thanks so much.|The office staff was amazing
Shout out to Kiran, Allie, Annie, and the  staff in the OR-
Everyone made me feel comfortable - My nervousness went away
Shout out to Amanda who called me on the phone to go over the instructions for the day-
Of course Dr. Pitkaren is amazing
He spent time with me preop
He explained the procedure In detail and I appreciate it
I appreciate the free parking And the quick route to the office from the parking lot
Thanks for everything|My experience with Dr.Pitkanen and his staff was absolutely amazing! Everyone from the front desk to the nurses to Dr. Pitkanen were kind, caring and took time with me. He was not rushed and spent time explaining everything to me. The nurses were so caring. If you EVER need a pain doctor this is the very best place to go! My thanks to everyone in the Comprehensive Pain Care Center.|I have had absolutely nothing but positive experiences with this clinic.  I had to go in for a block on my birthday and the whole staff sang to me last year.   They truly care about you as a person and what you have going on and I have never been any where else that says thank you for letting me take care of you.  It's a positive experience every trip I'm there.|I walked in within 15 minutes of appointment time, scheduled childcare, nursed my newborn baby and arrived within 15 minutes of scheduled appt. I was turned away, without any care of my efforts to be here, even though i was within 15 min of appt. I left 5 young children at home to be here and was turned away, saying they can't see me because I am past appt time. I am a nurse practitioner, I understand business and appts, and this is purely poor service. I love Dr. Pitkanin but can no longer refer patients with this front desk service. No eye contact from front desk either. Poor form for sure.

Alabama Pain Physicians serves Bessemer, Alabama with comprehensive pain management solutions for residents seeking relief from chronic and acute conditions. Our dedicated team of specialists focuses on delivering personalized care that addresses the root causes of pain while improving overall function and quality of life. We combine advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatment approaches to help patients throughout the Bessemer and Birmingham areas.

At Alabama Pain Physicians, we offer a wide range of specialized treatments designed to address various pain conditions. Our approach integrates cutting-edge technology with proven medical techniques to provide effective pain relief. Services include:

- Interventional pain procedures

- Medication management

- Physical therapy coordination

- Minimally invasive treatments

- Advanced diagnostic testing

Comprehensive Care for Multiple Pain Conditions

Our clinic specializes in treating numerous pain conditions affecting Bessemer residents. We develop individualized treatment plans for patients suffering from:

- Back and neck pain

- Joint pain and arthritis

- Neuropathic pain

- Post-surgical pain

- Work-related injuries

- Sports injuries

- Chronic regional pain syndrome

Experienced Pain Management Specialists

Our physicians bring extensive training and experience to every patient interaction. With backgrounds from prestigious medical institutions, our doctors stay current with the latest advancements in pain management. This expertise allows us to offer Bessemer patients the most effective and appropriate treatments available.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in establishing strong doctor-patient relationships built on trust and communication. Every treatment plan begins with a thorough evaluation of your condition. We take time to understand how pain affects your daily activities and work collaboratively to develop solutions that align with your goals.

Visit our convenient Bessemer location at 727 Memorial Dr, Bessemer, AL 35022, or contact us at +1 205-332-3160 to schedule your consultation. With additional locations in the Birmingham area, Alabama Pain Physicians makes accessing quality pain management care simple and convenient. Learn more about our services at https://bamapain.com/.

Our goal is to provide comprehensive, compassionate care for patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. With locations in both the Birmingham and Bessemer areas, it has never been easier to seek help for pain relief.

Madison Medical Associates in Madison, Alabama provides comprehensive pain management services for patients throughout Madison County and surrounding areas. Our dedicated team of pain specialists offers personalized treatment plans designed to address chronic pain conditions and improve quality of life. Located conveniently at 3809 Sullivan St #4, we combine advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to help patients regain function and reduce suffering.

Our clinic specializes in treating various pain conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical pain. We utilize a multi-disciplinary approach that may include medication management, interventional procedures, physical therapy recommendations, and lifestyle modifications. Each treatment plan is tailored to address the specific needs and circumstances of individual patients.

Advanced Treatment Options

At Madison Medical Associates, patients have access to cutting-edge pain management techniques including:

  • Epidural steroid injections

  • Facet joint injections

  • Nerve blocks

  • Radiofrequency ablation

  • Spinal cord stimulation

  • Medication management

Experienced Medical Team

Our physicians bring extensive training and experience in pain medicine and anesthesiology. Board-certified specialists work closely with each patient to develop effective pain management strategies. Our doctors completed medical education at prestigious institutions and maintain ongoing professional development to stay current with the latest advances in pain management.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in treating the whole person, not just symptoms. Our team takes time to understand each patient's medical history, pain patterns, and treatment goals. This comprehensive approach helps create more effective long-term pain management solutions.

Contact Information

To schedule an appointment with our pain management specialists, please contact us at:

Phone: +1 256-325-1160

Address: 3809 Sullivan St #4, Madison, AL 35758, United States

Website: www.madisonmedicalassociates.com

Madison Medical Associates welcomes new patients seeking relief from chronic pain conditions. Most major insurance plans accepted. Our office is wheelchair accessible with convenient parking options.

Southern Pain Specialists serves Birmingham, AL and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our interventional pain management clinic combines over 25 years of clinical experience with state-of-the-art technology to diagnose and treat chronic pain conditions effectively. Located conveniently in the Birmingham metropolitan area, our practice features an in-office procedure suite equipped with advanced imaging capabilities for precise diagnosis and treatment.

Our physicians specialize in interventional techniques that target pain at its source. We offer a range of treatments including:

  • Nerve blocks for targeted pain relief

  • Spinal cord stimulation for chronic back and leg pain

  • Joint injections for arthritis and inflammatory conditions

  • Radiofrequency ablation for longer-lasting pain management

  • Ketamine therapy for treatment-resistant pain and depression

Advanced Diagnostic Capabilities

Our facility features comprehensive diagnostic services including:

  • DEXA scans for bone density measurement

  • Body composition analysis for metabolic health assessment

  • Diagnostic imaging for precise pain source identification

Our physicians combine decades of clinical expertise with ongoing education in the latest pain management techniques. We develop individualized treatment plans addressing each patient's unique pain conditions, medical history, and treatment goals.

Visit our office at 7500 Hugh Daniel Dr Suite 360, Birmingham, AL 35242, or call us at (205) 995-9967 to schedule your consultation. Learn more about our services at www.southernpain.com.

Cahaba Pain and Spine Care is a premier pain management clinic located in Hoover, Alabama, specializing in comprehensive treatment for chronic and acute pain conditions. The practice offers both in-office procedures and medication management services designed to address various pain disorders affecting the back, neck, joints, and nervous system.

The clinic's board-certified physicians perform pain blocks directly in their comfortable office setting, providing patients significant time and cost savings compared to hospital or ambulatory surgery center procedures. As specialists board-certified in both anesthesiology and pain medicine, the medical team can administer IV sedation during blocks when appropriate for patient comfort.

Cahaba Pain and Spine Care physicians develop individualized treatment plans that may include interventional procedures such as epidural steroid injections, facet joint injections, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation. The practice emphasizes minimally invasive techniques to manage pain while reducing reliance on opioid medications.

Patients with conditions including herniated discs, spinal stenosis, sciatica, arthritis, and complex regional pain syndrome can receive expert care in a convenient outpatient setting. The clinic's approach focuses on improving function and quality of life through targeted pain relief strategies.

Visit Cahaba Pain and Spine Care at 2010 Patton Chapel Rd, Suite 200, Hoover, AL 35216. For appointments or consultations, call (205) 208-9001 or learn more at www.cahabapain.com.
column11: Pain management experts offering in-office procedures and medication management. Our physicians are board certified in anesthesiology and pain medicine, so we can perform your block with IV sedation if desired.

Restoration Health in Spanish Fort, AL provides comprehensive pain management services with a patient-centered approach. Located at 30762 AL-181, our clinic specializes in treating chronic pain conditions through personalized treatment plans. We understand that effective pain management requires addressing both symptoms and underlying causes.

Our medical team combines extensive clinical experience with advanced diagnostic techniques to deliver targeted pain relief solutions. Patients benefit from our multidisciplinary approach that may include interventional procedures, medication management, and rehabilitative therapies. We treat various pain conditions including back pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical discomfort.

At Restoration Health, healthcare extends beyond appointments and lab results. Our providers prioritize active listening to fully understand patient concerns and health goals before determining optimal treatment strategies. This patient-first philosophy ensures we address the whole person, not just isolated symptoms.

The clinic maintains ongoing communication with patients throughout their treatment journey. Our follow-up care continues well past initial diagnosis and treatment implementation. This continuous support helps optimize outcomes and improve quality of life.

For pain management services in Spanish Fort and surrounding areas, contact Restoration Health at +1 251-626-0732 or visit https://restorationdocs.com/ to schedule a consultation.
column11: At Restoration Health, we know that healthcare is more than an appointment and lab results. Our job as health care providers is to first understand our patients by actively listening to their concerns, health issues, and desires. And then determine the best course of action to improve their lives, by doing everything in our power to heal. We believe health care should focus equally on care and health. We do this by listening to our patients, staying in contact, and following up long past the lab results and diagnosis.

I've been going here for like a year-and-a-half give a take. They created a patient portal, but never responded to any of my concerns via the portal or in person. I just received a termination letter for inappropriate behavior. The only thing I see is that they are saying that I should know my place and allow them to handle me the way they want and not have a voice. No, I'm not going to have back procedures that's not working, just to pad your pockets. Yes, I'm going to question the discrepancies of my payments, inaccurate information and to point out why you guy's never address my concerns. Some of them are cordial, but some aren't. I would say they need to get it together, but that's maybe what got me released. Plus, I'm no longer a patient there. So, it doesn't matter.|I've been a patient with PPA , Dr. Frenette and now Dr. Hardin ( before and after cancer)since 2018  and I always feel that I'm " listened" to and helped to the best of ANY physician's ability. I LOVE that I don't have to be put to sleep for nerve blocks and my last steroid injection has lasted almost a year. I highly recommend them if you are seeking QOL improvement . Chronic pain is that.....chronic, debilitating and depressing , so it helps to have physicians, nurses  and staff who believe you and do the best they can to understand and help .... and they do!! (I love Dr. Hardin!).|Tried making an appointment, as they are "in network" on my insurance and I was told they are not seeing people on that exact plan. I called my insurance and they assured me that they are in my network, meanwhile I, the consumer, are stuck in the middle. Either have your name removed from the in network providers or start seeing patients. STOP PUTTING PEOPLE IN MEDICAL NEED , IN A ENDLESS MAZE.|So I was a patient for about 3 years if not more.  Went in today and was told they were terminating me because I missed appts.  Truth be told, I was scared to have the nerves burnt in my back.  Horrible horrible the way they did this.|Even though I got all the referrals I needed, they would not see me because my surgery is too close, 2 weeks away. So I guess I'll just have to go buy pain pills on the street if my hip starts giving me severe pain again, literally was in the worst pain I've ever been in a couple weeks ago, and I have severe crohns disease so i know pain, but can't get anything to manage it because they'll give me pain stuff at the hospital, 2 weeks from now. Absolute garbage service and care , will never recommend to anyone.|I went to this place for a couple years and kept telling them that I was getting worse. If they would have listened they would have figured out earlier that I have an autoimmune disease. It took a simple blood test. And when I told them how I was feeling no advice was given on how to go about getting help or finding out what was wrong.|I previously had a doctor that ignored my request for an MRI, with me telling every student NP, NP, and the doctor that owned the brand new facility he built when he had several other doctors working with him. All of sudden there's no other MD's except he and his wife, who was never in the office but somehow managed to sign prescriptions. I was accused of doctor shopping by DHR because they only sign prescriptions with the same NP or student twice to stay off the review boards radar, however I suffered for their diligence to protect their license.
They never disclosed that taking the medication they prescribed would prevent me from taking anything but it permanently, because Medicaid doesn't pay for off book medication, what they did amounts to fraud by definition in addition to negligence and misdiagnosis.

PPA EVERY TIME I SEE THEM I SEE AN MD, they listen, they take your feedback into consideration and do their best to give you the treatment that will help the most, if you're not willing to follow those recommendations, you're not in enough pain to be in a pain clinic.

If it had not been for my common sense telling me that I'm on a walker now and the previous doctor and clinic didn't even take X-rays forget an MRI. I went to the ER and was immediately rushed into the OR at UAB, and then required a second emergency surgery in less than 48 hours. I was hospitalized for over 2 weeks because of the previous doctor.

DR.HARDIN AND DR.FRENETTE HAVE LISTENED,PERFORMED DIFFERENT PROCEDURES AND DO THEIR BEST TO LISTEN AND MANAGE YOUR SYMPTOMS.THEY ARE NOT A PCP,THEY ARE SPECIALISTS AND PRESCRIBING ANY MEDICATION OR PERFORMING ANY TEST OUTSIDE TJAT SCOPE YPUR INSURANCE WOULD MOST LIKELY NOT COVER AND YOU WOULD NOT BE ABLE TO AFFORD OUT OF POCKET COST. JUST BECAUSE YOU DO NOT UNDERSTAND OR ARE IGNORANT OF HOW MEDICAL OFFICES OPERATE IS NO REASON TO TAKE IT OUT ON TJE DOCTORS WHO SPECIALIZE.IF YOU NEEDED A BLOOD TEST,YOU SHOULD HAVE GONE THERE FIRST,NOT A PAIN CLINIC.

THAT IS NOT WHAT THEY DO AT PPA, NOR DO THEY DO ANY ADDITIONAL DIAGNOSTICS,OUTSIDE THEIR SCOPE,
OR ATTEMPT TO MAKE ANY ADDITIONAL DIAGNOSIS BECAUSE MOST LIKELY IT WOULD VIOLATE THE TERMS OF INSURANCE. THEY ARE HERE TO MONITOR AND MANAGE PEOPLE WHO ARE POST OP NOT SUGGEST WHAT OPERATION OR TEST TO FIND YOUR PROBLEM. YOU SHOULD NOT EVEN BE THERE IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A SPECIFIC DIAGNOSIS....
P E R I O D!!!!!

Thanks to the doctors and office staff who have been beyond helpful and understanding. I think you rock|I have been going for 3 years. I love Dr.Frenette and  the other two doctors...they really care about your pain and your overall health.  The nurses and staff are very nice and caring. They do everything they can to help you. I would like to thank all of them for really helping and caring about each person.... Still going here and I was having a lot of lower back and leg pain and nothing was helping so they worked me in one one of the busiest days I had seen and gave me injections and it was a miracle to me they all care about each and every patient and that is so hard to find I just wanted to thank each one .. they take time to listen no matter how busy they are and they explain everything in a easy way to understand.. I can't say enough great things about them all

Auburn Pain Specialists, LLC is a comprehensive pain management clinic serving Auburn and surrounding communities. Located at 100 N Dean Rd Suite 890, Auburn, AL 36830, the practice delivers personalized care for patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions.

The clinic specializes in interventional pain management techniques, offering both medication management and minimally invasive procedures. Their board-certified physicians develop individualized treatment plans addressing various pain sources including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical pain.

Auburn Pain Specialists utilizes advanced diagnostic methods to identify pain causes. Treatment options include epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and targeted medication therapy. The clinic emphasizes functional improvement alongside pain reduction.

The medical team brings extensive training from prestigious institutions, combining years of clinical experience with the latest evidence-based approaches. Their physicians stay current with emerging pain management technologies and techniques.

New patients can schedule consultations by calling +1 334-501-2005. The clinic accepts most major insurance plans and works with patients to maximize coverage benefits. Visit https://auburnpainspecialists.com/ for more information about services, conditions treated, and appointment availability.

Auburn Pain Specialists strives to improve quality of life through effective pain management strategies tailored to each patient's unique needs.

column2: Alabama Spine and Pain : Pavan Telang MD
column3:
Alabama Spine and Pain is Florence's premier pain management clinic specializing in advanced treatment solutions for chronic back and neck pain. Led by Dr. Pavan Telang, MD, the practice focuses on innovative, non-opioid approaches to pain relief. Our comprehensive care plans address various conditions affecting the spine and surrounding structures.

Dr. Telang brings extensive training in interventional pain management techniques. His approach emphasizes minimally invasive procedures and targeted therapies. Patients benefit from customized treatment plans addressing their specific pain conditions.

Our services include epidural steroid injections, facet joint treatments, and radiofrequency ablation. We also offer spinal cord stimulation and regenerative medicine options. Physical therapy coordination complements our medical interventions.

The clinic specializes in treating:

  • Chronic lower back pain
  • Neck pain and cervical spine disorders
  • Sciatica and radicular pain syndromes
  • Failed back surgery syndrome
  • Spinal stenosis
  • Degenerative disc disease

Located behind Clearview Cancer Center at 3907 Peach St in Florence, Alabama, our facility features state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment equipment. We serve patients throughout Lauderdale County and surrounding areas.

For appointments or consultations, call +1 256-712-2422. Additional information about our services and approach is available at www.alabamaspineandpain.com.

Dr. Telang and all the staff are very kind, professional, and helpful. Due to various untreated back injuries over the years, I have been living with severe back pain for several years. Dr. Telang has been working with me for several months to help alleviate some of my pain. I had the RFA on my lower back Nov. 1, 2024, and I have seen at least an 80% improvement in my pain levels and range of motion since then. I also have a very demanding and unpredictable job, and they have been very good to work with me on sudden changes in my schedule. I am very blessed to be receiving care from such a great facility.|Amazing. The ONLY Dr, in over 20 years who actually listened to me, performed the proper tests, and has helped me tremendously. I'm  forever grateful for the recommendation from a client to check him out. If you suffer from pain in your limbs or spine, give him a chance. If you are a military vet, he works with community care as well. I can not recommend Dr. T and his staff enough. I will forever be grateful for the pain relief he has given me. Trust me when I say he has done so much work on me it's unreal! From neck all the way to sciatic, and my arm/shoulder... he has helped it all. If you have chronic pain, give him a visit, tell him Kayla Latrell sent yah!|Dr. Telang has helped me with my back pain and always answers my questions. His staff are friendly and respectful.|From the time you walk in to the time you
leave you are treated with care and understanding of what you are going thru. Dr. Telang and his staff are the kindest and most caring. Thank you for taking care of me.|So thankful I found Dr Telang! He has significantly reduced (95%) my back pain and now he is working on my sciatica in my leg. Amazing results. Highly recommend.
Dr Telang and his staff are absolute professionals from scheduling, billing and always friendly. Dr Telang is busy but he always takes the time to listen to my questions and concerns and helps me understand the treatment and prognosis. Again, highly recommend Dr Telang. Wish I'd found him years ago.|I have been a patient since moving to Florence in 2018.  I didn't know about pain specialist, but asked on FB for a doctor in Florence, who could help me with my back pain.  Dr. Telang was recommended and I quickly made an appointment.  He has helped me so much, in fact I was in a rear-end accident in which my back became worse. Another injury I received from this accident was whiplash. This whiplash is constant, every time I turn my head pain shoots up into my skull.  Injections in the neck have helped this also.
Last year I was talking to a guy that was at a tailgate party and I saw he was in great pain.  He told me his surgeon recommended surgery.  I had two back surgeries and I could advise him how difficult the recovery was and I was still in great pain.  I told him about Dr. Telang and the guy actually made an appointment.  I saw the guy Oct 7, 2013, after not having talked to him for a year.  He told me Dr. Telang had helped him tremendously.  He was so glad to have gone to Telang. No surgery if he continues to have his pain manageable.  YEAH!|I have several herniated discs and was a candidate for surgery. Dr. Telang treated me via steroid injection, and I cannot thank him enough. He's very professional, personable, and knowledgeable! He saved me from surgery, so far!|Dr. Telang and his team are great.  He helped my neck pain and numbness in my hand tremendously.

Kenneth Varley, MD offers comprehensive interventional pain management services in Birmingham, Alabama. The clinic features state-of-the-art imaging technology and a dedicated in-office procedure suite, allowing for efficient diagnosis and treatment in one location. Dr. Varley specializes in minimally invasive pain relief techniques for chronic and acute conditions.

With over 25 years of experience in pain management, Dr. Varley has established himself as a regional leader in the field. His practice focuses on personalized treatment plans that address the root causes of pain. The clinic provides solutions for back pain, neck pain, joint discomfort, and neuropathic conditions.

Patients benefit from Dr. Varley's comprehensive approach to pain relief. Treatment options include epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation. The clinic emphasizes non-opioid pain management strategies whenever possible.

Dr. Varley has received multiple awards for outstanding service throughout his career. His commitment to patient education and comfort makes the clinic a trusted choice for Birmingham residents seeking pain relief.

Location: 7500 Hugh Daniel Dr Suite 360, Birmingham, AL 35242, United States

column48: Do you need a referral or can you refer yourself
column49: Depends on the insurance.  Most common policies usually do not require it (such as BCBS and Medicare).  Third party Medicare replacement policies generally do not require it (such as UHC MC).  Tricare, Humana, Aetna, Viva, and Cigna HS may require it but we will need the policy number to verify.  Hope this helps!

The Doleys Clinic is a specialized pain management center in Hoover, Alabama providing comprehensive care for chronic pain sufferers. Located at 2270 Valleydale Rd #100, the clinic offers a unique holistic approach combining physical therapy and behavioral counseling. Patients receive personalized treatment plans from experienced pain management physicians who understand that chronic pain affects both mind and body.

The clinic specializes in non-surgical interventions designed to help patients avoid major procedures while effectively managing pain conditions. Treatment programs are tailored to individual needs, with flexible program durations to accommodate patient recovery timelines. The Doleys Clinic works directly with insurance providers to ensure accessible care for all patients.

For millions of Americans dealing with chronic pain, The Doleys Clinic offers hope through evidence-based treatments. Their team focuses on helping patients regain strength and improve quality of life through comprehensive pain management strategies. The clinic's integrated approach addresses both physical symptoms and psychological aspects of chronic pain.

Patients seeking pain relief in the Birmingham metro area can contact The Doleys Clinic at (205) 982-3596 or visit their website at www.thedoleysclinichoover.com to schedule a consultation with their pain management specialists.
column9: Holistic medicine practitioner|Pain control clinic|Physiotherapy Center
column11: Though you're among the millions of Americans who deal with chronic pain, your experience can feel isolating. That's why The Doleys Clinic specializes in helping you feel better. We pair you with a pain management physician in Hoover, AL, who can help you regain your strength. Here, we follow a holistic approach to mind and body care. Your situation might be stressful, but we want to help you avoid needing major surgery down the line. Entry into our program doesn't have to last long, and we will work with your insurance provider. For quality physical therapy and behavior counseling, contact us today. You deserve to feel good.

column40:
Dr Kelsey is cool and all but if there are any discrepancies with drug test or anything he won't say a word about it. Therefore, if you don't know, you cannot even beging to explain as to why. My levels were apparently not correct and one of my DTs was off. No one told me until FOUR MONTHS LATER. They continued to fill my prescriptions. Then some very snarky, woman called me, Pam... And accused me of doing METH and FENTANYL!!!
She told me to come to the office the following day to re-test. I did, she comes in the room and hands me a dismissal sheet. And REFUSED TO RETEST ME.
And discharged me.

My husband then called the owner because I was SOBBING because I had JUST gotten my job back and back on my feet from dealing with debilitating pain that TOOK MY FRIGGIN LIFE FROM ME!!!

ONLY THEN DID THEY SEND MY DRUG SCREEN OFF FOR FURTHER TESTING. NOTHING WAS IN MY SYSTEM EXCEPT FOR MY PRESCRIPTION MEDS.

The owner apologized. But after that, nope. I won't go back.

Pam is NOT nice. They REFUSE to admit that they're human beings too and make mistakes. I understand they have to be tough but they don't have to be HATEFUL and ASSUME EVERYONE IS AN ADDICT.

If you're a patient here, just please be careful and have a back up plan in case Pam decides to get a wild hair one day and ruin your life.

I will say that Dr. Kelsey's nurse is the ONLY person in that clinic who is kind. She had no problem answering any questions, or just hearing me out with my concerns. It's a shame that office is bringing her down.
I pray she finds a Doctors office who will appreciate her and give her the respect she deserves.

Thanks|My name is actually Lisa Zopfi-Houston Bambi is my nickname. I am a pump patient and Dr Doleys has bent over backwards to keep me my pain level down. I have a very unusual situation and have been through alot since coming to the Doleys Clinic. I really really feel he cares. Anne my pump nurse has been a life saver. As a retired nurse myself I have never met a nurse that cares more than she does. No matter what struggles she has gone through in her own life she never EVER let it show in her day to day. Since Dr Hill has left it has been more difficult for them, however both of them are trying so hard to help their patients,  even if it means staying until all hours of the night.I may have to leave due to insurance issues and it breaks my heart. I have grown to feel like my pain team has become part of my family. I don't know if I will get the amount of true love and care that I receive from Dr Doleys and Anne. Please believe me when I tell you they really really care!!!!!!!|I have been going to Dr Dolays clinic  for 30years, I was a total mess before coming to the clinic. After they got me where I should be , I have lived a better life , thanks to them . You are treated like a human and your pain is their pain !! They take time to listen to my needs , and they do everything possible to make my life better . Being disable is  no fun and games , it changes your whole life , but you have to make the most of it , and learn to live with it , Uplift has been a God send to me , before I may have only gotten a few hours sleep, but now I take it and sleep like a baby !!! Thanks Nick & Dr Dolays for your concern for me and my pain!!!! The staff is great and Ms Ann is wonderful, she listens and cares to all my needs !!! Please continue to take care of me, so I can be as  normal as I can !!!!|If I had to post a review prior to Dr. Hill's retirement, it would have been 5 stars. Since Dr. Hill left, I have been reduced in my pain medication that I have been taking since 2011. I've never ran out before it was due, never had to use Narcan, never had been rushed to a hospital or overdosed. It is because the DEA now has become my doctor. First it was Dr. CDC and now it is Dr. DEA. For those of you, staff and patients, who would like to be well informed of the patients struggles, please join pain groups on Facebook. At least there are some physicians that will fight against this atrocity. Although my last name shows up as Rawlins on Facebook, it is Townsend. Please check some groups out. There are many that try to fight the government from becoming our physicians.|I have been a chronic pain patient for many years and The Doleys Clinic is one of the best pain clinics I have ever encountered.  The staff has been very helpful.  Dr. Hill is very compassionate and understanding.  He works hard to understand your concerns and help you achieve your goals and give you the best quality of life he can.  Dr. Dolce listens well and explains thoroughly his thoughts about your care.  I feel Blessed to have found The Doleys Clinic!|Sending me to The Doleys Clinic was one of the best things my physician has done for me.   I have experienced only positive,  professional interactions with any of the staff with whom I have had the pleasure of dealing.  I have been treated courteously, and with kindness & compassion.  I feel as though any concerns I present are heard and all reasonable efforts are made to address them.  One thing that is great is that I have very rarely EVER had to wait for more than thirty (30) minutes, if even that long, to  be seen.

I am deeply grateful for all of you at The Doleys Clinic.   God bless you all.|Update May 2024- I am no longer a patient due to Dr. Hill retiring so information below may be outdated. The clinic did try to help me find another physician in the area- None of those worked for me but I was able to transition to another provider without trouble.

This has been an amazing and wonderful experience with pain management. I was at a different clinic previously and was being backed into a corner to agree to a procedure for my rare condition. I was not comfortable with this and many other things and decided to seek a second opinion. I chose the Doleys clinic since I was seeing one of their pain psychologists already and I am so glad I decided to see Dr. Hill. He has truly treated my pain management plan like a collaboration. He listens to my story, seeks to understand my rare diagnosis, and we work TOGETHER to decide on my plan of care. I am not pressured into procedures I am not comfortable with. So far, my pain management plan is working and giving me my life back. Thank you so very much for treating me with respect and as a trustful adult.|I have been coming to the Doleys clinic for over ten years . I have always been treated with respect and kindness.they have helped me threw some very difficult times in my life both physical and mental.Dr Hill is one of the kindest people I have ever met and nurse Tiffiny is very thorough and kind. I have had two hip replacements two knee replacements two broken wrists at the same time that had to be rebuilt.so when I say I could not have made it with out them I mean it.also my husband has been coming for two years after two neck surgeries I would just like to thank everyone at the clinic from the office staff who checks me in keeps my husbands and my appointments straight to the nurses that take your blood pressure and administer  your drug testing. I have recommended the Doleys clinic to several of my friends who have had bad experiences at other clinics.thanks again for making my life better

column2: The Pain Clinic at East Alabama Medical Center
column3:
The Pain Clinic at East Alabama Medical Center offers comprehensive pain management services in Opelika, Alabama. Located in the Canopy 3 Outpatient Center at 2000 Pepperell Parkway, our specialized clinic focuses on treating various pain conditions through minimally invasive techniques.

Our team utilizes state-of-the-art technology and non-surgical treatments to effectively reduce pain, restore physical function, and improve quality of life. The clinic's approach combines advanced medical interventions with personalized care plans tailored to each patient's specific needs.

Patients benefit from our comprehensive care model that brings together experienced physicians and compassionate staff. Our specialists have extensive training in pain medicine, anesthesiology, and rehabilitation techniques, ensuring the highest standard of care for chronic and acute pain conditions.

We treat a wide range of pain disorders including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical pain. Our physicians employ evidence-based treatments such as nerve blocks, epidural injections, radiofrequency ablation, and medication management.

The Pain Clinic accepts new patients through physician referrals. Healthcare providers can submit the Pain Clinic Physicians Referral Form available on our website. For appointments or more information, patients can contact us directly at (334) 528-2400.

Located within East Alabama Medical Center's facilities, our clinic provides convenient access to additional medical services when needed. We serve patients throughout East Alabama in a modern, comfortable environment designed for optimal care delivery.
column11: Our goal at East Alabama Health Pain Clinic is to utilize state-of-the-art technology, along with minimally invasive and non-surgical treatments, to reduce pain, restore performance and improve your quality of life when dealing with many types of pain. Our comprehensive care model provides you with the experience of a team of physicians and staff with the compassion of a caretaker. Pain Clinic Physicians Referral Form

Central Alabama Pain Management Center offers comprehensive pain relief solutions at our Montgomery clinic. Located at 1709 Forest Ave, Montgomery, AL 36106, our facility specializes in treating chronic and acute pain conditions through evidence-based approaches.

Our board-certified pain specialists develop personalized treatment plans for patients suffering from back pain, neck pain, joint disorders, neuropathy, and post-surgical pain. The center utilizes advanced diagnostic techniques to identify pain sources accurately. Treatment options include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, therapeutic injections, and physical rehabilitation programs.

Dr. James Wilson, our medical director, brings over 20 years of experience in interventional pain management. He completed his fellowship at Johns Hopkins and specializes in spinal cord stimulation and radiofrequency ablation techniques. Our multidisciplinary team includes pain physicians, nurse practitioners, and physical therapists working collaboratively for optimal patient outcomes.

The clinic accepts most major insurance plans and offers same-week appointments for new patients. Our Montgomery location serves patients throughout central Alabama with compassionate, results-oriented care. The facility features state-of-the-art procedure rooms and comfortable consultation spaces.

For appointment scheduling or questions about pain management options, call +1 334-264-3302. Office hours run Monday through Friday, 8am to 5pm, with early morning appointments available.

BUTTTTTTR====== = WE (PATIENTS) live in our bodies, use, our body. Feel our bodies day in day out we know what works , was hasn't,  what doesnt... if (IF) they would take the time to hear us out for once maybe the (WHOLE MEDICINE) Situation's for everyone  even the ( DR'S) would get better.

column3:
Valley Pain Clinic is a specialized interventional pain management center located in Decatur, Alabama. Our comprehensive approach addresses chronic and acute pain conditions through advanced treatment options. The clinic serves patients throughout North Alabama with personalized care plans.

At Valley Pain Clinic, we offer evidence-based treatments for various pain conditions including:

  • Spinal pain management
  • Joint pain relief
  • Nerve pain treatment
  • Musculoskeletal pain therapy
  • Chronic headache management
  • Post-surgical pain care

Our interventional procedures include epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation. We combine minimally invasive techniques with medication management when appropriate.

Experienced Pain Specialists

Our board-certified physicians bring extensive training in pain medicine and anesthesiology. Each doctor completes ongoing education in the latest pain management advances. The clinical team works collaboratively to develop individualized treatment plans.

Patient-Centered Approach

We prioritize thorough diagnostic evaluations before recommending treatment options. Most patients receive same-week appointments for urgent pain concerns. Our staff coordinates with primary care providers to ensure continuity of care.

Contact Information

  • Website: https://valleypainclinic.net/
  • Phone: +1 256-301-9994
  • Address: 2208 Danville Rd SW G, Decatur, AL 35601, United States

Valley Pain Clinic welcomes new patients seeking relief from persistent pain conditions. Call our office to schedule your consultation today.

column40:
We started seeing Dr. Shikh in 2023 after scar tissue from a back surgery put my husband in a wheelchair. He would literally scream in pain and could not perform the most basic of functions by himself (putting on clothes, brushing teeth,  etc.) After trying meds and an epidural, Dr. Shikh suggested the spinal stimulator. The trial worked well, so we went for the real thing and it changed my husband's life. He is now pain free, no meds and can do nearly everything he could before the scar tissue formed. We could not be more pleased with Dr. Shikh and his staff and they work they did. They are the best!!!!|I am afraid the low reviews found on Valley Pain Clinic Reviews are from patiences wanting pain pills . The Doctor is very careful about getting people addicted! My insurance also covered all cost so that may be a factor as well .
I was diagnosed on my very first visit , my medial branch nerves were shooting unbearable pain , just getting out of bed caused me to scream ! I could not have therapy , The Pain level out the roof !  I had to have these nerves deactivated by ablation . The pain had stopped before I left the surgery center .
I am now getting therapy, strengthening my back muscles . I had  one year of being inactive due to pain , now I can get the therapy I needed without pain . I highly recommend if nerve pain is your problem .
I didn't want to live my life on pain pills , I wanted the problem fixed . I have high expectations that when and if these nerves grow back my back will be strong enough and will not let the medial never call the shots ! I say Amen ! This was my only solution for getting out of pain .|BEST PAIN DOCTOR IN NORTH ALABAMA .  WILL. NOT. GIVE YOU. PILLS UNLESS YOU NEED THEM. !!!
PROBABLY REASON FOR BAD REVIEWS BECAUSE THEY DIDN'T GET PILLS. !!!!
HE AND HIS STAFF ARE THE BEST!!!|I have been going here for a few months : costed quite a bit to get X-rays at the local hospital to prove my conditions. It seemed to be what I needed to get medication to control my pain . However the third visit became complicated from extreme high charges for drug screen . They were charging my insurance 160.for drug screen . Of course my provider would not pay this ridiculous amount therefore they charged me for the difference . So I spoke with a male person in the office and he assured me that from that point on when a drug test was done I would be charged only 65.00 ok so I agreed . Continued with there team . Now today when I went in they had a lot of charges along with another 160.00 charge for drug screen . Also two charges for no show .there was two times I had to reschedule because of being out of town . I followed protocol and called days before my appointment to reschedule . There policy I signed when I started with this office required 24 hour notice to not be charged as no show this was met . They wanted me to sign for charges and I refused , they gave me a paper to sign to state I was quoting there service . I refused to sign and to them I was only refusing to sign until they corrected the no show charges and honored the 65.00 drug screen . It appears people that are in need of help and or scamming for drugs : are the people that this pain clinic feeds on by overcharging and incorrect charges known no they will pay anything to get drugs . Lol not me yes I need help but not going no to be hassled for charges that are incorrect. I will be calling the state board to further my compliant . Can't help but believe this is happening a lot . Every time I go there the same complaints are at the desk from other patients . This pain management needs to be shut down . I will do all in my power to see that it does shut down or at least be investigated to stop the theft of our hard earned money . If I am wrong then it will have to be proved to me . Thank you for taking time to review my complaints|I am very concerned about this office's prescribing practices. I am a nurse with AL Dept of public health. I have two family members that have been patients there for many years. One gets monthly fentanyl patches along with percocet 10s, the other gets 110 percocets a month. They both live in the same household . There is a high risk of overuse and sharing that is well known nationwide. Most offices will not do this. I will be investigating further|I have been coming to see Dr. Shikh since 2006. I have Multi Level DDD.  I have Spinal  Stenosis.  I have a Ruptured Disk and Bulging Disk. I also have Bone Spurs. I have  have had different types of medication. I have had joint injections.  I have had Epidural injection. I was told by Dr. Shikh that if I  never have any pain then I was on to much medication.  I am now at the point where I have to have a Spinal fusion. I  will still have to go back to Dr. Shikh. I love everyone there. The staff is so sweet . Dr. Shikh does do random drug screening so you better be very strict with your medicine. He will not replace lost prescriptions  with out a police report. Dest pain management doctor there is. Definitely not a pain mill
If that is what you want then you will be disappointed. I would give him and his staff a an A+.|Dr. Shake dropped me because I couldn't go without my nerve pills.  I'd been going to him for 8 years.  I have yet to look for another dr. Because I'm scared of being rejected.  Dr. Shake performed surgery on my neck twice burning the nerves. Now I cant turn my neck to the right.  The side he burned the nerves.  I may need further surgery.  I dont know because he cold heartedly let me go. Im in chronic pain everyday.  I thought I could rely on him. Im in deep depression|Have been going to Valley Pain Clinic to see Dr. Shikh for several years now. When I started going to him I was in terrible pain in my back and legs. After trying several different things he finally found something that worked and is still working after a couple of years now. He is a doctor that truely cares about his patients and had a great staff. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for pain management care.

Relief Spine & Pain Center is Fort Payne's premier destination for comprehensive pain management services. Located at 1403 Old Water Works Rd SW, our clinic specializes in treating both acute and chronic pain conditions through personalized treatment plans.

Dr. Asmitha Sathiyakumar, M.D., leads our expert medical team with extensive training as a board-certified anesthesiologist and interventional pain management physician. Her specialized education and clinical experience enable our center to offer advanced pain relief techniques not widely available in Northeast Alabama.

We address a wide spectrum of pain conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint discomfort, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical pain. Our treatment approaches combine minimally invasive procedures, medication management, and rehabilitative therapies tailored to each patient's specific needs.

At Relief Spine & Pain Center, we believe in patient empowerment. Our care philosophy encourages patients to take an active role in their recovery journey. This patient-centric approach has established us as a trusted healthcare partner throughout DeKalb County.

New patients appreciate our thorough initial consultations where we carefully evaluate medical history, perform comprehensive examinations, and develop customized treatment strategies. Most insurance plans are accepted at our practice.

Contact us at (256) 646-7246 to schedule your appointment or visit www.reliefspineandpaincenter.com for more information about our services. Relief Spine & Pain Center is committed to helping you achieve lasting pain relief and improved quality of life.
column11: Relief Spine & Pain Center is dedicated to providing top-tier, compassionate care for individuals suffering from acute and chronic pain. Our team, led by board-certified anesthesiologist and interventional pain management physician Dr. Asmitha Sathiyakumar, M.D., specializes in a comprehensive approach to pain management. Our patient-centric approach promotes a sense of ownership in the recovery journey, making Relief Spine & Pain Center your trusted partner in achieving a pain-free life.

column40:
We have been coming here for a while now and let me tell you They are the nicest people you could ever hope for. Jessica and Candi we love how friendly and concerned you are for every aspect of our lives. This is just like you are with family.|I absolutely love this place. They all have been super sweet and are ready to help do whatever they can to help your pain. They are super fast and They are super professional but still down to earth just all around great people.  They really do their best to help you in any way they can. My experience here has been wonderful.  I've been to a couple places in the past a long time ago that left much to be desired but they are Awesome  here. If your in pain I highly recommend you come here. They will definitely do everything they can to help you.|Today was my first day at Relief Spine & Pain Center. I almost cried in relief on my way home from my appointment. Everyone including Dr. sathiyakumar were all extremely nice and they all had a smile on their faces. They were all extremely respectful to me and my daughter. They don't get upset when you have questions and they genuinely seem like they want to help. They don't send you to other doctors to have an epidural or the other kind of shots that go in to your back. The doctor does it right there in the clinic. Also, Dr. Asmitha ( Dr. A), promised that if she has to change your medication will always make sure that she tells you and not just leave you hanging. They seem like they actually care about finding the best way to help you manage your pain. I prayed that the Lord would help me find a good doctor and he did. I know that it is just my first day but the doctor and the nurse's and office personnel were exactly how people described them on the reviews I had read. If you are going to a pain doctor that treats you like you are nothing and acts like they are God and gets mad at you for asking questions, then leave that Pain Clinic and make an appointment here. You don't have to put up with being disrespected. They actually treat you like a human being at this clinic. Dr A is no push over yet gentle. And after you speak with her you KNOW that she's highly intelligent and that she cares.|This is the best doctor.  She takes the time to listen to her patients, and is very compassionate.  Each member of staff I've met has been so kind. I'm so thankful for this office.|The whole staff here is very friendly and accommodating. They will go out of their way to help you, if they can.    Dr A is very good at what she does and so far the procedures that she has done, have been very helpful to me.  You won't be sorry for going here!|We had our first appointment with the clinic and were very pleased. The staff were so friendly and caring. The doctor was very professional explaining options for treatment and in a way we could comprehend. It was a very pleasant appointment and gave us a lot of hope for treatment options!!!  So ready for this journey of healing and comfort.  Thank you to all the staff.|I'll definitely only use them for my pain clinic. It was my first time here and they are Amazingly Friendly, Knowledgeable, and seem to really care about their patients. Doc took time to go over everything and explained it all in layman's terms. So refreshing to have someone who actually listens. I'd give 10 stars if it would let me.|I've had 2 visits, and they were extremely opposite.
I think the difference was how busy they were. On the 1st visit, they were extremely busy. While I do appreciate not having my wait reflection on how busy they were, I didn't appreciate not being able to complete any of my sentences on the questions.
On the 2nd visit, they weren't as busy. The nurse was very, very nice. Like the nicest one I've seen in 10 years. Her name began with an S.. maybe Sandra, mmm.. not sure. I'd love to give her credit here. Dr. was the same, very nice.
If both visits were that nice, I'd give 4 stars. Unfortunately, I almost didn't go back after that 1st one.
I think it's very sad reading these reviews where people are saying it's nice to be treated like a human. If that doesn't say we need healthcare improvements. It is nice to be treated like a human. I will say I was treated like a human except for those minutes I wasn't. I was treated like a number for a few minutes. When I say I couldn't complete a sentence, I mean that literally. But I didn't see that nurse there on this 2nd visit so she might not even still be there and I feel sure it was because of the amount of patients there.  I would reconsider my review if my next visit is as good as this last one.

Alabama Anesthesiology and Pain Consultants offers comprehensive pain management services in Anniston, Alabama. The clinic specializes in treating chronic pain conditions through evidence-based interventional procedures and medication management. Located at 731 Leighton Ave #200, their board-certified physicians provide personalized treatment plans for patients suffering from back pain, neck pain, joint pain, and neuropathic conditions.

The practice combines advanced diagnostic techniques with targeted therapies including epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation. Their physicians have extensive training in anesthesiology and pain medicine, with specialized fellowship experience in interventional pain management techniques.

Patients benefit from a multidisciplinary approach that addresses both the physical and emotional aspects of chronic pain. The clinic offers convenient scheduling with minimal wait times for appointments. Their facility features state-of-the-art equipment for precise diagnosis and treatment delivery.

Alabama Anesthesiology and Pain Consultants accepts most major insurance plans and works with patients to maximize coverage benefits. New patients can expect comprehensive evaluations that thoroughly assess their pain history and contributing factors.

column38: Marilyn Hersey|Frances Marie Burnham|sandra walker|Bill McNabb (BMac)|William Harper|Tasha Gray|Love Bug|Terri Byars
column40:
Thank you for adding another Provider.  I found Michelle(if I remember correctly) to be very caring, knowledgeable & professional.  Wait times were greatly reduced.  I have been a patient for a few months & am very satisfied & happy with the Staff & Providers.  Everyone is friendly yet professional and I feel as though I matter to this practice.  My pain is well controlled with only as necessary medications.|They had me excited my first visit. The Dr made me feel like it was important to not only find the problem(m) but the solution(s). Plans were made to have a more recent MRI. A nerve block was scheduled for Feb 2nd. I had a sense everyone had listened & we were all on the path to me being able to function again with a life. Sounds great, right? Keep reading.........

It took me a yr to get to a pain clinic of which I thought was the start of regaining my life back. I spent a yr reading reviews, asking friends, getting referrals before finally choosing AAPC. I'd spent 3+ yrs pushing through pain levels I never thought possible.  I had pushed through for over 5+ yrs without any narcotics. Now my pain is so extreme I'm having difficulties standing, walking, driving to Dr appts, the pharmacy, grocery stores, cooking, doing chores or daily activities such as bathing & dressing. I'M NOT FUNCTIONING OR PUSHING THROUGH ANYMORE & I'm not ashamed to admit it. So now let's get to what happened my second visit. A visit that I was so excited to go to after my 1st visit.

I'm guessing it was two nurse practitioners that came in separate times. But I'm not certain since they never introduced themselves. They asked the typical follow up questions. Quickly I was told my prescriptions had been sent to my pharmacy. That's when I asked would I see the Dr today & I was assured I would. What I had been prescribed my 1st visit still left me crippled in pain.

Remember I'm at desperate mode for relief when I entered 6wks earlier. I didn't call & complain the meds weren't working. I assumed the time to discuss this would be at the next appt. The girl said , let me go talk to the dr. Then came back in  & proceeded to tell me they increased it but it was very little. Then shocked me, by telling me, my next step up was what's called a subutex. Which is a type of subboxen. These are normally prescribed to opiate addicts. Made it clear that was not only my next but LAST option.

Then I'm told because I'd been prescribed heavy pain medications in the past that my pain was not going to be able to be controlled. That my body was reaching for that same level of relief. Although I know she was saying HIGH. At this point I'm shocked & asked her was she sure? Yes, well I think but I can ask the Dr. was her reply. Are you sure, I said? After 5 yrs of not taking any opiates at all? I'd never heard this before.

I said, I don't understand why I can't be prescribed what worked in the past. Because they are stronger, she said. I had a surgeon after a surgery 10yrs ago tell me I had the highest tolerance for pain meds & the lowest he'd ever seen for pain. In my hospital stays I'm always given a step up from morphine because it doesn't work on me. I have to tell an anesthesiologist he will have a hard time knocking me out for surgery. Now that I've done my own research she is wrong. There are many factors & not necessarily because "once upon a time" I was prescribed strong opiates.

After being excited at the completion of my first visit & exiting with a great game plain. Then fast forward to my 2nd visit, leaving feeling labeled as nothing short of an addict or junkie. Even though I've stated in the past I never was addicted to the stronger narcotics. That's my experience & this is my honest review.

Before I close, I must mention that I've had friends, neighbors, strangers tell me how addicted they became to a subutex or a suboxone. I've watched a couple go through horrific withdrawals equivalent to methodone withdrawals. No thanks!|I am a Lupus patient with many other medical problems. The doctor here not only prescribed me meds but physical therapy which has helped me tremendously. I love her. She seem like she care about the patient. I like that at this office. It don't seem so commercial. You don't have to wear a mask but I do. They don't take long. You are in and out. A very good doctors office.|I've only been seeing Dr E in the Moody office a few months, so far I am pleased with her and her staff. Dr E is extremely easy to talk with. The trust between us has been a great change in my years of being passed around from one doctor to another since 1990. With lots of pain no one has given me 'options' until now. Anyone dealing with pain management knows what I mean. Some of my past pain docs were just arrogant and several have been suffering from a god complex we see in the medical community.
Dr E does have guidelines in using certain pain medications but having all my records she has given me options. If one thing doesn't work she's good to suggest others. So far I'm glad I found her. A big plus is her office is only 1 mile from the house. Never but 2 to 3 patients at the time so it's a short wait time which for me is huge. Great staff great atmosphere.|Great experience every time. Great doctor who actually is trying to help.|This clinic deserves zero stars due to unprofessional staff unable to provide good service for patients.|The whole team is AMAZING! Doctor von has did an excellent job at managing my pain. I've been able to enjoy daily activities, and enjoy life as a whole! Thank you for what you do!|Love this group. I have been using them for years.

Southern Wellness is a specialized pain management clinic serving patients throughout the Birmingham area. Conveniently located on Highway 31 in Alabaster's Medical Mile, the practice offers comprehensive care for those suffering from chronic pain conditions.

The clinic provides targeted pain management services with a focus on personalized treatment plans. Patients benefit from evidence-based approaches to address various pain sources, including back pain, joint discomfort, neuropathy, and post-surgical pain. Southern Wellness practitioners combine medical expertise with compassionate care to improve quality of life.

Appointments are available on Thursdays and Fridays, with occasional Saturday appointments by special arrangement. The clinic maintains regular office hours Monday through Friday for scheduling and administrative needs.

Southern Wellness maintains a second location at 5510 US-280, Suite 216 in Birmingham, AL 35242, expanding access to pain management services across the region.

For consultation scheduling or questions about pain treatment options, patients can contact the clinic directly at (205) 624-4325. Additional information about services, treatment approaches, and physician credentials is available on their website: www.southernwellnessmed.com.

The practice emphasizes comprehensive pain solutions rather than temporary symptom relief. New patients are welcome with appropriate referrals from primary care physicians.
