column3:
Florida Pain Medicine

Florida Pain Medicine "Restore Function & Relieve Life" is a premier pain management clinic serving multiple locations across Florida. Our dedicated team combines cutting-edge technology with a holistic approach to patient health, helping those suffering from chronic pain return to the activities they love.

At Florida Pain Medicine, we understand that comprehensive treatment isn't just about alleviating pain���it's about helping patients regain control of their lives. Our specialists develop personalized treatment plans addressing the root causes of discomfort while focusing on long-term wellness solutions.

Specialized Services

Our clinic offers advanced interventional procedures including:

- **Spinal cord stimulation** for persistent back and leg pain

- **Joint injections** to reduce inflammation and improve mobility

- **Radiofrequency ablation** for nerve pain management

- **Regenerative medicine** options promoting natural healing

- **Medication management** with careful monitoring and adjustments

Multiple Convenient Locations

Florida Pain Medicine proudly serves patients at multiple locations throughout Florida:

- **Tampa Bay Area**: Tampa, St. Petersburg, Wesley Chapel

- **Eastern Hillsborough**: Brandon, Riverview, Zephyrhills

- **Volusia County**: Daytona Beach, Ormond Beach, Port Orange

Why Choose Florida Pain Medicine?

Our board-certified physicians bring decades of combined experience in pain management. Each doctor completes extensive fellowship training in interventional techniques and stays current with the latest advancements in pain medicine.

We accept most major insurance plans and work closely with patients to maximize their benefits. New patients typically receive appointments within one week.

Visit our Brandon location at 428 W Brandon Blvd, Brandon, FL 33511, or contact us at (813) 388-2948 to schedule your consultation. Learn more about our services at www.floridapainmedicine.com.

Dr Peterson is wonderful! He really listened to me and after looking at my imaging he was able to pinpoint some areas of muscle that were reactive and creating more pain, which he is working with me to treat. Dr Peterson is compassionate and caring and wants to help you get to the bottom of your pain not just cover it up, and that's exactly the kind of Dr I was hoping for. I've only been twice so far but I'm impressed and will definitely continue with his treatment plan. It's such a relief to have someone help address your pain, especially when it's chronic and debilitating.|Dr Stone is very impressive! Comes in with a nice smile and a great handshake! He took time to answer my questions, is thorough and doesn't rush. I was very pleased with my visit and intend to continue with him as his patient|The staff and Dr were very warm, welcoming and knowledgeable. They helped make me as comfortable as possible. The procedure went smoothly. If you suffer from chronic pain due to back, nerve and joint pain I would recommend this pain clinic.|I found Dr. Stone to be informative and good at explaining what it would take to fix my back problems as I had multiple problems. Her expertise, compassion, and attention to detail made me feel completely at ease during my visit. She took the time to listen to my concerns and explained everything clearly. The Drs are all awesome, the techs are awesome, and the ladies in the front office are always super nice and helpful.
I wish my primary Dr office would operate this well.

column3:
Florida Spine & Pain Center offers comprehensive pain management solutions in Hollywood, Florida. Our goal is to relieve your pain today, without surgery. Located at 2 Oakwood Blvd Suite 195, our clinic specializes in non-surgical interventions for chronic and acute pain conditions affecting the spine and joints.

At Florida Spine & Pain Center, we provide personalized treatment plans addressing various pain conditions. Our board-certified physicians utilize advanced diagnostic techniques to identify pain sources accurately. Treatment options include minimally invasive procedures, therapeutic injections, and medication management tailored to each patient's needs.

Conditions We Treat

Our clinic specializes in treating:

  • Back and neck pain

  • Sciatica and radicular pain

  • Joint pain and arthritis

  • Neuropathic pain conditions

  • Sports injuries and work-related injuries

  • Complex regional pain syndrome

Our Approach to Pain Management

We believe in comprehensive care that addresses the root cause of pain. Our physicians combine their extensive training with the latest evidence-based techniques. Patients receive individualized attention with treatment plans designed for long-term relief rather than temporary fixes.

Why Choose Florida Spine & Pain Center

Our practice stands out through our commitment to non-surgical approaches whenever possible. We emphasize patient education and active participation in the recovery process. Our convenient Hollywood location serves patients throughout Broward County with accessible pain management solutions.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation, please contact us at:

Phone: +1 954-447-5206

Address: 2 Oakwood Blvd Suite 195, Hollywood, FL 33020

Website: https://floridapaincenter.com/

Florida Spine & Pain Center welcomes new patients seeking effective pain relief without surgical intervention. Same-week appointments are often available for those experiencing acute pain conditions.

I was greeted by warm and friendly receptionist. Everyone was great from getting my Getting my vital signs checked to Preparing me for my injection everyone was nice and friendly, and very professional injecting itself took less than three minutes after which I was given discharged instructions.|Dr Fernandez has been my doctor for over three years.  She repaired my fractured back and her treatment has permitted me to walk without pain.  She is kind, compassionate and caring.  Her nurse Monica goes out of her way during and after each visit to insure that I am well.  I highly recommend Dr Fernandez and her care team to anyone who suffers from any type of pain as they go out of their way to help resolve any issue.|Twice I Tried to use the online appointment scheduling tool.  Twice I received absolutely nothing in response.  I called and made the appointment. I soon received a text message reminding me of the appointment with a link to their website check in process, I go to the link, spend an hour filling in my medical history, uploading ID, insurance etc.

Get to appointment, they request my ID and insurance card, and hand me a clip board with a dozen pages to fill out.  Is this the same stuff I spent an hour online filling out?  Her response was "Did you print it?"

I took my ID back and canceled the appointment.  At my age I don't do Doctors with bad office setups. I won't go back.|My pain management specialist , Dr V Fernandez is the most humane and caring doctor I have had the pleasure of dealing with. Each complaint is individualized, investigated and addressed in a caring and empathetic way. Her nurse Monica, is equally caring. Office staff is polite and helpful.|Dr.Kirshbaum is a great & understanding Dr., he takes the time to listen & treats you with care & respect. The office staff is great as well. I would recommend this team to anyone in need of a great practice.|Florida Spine & Pain Center has great customer service, great support, elaborate facilities. much care and concern .

Doctor Neal Kirshbaum is one of the most  Caring  Professional physicians I have experienced. He explains procedures and makes sure everything is explained to the patient.

Great service.|I was treated here several times, everyone was nice and professional, great atmosphere! But with every visit I came in pain and left in pain. Not only did the treatments not work but I fell in the office right after getting injections..The assistant asked me " How do you feel "I said fine" she said, " Can you get up?" I replied " Yes" I stood up and then fell on the floor so hard that I broke my toe ,I had contusions in the pelvic area. After my fall I asked for an incident report, guy that helped me off the floor asked me, " for what"? When I felt steady enough I left the office hurting far worse than I came. Awhile later, I came back for another treatment.I talked to the doctor about the fall, and I never saw or heard from him again, at one point I called the office but never got a return call.I felt then and I feel now I should be compensated for my pain and suffering, January 9, 2025 will be 2 years the MOST AWEFUL EXPERIENC, so please be careful, the Assistant should have been standing on the side of me, I never should've been asked to get up without assistance after a procedure like that, it was NEGIIGENT, and the ONLY ONE SUFFERED WAS ME, the patient|First time that I went there. Very good staff, but the new Dr hired Vania Fernandez has been my specialist by year and believe she is the best doctor that your  institution could hire.  She is gonna be an amazing asset and Florida Spine is very lucky to have her, also the rest of the staff is friendly and very courteous. Great place to get relief and help

column2: Pain Management Physicians of South Florida
column3:
Pain Management Physicians of South Florida provides comprehensive pain relief solutions in Coral Springs. Our specialized clinic focuses on treating chronic pain conditions with personalized care plans. Led by Dr. Andrew Goldberg, M.D., our practice combines advanced interventional techniques with medication management to address various pain disorders.

At PMPSF, we offer targeted treatments for back pain, neck pain, joint pain, and neuropathic conditions. Our interventional procedures include epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation. We develop individualized treatment strategies based on each patient's specific needs and medical history.

About Dr. Andrew Goldberg

Dr. Goldberg brings extensive experience in pain medicine to our Coral Springs clinic. Board-certified in pain management, he completed specialized training in interventional techniques. Dr. Goldberg stays current with the latest pain management advances to provide evidence-based care. His approach emphasizes minimally invasive procedures and multimodal pain management strategies.

Patient-Centered Approach

Our clinic prioritizes comprehensive evaluations to identify pain sources accurately. We collaborate with patients to establish realistic treatment goals. Our team provides education about pain conditions and self-management techniques. We coordinate care with other specialists when necessary for optimal outcomes.

Location and Contact Information

Pain Management Physicians of South Florida is conveniently located at 8880 Royal Palm Blvd, Suite 103, Coral Springs, FL 33065. New patients can schedule consultations by calling +1 954-975-8233. For more information about our services and to access patient resources, visit our website at https://pmpsf.com/.

We accept most major insurance plans and offer flexible scheduling options. Our office features modern facilities with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment equipment. The clinic provides a comfortable environment designed for patients with mobility challenges.

column40:
I made an appointment with Dr Sharma in August. When my husband and I arrived at her office on the morning of his appointment we were told very abruptly that she was no longer treating patients with pain pumps. It was totally unprofessional and very disrespectful especially since the appointment was confirmed the day before. I do not understand how a doctors office can be so unreliable. I wouldn't recommend her or her offices. That is no way to treat anyone.|Dr. Sharma and staff are so amazing! It's not often you find an office where BOTH the Doctor and staff are great,  but this one is the exception. Everyone is so thoughtful and caring.  From the moment you walk in,
you feel that.  The wait time was non existent, yet Dr. Sharma spends time to really get to know your issues.  She HEARS you and conveys that she cares. I have been to many doctors due to MS, and  I feel that this office is the best I have ever been to.  In a world where most offices are part of huge parent companies, this office gives you that feeling of the family doctor that knows and cares about their patients. I highly recommend this office for anyone that has unresolved pain issues. I am blessed to have found them.|I loved my former pain management doctor, and didn't want to lose him, however, I'm very pleased with Dr Sharma and the staff. Dr Sharma is kind, professional, and really listens. Thank you!|This doctor's (Dr Sharma) office is truly the best I have been to since my cancer began, 4 years ago.  Trust me I have had my share of Drs!  I have had more than a few that I left because the service was awful, especially front desk who should be the first to provide empathy! It's not like we are there to buy a burger.
This office, I am so humble to say that from the moment you enter, till the moment you leave (with pain and all) you are smiling.  Dr. Sharma prescribed pain meds that worked until Ins approved the procedure.
Fast forward, I had the procedure & yesterday was my follow up & I was so happy to visit my Dr. Sharma who scheduled another treatment and I've never been soooo happy since my cancer journey began.  Cancer is awful but what's worse is the damage treatments do to your body.
Dr. Sharma/staff if you are reading this, THANK YOU SOOO MUCH!!!!
Elizabeth C|Dr. Kavita Sharma is a very caring person/doctor who totally cares about her patients. She is in no rush with you and takes her time to sit and talk with you about everything. She explains everything to you and truly cares!! I would highly recommend her to anyone who needs help.... She takes her oath to heart, and now a days that's a very rare occasion. God bless her for taking care of me|Dr Lee is a great listener who proposes remedies AND asks me what I think. He has helped me a lot. The office staff is always nice and appointments are made in a reasonable time. The wait has never been bad.|Dr. Sharma was thorough and told me everything that she was going to do. She is very sweet and caring. I would definitely recommend her to anyone that needs pain management.|I am a medical professional and had the pleasure of seeing Dr. Lee who is the new Pain Management Physician in this office. Dr. Lee is personable, professional, well trained and extremely knowledgeable.  I presented with a bursitis in my right hip that Dr. Lee immediately diagnosed and fit me into his busy schedule for an immediate injection to relieve my discomfort.

My wife has previously seen Dr. Lee for a chronic back pain issue and related a similar experience.  I highly recommend Dr. Lee who is taking over for Dr. Goldberg.

column2: Pain Management Consultants of Southwest Florida, PL
column3:
Pain Management Consultants of Southwest Florida, PL provides comprehensive care for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions in Fort Myers. Our specialized clinic delivers state-of-the-art interventional pain management services designed to address the source of your pain, not just mask symptoms. With fellowship-trained physicians who hold dual board certifications in both pain medicine and anesthesiology, we offer expert treatment tailored to each patient's unique needs.

Our Specialized Services

We provide a broad spectrum of advanced pain management solutions including:

- Interventional pain procedures

- Regenerative medicine treatments

- Comprehensive pain evaluations

- Customized treatment plans

- Non-surgical pain relief options

Our approach focuses on identifying and treating the underlying causes of chronic pain conditions. By addressing pain at its source, we help patients minimize pain's impact on daily activities and work toward restoring functionality.

Expert Physician Team

The physicians at Pain Management Consultants of Southwest Florida bring extensive training and experience to every patient interaction. Their dual board certifications in anesthesiology and pain medicine ensure you receive care from specialists who understand pain's complex nature. This specialized expertise allows our team to develop effective treatment strategies for even the most challenging pain conditions.

Patient-Centered Approach

Our ultimate goal extends beyond pain reduction. We strive to help patients return to more functional, productive lifestyles by:

- Developing personalized treatment plans

- Utilizing the latest pain management techniques

- Focusing on long-term pain relief solutions

- Improving overall quality of life

Visit Our Fort Myers Location

Located conveniently at 7964 Summerlin Lakes Dr, Fort Myers, FL 33907, our clinic welcomes patients throughout Southwest Florida. Call 239-333-1177 to schedule your consultation and take the first step toward effective pain management.

Learn more about our services at [www.treatingpain.com/fort-myers](https://www.treatingpain.com/fort-myers/?utm_source=google&utm_medium=local&utm_campaign=fort-myers)
column11: We pride ourselves in providing state-of-the-art care for chronic pain conditions. Our physicians are fellowship trained and dual board certified in pain medicine and anesthesiology offering a broad range of interventional pain management services and regenerative medicine. Our ultimate goal is to treat the source of your chronic pain when possible to minimize its impact on your quality of life and help you return to a more functional and productive lifestyle. Call for an appointment in Fort Myers.
column38: Sean|pildrib|Michelle Rhodes|Deanne Myers|Katina Combee|Sonny Youderian|steve panico|Chelsea Clarke
column40:
Dr Shuster is  an amazing Doctor he listens to you, he cares about you, he talks to you about all your issues, and answers questions patiently . His injections are flawless, I believe his ARNP is Janine, she is very compassionate and has plethora of knowledge. The staff has always been great, there's a young man downstairs at the Ft Myers office that is always eager to help and patient with even the most rude people. With every good review there is a bad one. Melynda . No empathy only apathy. Talked down to me in a way I've never experienced in a medical facility . Rude , condescending, she's angry , on my way out she was treating staff like children. I was treated like a drug seeker by simply asking what were some medication options , I've been in pain mgmt for several years.
Minimized my pain without looking at all my MRI reports. Saying things like oh it's not too bad , it's just a "small" herniated disc. These are subjective complaints, the real problem was falsifying my medical records. She left the room and came back within 3 minutes with her typed up version of my appt. Saying she examined me, she never touched me. Put down she scolded me for being on benzodiazepines without authorization I'm not on that med it's never been prescribed . Saying she warned me to stop taking more than the daily dose of my medication or I could be kicked out of pain mgmt, I told her I often feel like I need to take more but I don't. I'm worried that this false information could hurt me in the future with anything medical related , I'm a disable combat Vet the VA is very strict I could lose benefits if I'm believed to be a drug abuser. It's unethical to carelessly put false info in a medical record. Avoid this PA-C . I'm only writing the review to warn people, I'm not looking for admonishment.|Kirsti Hoag went beyond the call of duty to reschedule my appointment that was cancelled and put me on a waiting list. She called later that same day and was able to get spot even earlier. It's not just that... it's her sincerity and presence of mind when I arrived. Her kindness will be remembered by me...

I so wish, that there were more like her and Dr. Mahaney's staff in the healthcare industry. This world seems to have forgotten that that level of humanity only breeds more unselfishness. I left the office with hope because Kirsti and the staff have such heart and I think it put a slight glow in mine.

I look SO forward to being pain-free.|Been trying for 3 days to cancel my appointment for February 6th. Because I am a new patient they keep telling me I had to go through different people. Was connected to 3 different people and they still refused to cancel my appointment. Told me that I had to be connected to a 4th person. I got pissed off after being on the phone 25 minutes and hung up. Just  better not charge me if I don't show up or they will see me in court and pay me for my aggravation.I have worked in the medical field and this is not the way to treat a new patient.|I had a total hip replacement on 10/23 by Dr. Alden. From the very beginning of the process of deciding to move forward with plans for surgery, Dr. Alden and his staff took time to answer my questions and communicate next steps. My recovery after surgery went well, and I would highly recommend Dr. Alden if you are considering hip replacement. It is only 7 weeks past surgery and I feel like I have my life back! Thank you Dr. Alden!|I have being seeing Dr Micovic for about 3 years.  I love him. I recently had a pain stimulator put in. That really has not went as we hoped for. Dr Micovic is a great doctor,  but then I was told I needed to see the ARNP, that I couldn't see Dr Micovic,  all after a pain stimulator implant. Well she was horrible to say it the nice way.  And now about the past 3 to 6  months forget talking to someone when you call and need something. My prescriptions are not sent in, prior authorization are not done, you go without medication. You see a doctor and you discuss your medication and he says he will send them. Well forget that and then no one will answer or call and help you. I saw him Tuesday at 8am, it's Friday evening and no medication at the pharmacy. And the staff are just down right rude and nasty these days. They are causing more stress on me and making my condition worse. Due to this even though I have an awesome doctor, I am now looking for another clinic due to the staff. And this happens 3 months after the doctor implants a device in my back. I'm not happy with this at all. And because of the on going issues with the staff I do not recommend this clinic. Doctor is great,  but you have to have a great TEAM to go with it or it just doesn't work.
Very sad things have come to this point.|Absolutely my best medical experience. From the extremely knowledgeable Dr. Acosta to his professional staff, I continue to experience terrific visits.|Dr.  Acosta is the best pain management doctor I have ever had! Been with him four years and still he treats me with the upmost respect. He is professional and spends the time I need to answer the questions I have! Never ever feel rushed! The girls at the front desk are always pleasant. Nick, his right hand man is just so personable and helpful makes me feel comfortable and I have never seen him without a smile! I could not be happier there! I would give them a ten if I could! Thank You Dr. Acosta|I am a life enrichment director at a local retirement home. A resident of mine had a 3pm appointment, he was late on account of our transportation running behind schedule. He called ahead of time to let the doctor know he would be late, and he was told he had a 15 minute window or they could not see him. We pulled into the parking lot at 3:12, and he walked in the doors at 3:13. He was still told that they could not see him, even though he made it within the 15 minute window. The same resident has waited over an hour to see the doctor before. Now, even though he is in excruciating pain due to a torn ligament, he can't be see until September 11th, which is multiple weeks away.

column40:
Had an appointment scheduled for 9:30 because my husband has extensive medical complications and wanted to let them know we'd finish at the office. We arrived by 9 to have paperwork done by the 9:30 appointment time, the appointment coordinator decided to change his appointment to 10:30 and not let us know. So we sat in the office for an hour no one bothered to let us know. My husband is immunocompromised and shouldn't sit in a tiny office exposed to illnesses. The rest of the appointment was great.|I always have a good visit with you and your office family.  I cancelled the last visit erroneously, though. I have recently changed medical plans, and I surmised that I must seek an authorization from my new plan...  So now I have a new appointment, and fortunately, I will not need meds till then.  But I am long overdue my cortisone injections.  It's a super pain to get around, lately.|Dr. Peterson is the most compassionate physician that I have ever had. He listens and takes as much time with me as needed each and every month ensuring that all bases and needs are covered. He is so incredibly knowledgeable and cares for his patient's well-being as if we were his own family, Dr. Peterson literally keeps me alive, and for that I could never thank him enough.|Have always paid out of pocket $1,500 for RFA and no pain medication with 3 back fusions. If you don't check in by phone they automatically cancel your appointment for RFA! Than tell nothing they can do around the holidays because both the PA and doctor are out  even though I was scheduled to do an RFA but the scheduler never matches up with date and tell you it's your problem. They  will not transfer you to another doctor! Save your money go somewhere else! All they want is your money!  Merry Christmas hope everyone goes to another doctor where the staff actually cares when you pay!|Dr. Stone is considerate and empathetic towards my pain issues. He listened and advised me as to the next steps. He is kind, caring and understanding.|Dr Peterson  listens and explains very well ,so you will understand why you have that problem.He also accepts your wishes if you do not like some procedure and tries to find another method to help you getting you life more comfortable.
For my short experience with Dr in the US , he was the first Dr who looked in my MRI Umganges infront me. Most Dr just read reports. Yes I am very satisfied with him|I thought Dr. Stone was very knowledgeable. He spent time listening to my actual issues and I think we have a great plan moving forward. I would recommend him to anyone in pain.|Florida Pain Medicine Zephyrhills are great - knowledgeable staff, compassionate and listen to their patients needs answering all questions. Dr. Stone is a physician you can trust.

column3:
Pain Care Specialists of Florida provides comprehensive pain management services at their Hollywood clinic. Located at 4350 Sheridan St #102, Hollywood, FL 33021, the practice delivers personalized treatment plans for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. Their board-certified physicians combine advanced interventional techniques with medication management to address the root causes of pain.

The clinic offers a wide range of specialized treatments including epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation. Their approach focuses on minimizing medication dependence while maximizing functional improvement. Patients with back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and complex regional pain syndrome find comprehensive care at this location.

Experienced Pain Management Physicians

The medical team brings decades of combined experience in pain medicine. Each physician completed fellowship training in pain management following their anesthesiology residency. This specialized education enables them to accurately diagnose complex pain conditions and develop effective treatment strategies. The doctors regularly participate in continuing education to stay current with the latest pain management advances.

Patient-Centered Approach

Pain Care Specialists of Florida emphasizes individualized care plans tailored to each patient's specific needs. The clinic provides thorough evaluations during initial consultations to understand pain patterns and previous treatments. Their goal is helping patients return to daily activities with improved function and reduced pain levels. Most insurance plans are accepted, including Medicare and workers' compensation cases.

For appointments or questions, patients can call +1 954-322-8586 or visit their website at http://painconsults.com/ to learn more about available services. The Hollywood location offers convenient scheduling options with minimal wait times for new patients seeking pain relief.

column3:
West Coast Health & Wellness Medical Pain Management offers comprehensive pain management solutions in St. Petersburg, Florida. Our clinic specializes in treating chronic pain conditions through personalized treatment plans. Located at 5005 Central Ave, we serve patients throughout Pinellas County with evidence-based pain relief approaches.

Our board-certified physicians provide interventional pain procedures, medication management, and regenerative therapies. We treat conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and sports injuries. Each treatment plan addresses the underlying cause of pain rather than just symptoms.

Our Clinical Approach

At West Coast Health & Wellness, we utilize advanced diagnostic techniques to identify pain sources accurately. Treatment options include:

  • Epidural steroid injections for spinal pain relief

  • Joint injections for arthritis and inflammation

  • Nerve blocks for targeted pain management

  • Radiofrequency ablation for longer-lasting relief

  • Physical therapy integration for functional improvement

  • Medication management with focus on minimizing opioid use

Experienced Medical Team

Our physicians bring over 25 years of combined experience in pain medicine. All doctors are fellowship-trained in interventional pain management with board certifications in anesthesiology or physical medicine. Our team stays current with the latest pain management research and techniques.

Patient-Centered Care

We prioritize patient education and active participation in treatment decisions. New patients receive comprehensive evaluations during their first visit. Our staff coordinates with primary care physicians and specialists for integrated care approaches.

Visit Our St. Petersburg Pain Clinic

West Coast Health & Wellness Medical Pain Management welcomes new patients seeking relief from chronic pain conditions. Contact us at (727) 317-2700 to schedule a consultation. Our clinic is conveniently located at 5005 Central Ave, St. Petersburg, FL 33710. Learn more about our services at www.floridapainfree.com.

Pain Care Florida - Port Saint Lucie provides comprehensive pain management services focused on improving quality of life for residents throughout the Treasure Coast region. Our specialized clinic addresses the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of chronic pain conditions, sports injuries, and debilitating pain issues that impact daily functioning.

At Pain Care Florida, patients receive access to advanced interventional spine and pain medicine treatments utilizing state-of-the-art equipment and targeted approaches. Our pain specialists develop personalized treatment plans addressing various conditions including:

- Back and neck pain

- Joint pain and arthritis

- Neuropathic pain conditions

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in creating comfortable treatment experiences for all patients. Our clinic offers regulated IV sedation during procedures, ensuring comfort throughout the entire treatment process. Each treatment plan is tailored to individual needs with the goal of restoring function and reducing dependency on pain medications.

Advanced Treatment Options

- Minimally invasive spine procedures

So, had an early appointment, got there 6 minutes late due to traffic. One receptionist working with a patient trying to work on appointment dates. Towards the end, an employee came from the back area to talk to that receptionist about an appointment for another man who was in the back room.
By the time the receptionist acknowledged me, it was 15 minutes past my appointment time.
Now she says I'm late, might not be seen, goes to the back, tells me to wait, then says I can be seen at an afternoon time the same day.
1. 6 minutes late originally, and reception with a patient going back and forth with appointments.
2. Only 1 receptionist at front during this time.
3. Seems like you wait in the office at least 10 to 15 minutes before going to a room in the back to wait again for 5+ minutes. All after your scheduled appointment.
4. If your seeing a PA, it's a 3 to 5 minute visit. Why turn the patient away?
This place needs better management,  and train the receptionist staff to be nicer and realize things can happen and be more compassionate to patients in pain.
In all the years going to doctors, this receptionist staff is the worst I have encountered and needs better training. The way they speak to patients is deplorable.|Don't go to this place, they don't give a shit about pain management. If you have emergency work done for teeth or an emergency room vosit for pain they  will report you across the state for abusing drugs and shut you off completely  This is what they do to elderly people who have heart issues, had emergency tooth extractions and a knee replacements.  Make sure you get all your urine work from them for proof.|I saw Dr Jay Kuchera 2 weeks ago. I was greated with such compassion and understanding of my current situation. Dr Jay Kuchera thoroughly explained everything to me. I wish all doctors were as kind as him. I look forward to seeing him and his kind office staff again.|Rating it a 1 is a step up treated me awful
Pt  care .... Dr took me in a room far away wanting me to talk to state people about meds that are crazy and put you through the mill treat you like an addict !!!
I'm 67 my back is gone don't waste your time !!!|Everyone here at this location is very professional and helpful.  Dr. Warsch and his staff have helped me tremendously.  I was bedridden for a month with my back and he has done two injections in my back and it's like night and day and in two weeks will be doing radiation abalation which should  help even more.  I would like to thank his assistant and Heather and Cheryl.  You have helped me so much with my head pain, shoulder pain and back pain.  I highly recommend you to anyone who is looking for relief.  I have so much faith in you that when we move to N.C. I would drive back here to see you because I trust you.  Thank you again|I've been going here for a little over a year now and I have always been treated professionally. It starts the minute I step up to the check in desk and there is Delores who always greets me with a smile and asks how I'm doing, then when I go to a room the girl's who take my blood pressure, to finally the Doctor or Nurse, wether it's for an Injection or to get my medication refilled everyone is always nice and polite. My only dislike would be the wait to get into a room (pretty much like any other Doctor's office) but on more than 1 occasion my wait has been over an hour! They did keep apologizing and the reason was the Nurse or Doctor I had the appt. for called out. But overall they had treated me very well.|IN Pain BEWARE!!!.. It's important to share my feedback to others can be aware of the challenges will be faced with PAIN CARE a month ago. I am looking to emphasize my feelings strongly that, PAIN CARE, DOESN'T CARE. I want to stress how deeply disappointed I am with the care provided by PAIN CARE. They consistently fail to answer calls, rely on impersonal voicemail, and exhibit terrible bedside manners. Their communication is secretive and lacks follow-up, leaving patients in unnecessary pain and mental anguish. It feels like they prioritize profit over patient well-being, blaming regulations instead of providing compassionate care. This isn't my first experience with pain management, but it's certainly the worst. Doctors should be in this profession to heal, not to neglect otherwise fine another job. Not all practices are like this, though. I must commend the Front Desk, which deserves recognition for their professionalism, earning 4 stars in my book.|Pain Care Florida (formerly Resolute) has helped me for several years now. I would not be able to function without their care. The doctors, PA's and staff are very thorough with pain issues and treatment. After trying different medications over time I finally found what gives me the best relief along with laying down to take pressure off my back. Be sure to read all the paperwork and guidelines to be sure you can comply.
I highly recommend them!

Pain & Wellness Institute offers comprehensive pain management solutions in Tampa, Florida. Located at 4509 N Armenia Ave, our clinic specializes in treating chronic pain conditions through a multimodal approach that addresses both symptoms and underlying causes. We combine advanced medical interventions with holistic wellness strategies to help patients regain control of their lives.

Our team delivers personalized care for patients suffering from various pain conditions. We excel in treating chronic spine issues, joint pain, accident injuries, and work-related injuries. The Pain & Wellness Institute approach integrates:

  • Minimally invasive pain procedures

  • Nutritional IV therapies for enhanced recovery

  • PRP (Platelet-Rich Plasma) treatments

  • Comprehensive lifestyle coaching

  • Worker's compensation case management

  • Personal injury treatment protocols

Patient-Centered Approach

At Pain & Wellness Institute, we understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of life. Our physicians take time to thoroughly evaluate each patient's condition, developing customized treatment plans that address individual needs. We focus on interventions that minimize medication dependence while maximizing functional improvement.

Conditions We Treat

Our clinical expertise extends to numerous pain conditions including:

  • Back and neck pain

  • Arthritis and joint disorders

  • Neuropathic pain syndromes

  • Sports injuries

  • Auto accident injuries

  • Work-related injuries

  • Fibromyalgia and chronic pain disorders

The Pain & Wellness Institute team combines decades of clinical experience with advanced training in pain medicine. Our physicians stay current with the latest developments in interventional pain management to provide Tampa residents with cutting-edge care options.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation at Pain & Wellness Institute:

Phone: +1 813-873-7777

Address: 4509 N Armenia Ave, Tampa, FL 33603

Website: www.painandwellnessinstitute.com

Experience compassionate care designed to enhance your quality of life. Our Tampa pain management specialists are committed to helping you achieve happier, healthier living through effective pain relief and wellness strategies.

column2: Florida Pain Care: Dr. Daniel Schaffer, MD
column3:
Florida Pain Care is a specialized pain management clinic led by Dr. Daniel Schaffer, MD, dedicated to providing comprehensive pain relief solutions for patients throughout the Clermont area. At our state-of-the-art facility on Citrus Tower Boulevard, we combine advanced interventional procedures with holistic approaches to effectively manage chronic and acute pain conditions.

Our mission at Florida Pain Care centers on delivering the highest quality medical treatment with efficiency and compassion. Dr. Schaffer and our clinical team understand that pain affects every aspect of life, which is why we develop personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's specific needs.

Florida Pain Care utilizes a multidisciplinary strategy that includes:

- Interventional procedures targeting the source of pain

- Physical therapy programs to improve mobility and function

- Customized exercise regimens for long-term pain management

- Nutritional supplementation supporting overall healing

- Durable medical equipment for at-home pain management

This comprehensive approach allows us to effectively address pain while minimizing reliance on opioid medications for many patients.

Dr. Daniel Schaffer's Expertise

Dr. Schaffer brings extensive medical training and specialized experience in pain management techniques. His patient-centered approach focuses on identifying the underlying causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms. Dr. Schaffer stays current with the latest advancements in pain medicine to provide cutting-edge treatments.

Conditions We Treat

Our clinic specializes in managing various pain conditions including:

- Back and neck pain

- Joint pain and arthritis

- Neuropathic pain

- Post-surgical pain

- Sports injuries

- Work-related injuries

Patient-Centered Care

At Florida Pain Care, we prioritize patient education and involvement in treatment decisions. Our team takes time to explain conditions and treatment options thoroughly, ensuring patients understand their care plan. We coordinate with primary care physicians and other specialists when necessary to provide truly comprehensive care.

Visit our clinic at 2749 Citrus Tower Blvd, Clermont, FL 34711, or call us at +1 352-559-0979 to schedule a consultation. Additional information about our services is available on our website: https://flpain.com/
column11: At Florida Pain Care, our mission is to provide patients with the highest quality medical treatment. We define quality as a genuine desire to serve our patients' medical needs with efficiency and compassion. Our philosophy for treating pain includes a comprehensive approach utilizing interventional procedures, physical therapy, exercise, supplementation, and durable medical equipment. This array of options allows us to support patients in addressing their pain while minimizing opioid needs for many types of pain control.

column3:
Paincare Florida - Pembroke Pines provides comprehensive pain management solutions for residents throughout South Florida. Our dedicated team at Interventional Pain Physicians of South Florida specializes in treating both acute and chronic pain conditions using evidence-based approaches. Located conveniently at 601 N Flamingo Rd #207 in Pembroke Pines, our clinic serves as a trusted resource for patients seeking lasting relief.

Our board-certified physicians deliver personalized care plans tailored to each patient's unique needs. We utilize advanced diagnostic techniques to identify pain sources accurately. Treatment options include:

Interventional procedures for targeted pain relief

Medication management with careful monitoring

Physical therapy coordination for functional improvement

Minimally invasive techniques to reduce recovery time

Conditions We Treat

The clinical team at Paincare Florida addresses a wide spectrum of pain conditions including:

Back and neck pain from various causes

Joint pain affecting mobility and function

Neuropathic pain requiring specialized approaches

Post-surgical pain management

Work-related injuries and rehabilitation needs

Our goal extends beyond symptom management. We focus on restoring function, improving quality of life, and helping patients return to normal work capacity and daily activities.

Patient-Centered Approach

Each treatment plan begins with a thorough evaluation of your medical history, pain patterns, and functional limitations. We believe in educating patients about their conditions and treatment options. Our physicians take time to answer questions and address concerns during each visit.

The clinic maintains strong relationships with referring physicians, ensuring coordinated care across specialties when needed. We accept most major insurance plans and work to make pain management accessible.

Contact us at +1 954-433-8711 to schedule a consultation or visit our website at [www.flpainrelief.com](http://www.flpainrelief.com/) for more information about our services and approach to pain management.
column11: Interventional Pain Physicians of South Florida helps patients with acute and chronic pain find relief. We are committed to delivering the highest standard of care by evaluating the needs of each patient and developing individualized, comprehensive treatment strategies to restore function, improve quality of life and return to normal work capacity and activities of daily living.

column40:
I went for my first visit with Dr Erickson today and was very pleased with her interest in my pain level and management.  I like that in addition to pain medication she also suggested vitamins and supplements to manage my swelling, as well as Tai Chi to improve range of motion and decrease swelling.  The office staff is very professional and nice.  Office is clean and orderly.|This was my second visit to this facility. This time I saw DJ the Nurse Practitioner. Same great attitude, professionalism and eagerness to assist. Lots of great options to make my quality of life better. I remain OPTIMISTIC and Enthusiasm about God  using this group of professionals to help me.
Thank you,
Mrs K Peter|A very professional, respectful office that takes time to explain procedures and reviews your health records to help you. I would definitely refer friends and family for the quality care they treat you with. This office had made my life better by reducing my back pain by performing procedures to decreasing this pain. Thank you so much! I feel very comfortable and safe with Dr Erickson !|Dr. Nancy really listens to you and tries to find all the ways possible to get you back to 100%. She's super welcoming and  I love that she recommends vitamins that help with things as well instead of just big pharm pills. She really cares about her patients and you can tell. Also the front desk staff and the MAs are super welcoming and amazing. 100/10 if i could. Best doctor i've had so far and i've only had one visit so far. Also love that her faith is so strong. you can feel it the moment you walk into the office and as a christian myself it's very awesome and heartwarming to see.

Only complaint i have though is i went in on wednesday (11/27/24) and they were going to send medication for my pain( have severe back pain due to a horrible car accident i had in 2015 where they had to dig me out of the car). Well i called the pharmacy and no medications were called in. and then i called the office but due to it being after 4:30 i got the after hours lady and she said i had to wait till monday (12/2/24)

So i went 5 days in 9/10-10/10 pain due to my medication not being called in. And mind you my appt was at 9:30am.But i understand we are human and mistakes happen.

Aside from that amazing staff and an amazing provider.|As usual everyone was caring and professional with a smile . Gaelle was very kind and considerate showing her concern about my pain spasms. DJ Linder, Dr. Erickson's assistant was understanding and helpful ,  finding a way to expedite my medication requests.
Thank you for all you do, I'm so glad to be a patient of Paincare Florida. Many blessings to all.|Mom has stage 4 gastric cancer with a liver metastasis, we went to many pain management doctors and none were able to help her. I finally made an appointment with Erickson and she understood from day one, from day 1 she adjusted and increased everything for mom. She understood certain medications didn't cover as much as doctors thought. She added and subtracted a few, and mom now is able to enjoy life a little more and better. She's active again, that was her main concern. Although we know her days are counted, we also know that God is in control and what better than to have a provider who not only cares for her patients, but also prays for her patients.
Dr. Erickson has been a true blessing to mom and all of us as a family.

Thank you, Dr. Erickson !|Dr. Erickson is a great person and a wonderful doctor.  I know her as a patient for more than 15 yrs. She cares about her patients and explains everything that's going to take place if you choose to stay awake during the pain injection process and not get anesthesia during a procedure. Frankly, in my opinion it's better to opt to be awake because the whole process take 3 to 5 seconds.  It's a bit uncomfortable but quickly goes away within nano seconds. Otherwise, you have to follow the process as if you had full blown surgery. It takes more time for the prep with pre-op than the actual procedure. You can't eat or drink after midnight and can't drive yourself to and from the hospital. The heart undressed to have an I V so they can give you the anesthesia. Then come out have a snack get dressed and wait for someone to drive you home. This all takes between 2 to 4 hours depending on how many patients that day and where you are inline for the O R.
Without anesthesia it's done in the office for the time it takes having a regular visit. Even if you have to go to outpatient surgical centers onto insurance coverage, it's still much quicker because there's no prep time.
Dr Erickson uses a machine called the Florescope which tells her how well the medication took throughout your targeted area of pain. So it's very precise. She's witty, & wise.
She jokes around and makes you feel comfortable.
Dr. Erickson also suggests some wholistic ways to curtail pain as well.   If your consistent in attendance and follow
Dr. Erickson suggestions, you will maintain a tolerable level to function better on a day to day basis.|Great experience always staff very professional and attentive to patients needs Dr Nancy Erickson is an awesome doctor always satisfied with service!

Florida Pain Physicians serves Jacksonville, FL and surrounding areas as a premier pain management clinic since 2000. Our specialized team delivers comprehensive care for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. We focus on minimally invasive procedures that effectively target neck, back, and joint pain without extensive recovery times. Our approach combines advanced diagnostic techniques with personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's specific needs.

At our St. Augustine location, we offer a complete range of pain management solutions including epidural injections, facet joint injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and dorsal root ganglion stimulation. These procedures target the source of pain rather than simply masking symptoms. Our physicians specialize in treating complex conditions such as herniated discs, sciatica, arthritis, and neuropathic pain.

Our Expert Medical Team

Our clinic features highly skilled physicians and surgeons with extensive training in interventional pain management. Each doctor brings specialized expertise in identifying and treating the underlying causes of chronic pain. With decades of combined experience, our medical professionals stay current with the latest advancements in pain management techniques and technologies.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in creating individualized treatment plans that address each patient's unique pain profile. During your consultation, our specialists will conduct a thorough evaluation to understand your pain history, previous treatments, and goals. This comprehensive assessment helps us develop the most effective strategy for long-term pain relief.

Located at 206 Ashourian Ave Ste 209, St. Augustine, FL 32092, our clinic is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities for diagnosing and treating various pain conditions. Contact us at +1 904-800-7246 to schedule your consultation and take the first step toward effective pain management. For more information about our services, visit floridapainphysician.com.

For more information, contact Florida Pain Physicians in St. Augustine, FL.

column2: Robert Guirguis, DO - Pain Management Specialist | PPOA
column3:
Physician Partners of America (PPOA) features Dr. Robert Guirguis, DO, a dedicated Pain Management Specialist serving Saint Petersburg and surrounding Pinellas County communities. At our Pinellas Park location, Dr. Guirguis provides comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs.

About Dr. Robert Guirguis

Dr. Guirguis earned his medical degree from the prestigious New York College of Osteopathic Medicine in Long Island. His extensive training in osteopathic medicine gives him a distinctive approach to pain management. He combines traditional medical treatments with holistic techniques to address both symptoms and underlying causes of chronic pain.

Our Pain Management Services

At PPOA, we offer a wide range of interventional pain management treatments:

- Spinal Cord Stimulation for persistent back and leg pain

- Joint Injections to reduce inflammation and improve mobility

- Epidural Steroid Injections for herniated discs and spinal stenosis

- Radiofrequency Ablation for long-lasting nerve pain relief

- Medication Management with personalized treatment plans

- Physical Therapy coordination for comprehensive care

Conditions We Treat

Dr. Guirguis specializes in treating various painful conditions including:

- Chronic back and neck pain

- Sciatica and radicular pain

- Arthritis and joint pain

- Post-surgical pain

- Complex Regional Pain Syndrome (CRPS)

- Neuropathic pain disorders

Patient-Centered Approach

Our clinic prioritizes patient education and involvement in treatment decisions. Dr. Guirguis takes time to explain pain sources and treatment options. We develop individualized care plans focusing on improving function and quality of life while minimizing medication dependence.

Visit Our Clinic

Located at 6449 102nd Ave N, Pinellas Park, FL 33782, our modern facility offers convenient access for Saint Petersburg residents. New patients are welcome, and most insurance plans are accepted.

Contact us today: Call (727) 350-0450 to schedule your consultation with Dr. Guirguis and take the first step toward effective pain management.

Website: [www.physicianpartnersofamerica.com/doctor/florida-fl/robert-guirguis-do/](https://www.physicianpartnersofamerica.com/doctor/florida-fl/robert-guirguis-do/)

column40: Dr Guirguis is wonderful. He listens and hears your pain problems and offers good solutions. You can trust him.. The only complaint I have is that it is nearly impossible to get a call through to his office.  Calls go to a corporate switchboard. When they call his office, staff never answer the phones.  If there urgency it is vexing and takes days to get through and get a response. Very upsetting and worrying.|I've been Dr. Guirguis' patient for nearly a decade. I am so lucky to have found him! He is so wonderful. He listens, he gives opinions and recommendations. He truly cares. My favorite doctor, by far! I cannot recommend him enough.|Dr. Robert Gurguis is the epitome of the type of pain management or even someone with chronic health issues who needs to have someone in his/her corner rely on. He is not just a pain management physician, he truly cares about every single one of his patients. I have never once felt intimidated or as if I could not be honest with him about my conditions, my pain, my treatments, and what does or doesn't work. Before I found the specialists through Advent North Pinellas that I have and that includes being referred to Dr. Robert Gurguis of Physician Partners of America and Dr. Kammath of Florida Cancer Specialist's by the attending Advent Hospitalist during my April/May Hospitalization, of last year, I was beginning to lose hope in the medical system and even some of the doctors that I no longer see. I no longer feel like I don't have a voice, and I feel every doctor, specialist, my PC and Dr. Gurguis & Dr. Kammath a make a great team handling my care & have helped me find my voice to navigate through some of my health struggles. I am truly blessed to have the doctors I currently have, and would refer anyone to any of them, especially Dr. Gurguis. His bedside manner, his "leave no stone unturned approach" has me being a fan of his forever!|I have been going here for 4 years and have been seeing Doctor Gurguis only the past year. He is a doctor with wonderful bedside manners,cares about his patients does not rush you out the door and if you have questions he answers them in the way you can understand.I will be having a procedure done by Dr. Gurguis Jan 30th 2025 and I have never had any sort of back surgery done before or any surgery at all. I feel comfortable enough to let him perform this procedure call the M I L D which has to do with repairing a nerve in the back . He assured me that almost all people that have this procedure are happy with the outcome and last because the nerve takes a very long time to grow back . I should be very satisfied with this procedure and their is really no down time or scare and it is an out patient procedure. I do wish that my insurance or Medicare would pay for the anesthesia,they stopped paying for it a few years ago . I will try to update after my procedure but if anyone has had this MILD procedure please feel free to leave me comments I would greatly appreciate it. The staff at the off and surgical center are also wonderful I have always had kind staff members and pleasant. Happy Holidays to all as difficult as it may be . Be blessed with family and friends aroun,d that's all we need in these difficult times .|Dr. Guirguis is wonderful. He listens to what you are saying and  tackles your pain issues . If it wasn't for Dr.Guirguis my quality of life would be poorly. I recommend him very highly to anyone having pain issues in their bodies. I have been fortunate to have him as my Doctor since 2008. I been to other pain management places and they are nowhere near like Dr. Guirguis and his team|I absolutely love him and his office manager Ashley!!! Advanced Pain Clinic, PA offers comprehensive pain management services in Kissimmee, Florida. Our medical team specializes in treating chronic and acute pain conditions using evidence-based approaches. Located at 505 W Vine St UNIT 301, we serve patients throughout Osceola County with personalized care plans designed to improve quality of life.

At Advanced Pain Clinic, we provide interventional procedures and medical management for various pain conditions. Our treatments include epidural steroid injections, joint injections, nerve blocks, and medication management. We focus on minimally invasive techniques to reduce recovery time and maximize pain relief.

Conditions We Treat

Our clinic addresses numerous pain conditions including:

  • Back and neck pain

  • Sciatica and radicular pain

  • Arthritis and joint pain

  • Neuropathic pain

  • Post-surgical pain

  • Work-related injuries

  • Sports injuries

  • Complex regional pain syndrome

Our Approach to Pain Management

We believe in multimodal treatment strategies that address pain at its source. Each treatment plan is customized based on thorough evaluation and diagnostic testing. Our goal is functional improvement alongside pain reduction, helping patients return to daily activities.

Our Medical Team

Our board-certified physicians have extensive training in pain medicine and anesthesiology. With over 20 years of combined experience, our doctors completed fellowships at prestigious institutions specializing in interventional pain techniques. Their expertise ensures patients receive the highest standard of care using the latest medical advances.

Patient-Centered Care

We prioritize patient education and shared decision-making. Our team takes time to explain conditions and treatment options thoroughly. New patients typically receive comprehensive evaluations during their first visit, with treatment beginning promptly after diagnosis.

Visit Our Clinic

Advanced Pain Clinic welcomes new patients seeking relief from chronic pain. We accept most major insurance plans and offer convenient scheduling options.

Contact Information:

Phone: +1 407-935-9404

Website: https://clinicformypain.com/

Address: 505 W Vine St UNIT 301, Kissimmee, FL 34741, United States

I would recommend them to anyone with pain problems.|I am extremely happy with the outstanding care and great customer service that I have received at Florida Medical Pain Management over the past two years. They explain everything in great detail and follow up with you post procedure. The office and surgical areas are immaculate. Furthermore, they are extremely accommodating and ensure you get an appointment very quickly. I highly recommend them to my family and friends.|This place was a waste of time and money, I live in Spring Hill, they told me the day before my appointment time which I had to wait 2 weeks for to see a Real  doctor and not a PA.
Because their doctor decided not to show, I had to drive to New Port Richey supposedly to see a doctor.   I was charged $50 for  urine test and pay my copay.
After seeing the PA instead of a doctor which they promised, he told me I had to talk to a psychologist which was another $60 co-pay.
Do you only reason for talking to a psychologist is if they were going to give you pain medicin and shots.
After talking with the psychologist. He recommended pain medicine, just not as much as I was originally taken.
However, just to find out what they were going to give me I had to make another appointment For another $60 to see somebody in Spring Hill.  When I got there the PA Told me Stephen, the PA in Newport Richy did not recommend pain medicine.

So they were just willing to give me shots.
Personally, I think they're crooks,  Why did I have to pay for a urine test? Why did I have to pay for a psychologist? and why did have to make a 3rd Appointment to see another PA that I can't get relief.

If shots work for u and u don't need a real doctor, go for it but this place just looks for ways of charging you.
Ps.  I had to drive to New Port Richey twice and when I got there the 2nd time which is almost an hour they canceled my appointment and set me up for the Spring Hill office.

I would love to go after them for the urine test and the psychologist appointment.
Apparently they knew ahead of time, and I did not need either test.

I hope this helps people,
Kathy|Horrible experience. I started going there and after several appointments then they set up injections which I had to do two test sets of after I did the first I had called in to check on a refill on my prescription for pain meds and I spoke to the office manager and she canceled my appointment when I made no such request. When I showed up for my appointment for my next injection they said, "oh your appointment was canceled" they never called me and told me that the appointment was canceled and then I was upset because they did this and I was told that the office manager did it which upset me even more since I never mentioned canceling my appointment and I asked if the calls were recorded and the person I spoke to said yes, they were. A few days later I got a letter or an email from them saying that I was discharged from the practice and nobody called me back about my experience there I will never go to this place again I would not recommend it to anybody who does not want to be mistreated.|The Dr office staff The nurses are awesome they help you with questions about paperwork and questions about your conditions they explain what procedures they are going to do going home instruction I'll recommend them to anyone the office bathroom patient waiting room the whole office is nice and clean and smells great keep up the good work|I don't like being bullied either they change your appointments say they called  and you never received anything. Central Florida Pain Management is a specialized clinic dedicated to treating chronic pain conditions with a personalized approach. Located in The Villages, Florida, our team combines skill, patience, empathy, and up-to-date medical knowledge to develop comprehensive treatment plans that improve patients' quality of life.

At Central Florida Pain Management, we understand that pain affects each person differently. Our physicians take time to evaluate your specific condition, medical history, and lifestyle factors to create individualized treatment strategies. We focus on both immediate pain relief and long-term management solutions to help patients regain function and improve daily activities.

Conditions We Treat

Our specialists have extensive experience treating various pain conditions, including:

- Back and neck pain

- Joint pain and arthritis

- Neuropathic pain

- Sciatica

- Complex regional pain syndrome

- Post-surgical pain

- Cancer-related pain

Treatment Options

We offer a comprehensive range of interventional and non-interventional treatments:

- Medication management

- Nerve blocks and injections

- Spinal cord stimulation

- Physical therapy coordination

- Minimally invasive procedures

Why Choose Central Florida Pain Management

Our physicians combine years of specialized training with ongoing education in the latest pain management techniques. We prioritize building trusting relationships with our patients, taking time to listen and understand your pain experience. Our goal is helping you return to activities you enjoy with reduced pain and improved function.

Visit Our Office

Address: 1503 Buenos Aires Blvd Suite 150, The Villages, FL 32159, United States

Phone: +1 352-750-5882

column40:
This company is so lazy all the responses are generic!! The rudest front staff!!!!! I took my mother there a recent amputee and we traveled over an hour to get there we rolled in 8 min late. My mother apologized for being a little behind and the lady behind the desk didn't even say hello. She proceeded to condescend to her and berate her about how big of a deal it was she is 8 min late. What she said wasn't wrong we were late, but there needs to be a level of respect and dignity offered to your patrons(the people they serve). It was one of the rudest encounters I have ever experienced. If she is not able to act professional and treat people with dignity and respect she shouldn't be sitting in the front.|To start with ' I gave them all my information and ask them to order my records before I come there from virgina , then when I get there they forced me to take a piss test when all the only thing im there for it is injections in my neck #2  they never got any of my information or records  that i asked to get ! #3 they still charged me a copay for nothing to but  make me take a piss test aginst my will  i passed but still -when I do not want any of their medicines just an injection in my neck no pills !
Number 4  everyone was kind of rude at first #5 they wanted me to go get MRIs X-rays and all this stuff done and I looked at them and said why don't you just order my records I just had them done a few months ago since I've been crippled for the last 11 years you might want to order everything from Virginia ?
after that they said they would but so far they haven't I got to find somewhere else to go .|Worse practice. From office staff to Doctor. I just had a double keen repacment on1/6/2025. Office manager,  maggie called mand told me that I must come in and be seen by Dr. Wei. I said I could not because I Can't walk or drive.  Sh insisted that I come in and be seen. What about a telemetry conference. That was never brought up. I TOLD Maggie what Dr Wei could do with th Rx which included profanity and where the Dr could stick the Rx|I cannot say enough good things about this practice. Dr. Wei has always been accessible to answer questions and will take time to discuss a plan for my pain. I typically meet with Krestana, Nurse Practitioner. She is so companionate, knowledgeable and will give me suggestions on over-the-counter medicine that can help with pain management. She also will take as much time as needed for my appointments. And I can't forget about the front office personnel. They do a fabulous job with sign ins, bill payments and new appointment scheduling.  People in pain understand how important it is to find a pain management practice that isn't quick to push pills at you but find solutions to elevate your pain.  Thank you so much for all you do, If I could give a higher rating than 5 stars I would.|Upon walking in the door, you're greeted by Mateo.  After a very short wait, Angela brings you into a room and takes vitals.  Kres is always prompt, professional and is interested in your status.  Catherine cheerfully sets up your next appointment.   Would recommend to neighbors.|Dr. Wei and NP Krestana have been amazing. They listen to my concerns. They always make me feel like I am respected. It is hard to find providers that actually take the time to talk to you. It is very important to have that especially when it comes to pain management. The office staff has also been very nice too! Whether it be during the check in or out process or calling for whatever need you may have. Not many people enjoy going to the doctor's office but at least they make it a pleasant experience. Thank you for being genuine human beings and caring for others.|I am a long time patient at this practice. I started with Dr. Euribe.  I believe with all my heart that the long time people would have dropped out it it wasn't for the front office employees. I can't tell you the amount of time Nancy has helped me. All of the woman I have encountered have bee excellent. I appreciate their ability to listen carefully so I could be taken care of quickly and always with a smile in their voice. Or a smile in their eyes. Soon I hope I can see smiles on their faces.|No compassion. Pain management with just injection. Doesn't care your in pain.

column3:
Florida Spine & Pain Specialists, led by Dr. Nomen Azeem, provides comprehensive pain management services in Riverview, Florida. Our clinic specializes in treating chronic pain conditions through minimally invasive procedures and personalized treatment plans. Patients throughout the Tampa Bay area seek our expertise for back pain, neck pain, joint pain, and complex pain syndromes.

At Florida Spine & Pain Specialists, we utilize advanced diagnostic techniques to identify pain sources. Our treatment options include epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and medication management. We focus on improving function and quality of life while reducing reliance on opioid medications.

Meet Dr. Nomen Azeem, MD, FAAPMR

Dr. Azeem is a board-certified interventional pain specialist with extensive training in pain management techniques. He completed his undergraduate education at James Madison University in Harrisonburg, Virginia before earning his Doctor of Medicine from Ross University School of Medicine. His medical training continued with an internship at Medstar Harbor Hospital Center in Baltimore, followed by a residency at Medstar Georgetown University Hospital in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation, where he served as chief resident.

Dr. Azeem's expertise includes treating spine conditions, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndrome. He employs evidence-based approaches tailored to each patient's specific needs.

Conditions We Treat

Our clinic specializes in managing various painful conditions including:

  • Herniated discs and spinal stenosis

  • Sciatica and radicular pain

  • Arthritis and joint pain

  • Neuropathic pain conditions

  • Failed back surgery syndrome

  • Complex regional pain syndrome

  • Neck and shoulder pain

Visit Our Clinic

Florida Spine & Pain Specialists is conveniently located at 9360 Balm Riverview Rd, Riverview, FL 33569. New patients are welcome to schedule a consultation by calling +1 813-333-1353. Learn more about our services at www.flsps.com.
column11:
Nomen Azeem, MD, FAAPMR
About Dr. Nomen Azeem
Dr. Azeem completed his undergraduate education at James Madison University in Harrisonburg, Virginia, and graduated from medical school, earning his Doctor of Medicine from Ross University School of Medicine. After that, he completed an internship at Medstar Harbor Hospital Center in Baltimore and a residency at Medstar Georgetown University Hospital Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation in Washington, DC, where he was the chief resident.
