column40:
Lake Mary staff are professional and caring.  Dr. Maria takes time to listen to issues.  Dr. Salinas is fantastic, very talented doing procedures treating me as an individual.  Thank you.|Staff is friendly and PA's and Doctor is knowledgeable and efficient.  Have had epidurals, cervical facets, and pain shots there over years for fused neck pain.  Although I drive from Mt Dora to Winter Park each month the staff makes it an enjoyable visit.|I just called the on call doctor and her name was Ilene the first thing she said the was did you wake me up because you are in pain. I said excuse me and she repeated  her self. I had to asked her three times who was it I speaking to before she would give me her name. She said if I am in that much pain that I should go into the ER because there was no place to call a prescription into at 1 o'clock in the morning. When I mentioned the 24hr CVS she said she don't think I should take the oral version of the medication that helps and that she could send something in the morning. If she doesn't want anyone waking her up she should not be an on call doctor.  I have never had a doctor be so rude. I will be putting in a formal complaint first thing Monday morning.

Update: The staff at the actual office have reached out to me multiple times to check on me and I am very grateful that they have been working with me to get me better.|Front staff are friendly. Waiting room is clean. Dr Salina's is a joy to work with. He doesn't talk down. He listens. He knows every persons pain is different. He knows every persons path to living,  not just surviving is unique. He will work with you. He is worth driving the distance to see.|I went to my appointment thinking I was seeing my Doctor to set up a spinal epidural procedure and all I ever see is a physician assistant.  I feel like they don't even know my diagnosis. I would go someplace else if there was another place to go !|Worst, most medically irresponsible medical care I have ever received. I have called the office manager multiple times to discuss this but they are always "busy", and never call back. One of their providers failed to share details of a prescribed medication with me which is equal to suboxone. Immediately I was red flagged in every system. No pharmacy would fill any more of any of my meds because of this provider. I had providers discharge me because he wrote this prescription, so now on paper i look like a drug addict. Funny thing is, I have no addiction whatsoever,  so I cannot even imagine why he would have prescribed this. I would recommend staying far away from this practice unless you like your entire life being turned upside down by irresponsible medical providers.

They discharged me when they found out I had been in a car accident (after writing this very dangerous prescription) stating that they don't want to have the chance of being called to testify in court because they helped relieve my pain related to it.

These practitioners should have their licenses suspended or revoked for failure to maintain their ethos. Shame on you. Shame on you.

**UPDATE**

Catherine the office manager reached out, and we discussed the situation. She has said that her and the Dr. will speak with any providers who are refusing me service based on the prescription of this medication as this was NOT prescribed for drug addiction. I am looking forward to seeing how this resolves, as my entire life has been impacted by this. Will update again as resolution happens.|Had an appointment for 9:30. After waiting until 10:00, I inquired about the delay and was told they're running about 15 minutes behind. Nope, it's an hour +.
This is a normal recurring event at this mis managed practice. There are 21 people in here in waiting room for only 3 surgery beds. This is normal here, not occasionally, but each and every appointment.
This is not over booking.. It's mal practice and horrible business practice.|They took  to long to set up an appointment by waiting for referral.  They waited until the day before my appointment to tell me my my primary doctor hadn't approved the referral.  They told me the would call me when they received it and they would call to schedule my appointment.  It has been 2 weeks now and I never got he the procedure that I really needed which my back is killing me.  But the staff is friendly and professional and the Dr. is very wise, helpful and professional.

column3:
Florida Pain Relief Group serves Tampa, Florida residents who have been battling chronic pain for years. At our clinic, we understand the devastating impact that persistent pain can have on your lifephysically, emotionally, and socially. Many patients come to us after disappointing experiences with other healthcare providers who either dismissed their suffering or relied solely on prescription medications to mask symptoms rather than addressing underlying causes.

Our Tampa pain specialists focus on identifying the root causes of your discomfort. We develop personalized treatment plans that avoid over-reliance on pharmaceuticals, instead utilizing advanced interventional techniques and multidisciplinary approaches. The Florida Pain Relief Group team believes in treating the whole person, not just managing symptoms.

Specialized Treatment Options

Interventional procedures offered at our clinic include:

- Epidural steroid injections

- Nerve blocks

- Radiofrequency ablation

- Spinal cord stimulation

- Joint injections

Expert Medical Team

Our physicians bring extensive training and experience in pain medicine. Each doctor has completed specialized fellowship training beyond their medical education, ensuring they stay current with the latest advances in pain management techniques. This expertise allows us to address complex pain conditions that may have previously seemed untreatable.

Conditions We Treat

We specialize in treating various chronic pain conditions including:

- Back and neck pain

- Sciatica

- Arthritis pain

- Neuropathic pain

- Post-surgical pain

- Complex regional pain syndrome

Visit our Tampa clinic at 14438 University Cove Pl, Tampa, FL 33613, or call us at +1 813-531-8160 to schedule your consultation. More information is available on our website at https://www.physicianpartnersofamerica.com/location/florida-fl/tampa-fletcher/
column11:
At the Florida Pain Relief Group, we understand that chronic pain can ruin your life. We have had the opportunity to work with many Tampa, Florida residents who have been battling with chronic pain for years. It is heart-wrenching to hear how their pain has affected them physically, emotionally, as well as their relationship with friends and family.

Many of our patients visited doctor after doctor before they found us. They were disheartened because their doctors either ignored their pain, minimized their pain, or wanted to mask their pain by giving them prescription medications.

They were relieved when they found the Florida Pain Relief Group located in Tampa, Florida. We do not use pharmaceuticals to hide your pain.

column40: I see Dr Ellis and he is such a wonderful and kind doctor. He resolves my pain issues with non-invasive procedures. His bedside manner is the best I have ever seen in my whole life. His staff is very kind, very professional, and they're all very sweet young ladies. I won't go anywhere else for my pain management other than Dr. Neil Ellis's office. I just love everything about his office.  I highly recommend his practice to anyone who needs a solution for their pain management treatments.|Today was especially great because it was a telehealth appointment because of hurricane Milton, which I really appreciated so I didn't have to use gas to come into the office. Highly recommend this practice doctors and nurses practitioners and staff are great but their only issue is they never return a phone call on any of their answering lines and I mean never. Nothing is even noted in the chart that the  patient has called multiple times a day and for many days in a row even asking for an urgent message to be sent to the doctor when I had a family emergency and had to leave the state. They say they check their messages multiple times a day and will call you back, but they never do and this has happened numerous times and the next time I went in I asked the nurse practitioner if there was any notes in my chart and she said there was no record of me calling there so I showed her on my phone in my recent phone calls the  many many times that I had called the office and no one ever returned my phone call from any line or from the front desk after leaving multiple urgent messages. The front desk never answered their phone, even when I spoke to someone on the answering service who tried multiple times each day.  Other than that, everything is great|Staff and doc Ellis are awsome BUT I have had MANY problems getting my scrips to my pharmacy.many times it was on Friday so I couldn't get them till Monday. I also had a problem with one and my pharmacy called several times and left message and no one ever returned his call. My boyfriend had to go back to the office, and the AWSOME girl at the window got fixed..I'm sorry to say your phone center is not very efficient..once the young man said he emailed the office...but 2 days later I was told there was no record of said ' priority' text. I realize your office staff cant answer phones all day or they would never get the important work they do so well..but the phone center deffinatly needs reorganization... But I still thank you all for the great care you take of me..sincerely Deborah Harbin|Staff in office is unreliable and has gotten my surgeries denied due to their lack of getting documents faxed over. They are a joke and I'm in pain because of it. My surgery has to be done completely over due to negligence. I would never refer anyone here. Dr Ellis is great but his staff could care less about people. Always on their phone, loudly gossiping about patients and giving out false information and blatantly lying to patients. I and many others have witnessed it first hand.|I wanted to Thank the whole team .Tonya and another team member helped me out I was having car issues they were able to help me get home after a dead battery 1 hour from home. They went above and beyond  also having a great visit as usual . Thank You , Richard Platt.|Today I was seen by Miss Sadi, one of the nurse practitioners. Throughout my time as a patient I've seen numerous providers at one point or another and they all have been wonderful. Miss Sadi always takes the time to listen to any issues that you maybe experiencing as well as making sure you understand all your options. She always has that warm welcoming smile and great bedside manner that helps ease the anxiety you maybe experiencing when you're trying to figure out what's wrong and what course of action is the best for your situation. I would ten out of 10 recommend her to my own family as well as anyone that suffers chronic pain. Thank you to Miss Sadi and all of the ppoa providers and staff for their continued care and support!|Today wasn't as good as experience visiting Dr. Ellis's office, because 1st the front office receptionist didn't greet me or acknowledge my presence. Afterwards I signed in and waited, only to be overlooked. Others were called before me, although I was sitting in the office first.   Thanks to Maggie, she took me to the back as quickly as possible and apologized for the error more than once. This is beginning to be a pattern with this front office staff, who have been less than professional previously. I appreciate the promptness of the ARNP and her patience and understanding of my concerns. Dr. Ellis is wonderful but he needs to train or retrain his front personnel, who is the patient first point of contact for the office.|This is a wonderful Dr/pain clinic. Everyone here is fantastic & nice... They listen to you & literally try to not push nothing on you! It's very hard to find Drs who actually pay attention. I highly recommend. I see Dr Ellis & he's fantastic! The nurse practitioner's are wonderful too! Good all around!

column3:
Pain Medicine Group serves Oviedo, Sarasota, and the greater Orlando area in Florida with comprehensive pain management solutions for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. With three convenient locations across Central and South Florida, the clinic provides accessible care to residents seeking relief from persistent pain issues that affect their quality of life.

The clinic boasts a team of highly trained pain specialists including Dr. Mauna M. Radahd, Dr. Jason C. Tse, and Dr. Callahan, each bringing extensive expertise in pain medicine. These physicians have completed specialized, intensive training specifically focused on chronic pain management. Their combined experience enables them to accurately identify the root causes of pain and develop effective treatment strategies tailored to each patient's unique needs.

Multidisciplinary Approach to Pain Relief

Pain Medicine Group takes a multidisciplinary approach to patient care, combining various treatment modalities to address pain comprehensively. The team utilizes both interventional techniques and advanced treatments to provide optimal pain management solutions. This integrated approach helps patients find sustainable relief from conditions such as back pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and other chronic pain disorders.

Cutting-Edge Technology and Personalized Care

What sets Pain Medicine Group apart is their commitment to incorporating cutting-edge medical technology while maintaining personalized attention for each patient. The clinic offers innovative diagnostic tools and treatment options that target pain at its source. Patients receive individualized care plans designed to address their specific pain concerns and improve their overall functionality.

For more information or to schedule an appointment, patients can visit their website at https://www.painmedicinegroup.com/ or call +1 407-332-1300. Their Oviedo location can be found at 1255 City View Center, Oviedo, FL 32765, United States.
column11:
With a team of highly trained pain management specialists, including Dr. Mauna M. Radahd, Dr. Jason C. Tse, and Dr. Callahan, focused on identifying, treating, and alleviating the symptoms of chronic pain, Pain Medicine Group takes a multidisciplinary approach to care. The team combines cutting-edge medical technology with personalized care to help patients find relief from their pain at three convenient locations in Sarasota, Oviedo and greater Orlando area, Florida.
The experts at Pain Medicine Group have undergone specialized, intensive training in chronic pain issues, and they use interventional as well as advanced treatments, to provide the best pain management options to men and women throughout Central and South Florida.

column40:
This was my initial visit to see Dr. Tse after my previous doctor is packing up to move closer to his family. He listened to what was going on with me and asked pointed questions about my previous care. He mentioned doing a procedure at my next visit that should take care of my lower back/sciatica for 6-7 months. Exciting since my previous doctor never mentioned doing such a procedure.

I honestly feel positive on the experience today and the future of my mobility. Time will tell and I'm looking forward to his care.

The office staff were friendly. When I called they always answered on the second or third ring. My only issue is I had online forms to fill out. I didn't know an email was sent and it was sitting in my Spam folder. If I was told I could have checked  my Spam. Point is it takes about 30-40 minutes to complete.|Great experience! I have total faith in Dr. Tse and his ability to help me. The staff was very kind. I will continue to go there for treatment for my painful condition.|Wonderful doc she knew exactly how to treat my back pain. Very astute. I have total confidence in her and glad I ended up in her care. Don't believe the crazy negative reviews I am quite happy to have her diagnose  and soon treat me|The doctor is amazing but the staff at the reception desk are not friendly or kind at all, No communication with patients, It took me 1:30 minutes to be able to finish with the visit . They were not prepared enough with any information about my condition even when I contacted them 2 weeks before to be sure that they can give a whole picture to the doctor. They consider me a new patient while I stopped going to the clinic for a year.|Dr. Radahd and her staff provide a valuable service to patients living with daily pain. She offers the most effective way to address the pain, in my case, with medicine and infrequent epidurals. My pain is now managed just fine. You can experience life again without terrible or annoying pain.|Dr Mauna Rahad has no compassion and has a temper, she prescribed a prescription to my pharmacy knowing there was a problem with backorders my pharmist offer several solutions to which she refused, she then proceeded to give me shots in the back without numbing or anastecia which I have always had. Once I brought it to her attention she quickly left the room to check my insurance which there was no problem with as I called my insurance. However she never returned with a answer and did not complete the shots. I will let everyone know of my horrifying experience with this negligent Dr.|My first visit with Dr. Tse for lower spinal injection. The office is very well organized and the staff are super friendly! Dr. The took his time to go over results of my MRI with me and explained the procedure in detail and patiently. I'm very pleased with the office and feel very comfortable to schedule my procedure with them.|I received the worst treatment at this location with Dr. Rauda. She is the most uncaring and self- centered person I've ever met in my life! I would not recommend this doctor or facility to my worst enemy! Now I have to find another doctor for treatment of my condition~ She should be disbarred from practicing anywhere!

column3:
Central Florida Spine and Pain serves patients throughout West Melbourne, FL and surrounding areas with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our dedicated team combines medical expertise with compassionate care to help patients overcome both acute and chronic pain conditions. At our conveniently located facility on Wickham Road, we provide personalized treatment plans designed to improve quality of life and restore functionality for those suffering from persistent pain issues.

Our clinic specializes in the full spectrum of interventional pain management procedures. We effectively treat various conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint discomfort, and post-surgical pain. The Central Florida Spine and Pain team utilizes advanced diagnostic techniques to identify the root causes of pain before developing targeted treatment strategies. Our approach focuses on minimizing medication dependence while maximizing functional improvement.

Advanced Treatment Options

We pride ourselves on offering some of the newest medical technologies available in pain management. Our treatment options include:

Epidural Steroid Injections for nerve inflammation relief

Facet Joint Injections to address spinal joint pain

Radiofrequency Ablation for longer-lasting pain reduction

Spinal Cord Stimulation for chronic pain management

Joint Injections for arthritis and inflammatory conditions

Trigger Point Injections for muscle pain relief

Patient-Centered Approach

At Central Florida Spine and Pain, we understand how debilitating chronic pain can be. Our highly skilled team provides individualized attention with flexible scheduling options to accommodate your needs. We take time to listen to your concerns and develop customized treatment plans that address your specific pain challenges. Our goal is simple: help you return to enjoying life to the fullest.

Visit our clinic at 395 S Wickham Rd, Suite 1, West Melbourne, FL 32904, or call us at (321) 802-5021 to schedule your consultation. Additional information about our services is available on our website at www.cfspinepain.com.
column11: If you're in pain, we can help. The highly skilled, friendly, and compassionate team at Central Florida Spine & Pain can effectively address your pain, so you can get back to enjoying your life to the fullest. We offer flexible scheduling and some of the newest and best medical technology available. Our services include the entire range of interventional pain management procedures available for patients suffering from acute or chronic pain, back pain, or post-surgical pain.

column40:
I have been seeing Dr. Giordano for the past 3 years.  Recently, I suffered from my 9th compression fracture in my spine. He and his team rushed into action to order an MRI and then scheduled Kyphoplasty for L1 the very next day. I was very nervous, but his calming voice talked me through the entire procedure. Today, 4 days later, I am once again on the mend. I would highly recommend Dr Giordano and his team. Thank you all!!|This morning I went on a half hour walk along the beach thanks to Dr. G. at Florida Spine and Pain.
This is really amazing since I've had constant pain in my back, left hip and leg ever since my hip surgery over 2 years ago.
I'm waking up and able to walk without support through my home and join in family activities which have always been so important to me.
Thank you DR. G. for understanding and making my life so much brighter.|Dr G n Dr Janice are the best.  They have compassion n empathy something that lacks in today's world. The staff are all worthy of enhancing the work these 2 doctors provide.  I am so glad they were referred to me. Keep up the awesome job you all are doing.  We need people like you.  Pain is difficult enough to deal with.|After decades of seeing doctors for neck and back pain from many accidents (caused by other people,) and accomplishing nothing at all to improve my daily life, I happened to meet Dr Giordano in New Smyrna Beach florida at an office he was at. He was absolutely amazing, and when he left the practice he was at in NSB and opened his own practice in Melbourne, I drove from Ormond Beach to Melbourne to reestablish with him Doctor G. & I had been speaking. About a spinal stimulator I agreed to it. At this point in time the stimulator in my back has been installed for 2 years & 135 days and I am very pleased with the results. Doctor Giordano is very knowledgeable, takes his time to it explain. The procedures he is performing, walks you through every step. I am also getting injections from Doctor G. I highly. Recommend this amazing physician, his staff is very pleasant and accommodating. For anybody experiencing pain that no one else could deal with please help yourself and call the office. You won't regret it. Going to a doctors office and feeling at ease is worth me driving 2 hours to see him. Whether I go to his main office in Melbourne or his satellite office in Titusville. I am always made to feel comfortable and relaxed and thank you for all you've done Dr. Giordano and staff. He gave me my life back.|I have had lower back pain for years and have tried just about everything to feel better. I went to Dr. G because of these reviews so I want to take a minute to thank him and his staff. Dr. G talks to you like a friend not only a patient. I had injections on Friday and I can honestly say I had the best painless weekend I have had in years. If you are contemplating visiting this office, DO IT!!!! Your hesitation is your loss!!! Thanks again Dr. G!|Well, where do I start!!! I had a referral from my primary doctor to come to the Central Florida Spine n Pain Center. My doctor Dr. Ashta referred that I see Dr. Giordano about my situation. Upon arriving to his establishment I notice how friendly the staff were. How clean n amazing the lobby area was.
I call this awesome doctor Dr. G cause I can't pronounce his name.  But, he's good with Dr. G! This amazing doctor worked on me for months but unfortunately the shots were not effective. I had severe pain n Dr. G said I would have to have back surgery. On, April 24, 2024 I had the surgery n when I tell you I thank God for this doctor. Awesome work n a great great doctor. I'm healing n feeling fantastic. I recommend Dr. Nicholas Giordana to everyone that needs his professional skills. Thank you n God Bless!|I have Si joint pain from a car accident. I have had a hard time sleeping. Dr. Giordano gave me a pain injection in exactly the right spot! I feel amazing. I will be sleeping like a baby tonight. Thank you so much, Doc!!!|Over a year ago I started this journey.  I woke up one morning with a sharp pain going down my right leg.  Walking a little helped the pain go away for a while, but each day the pain got worse and would last longer. During my yearly doctor's checkup, he recommended that I see Dr. Nicholas Giordano, MD. at the Spine & Pain of Central Florida. After getting an MRI, I was informed that I had 5 bulging disks. I started using a walker and ended up in a wheelchair.
For treatment Dr. Giordano recommended some shots and then, when those did not work, he recommended the MILD procedure.  This procedure took away all the sharp pain down my leg which was about 90% of the issue but I still had an ache in my right leg that would not allow me to sleep in a bed, I slept in a recliner. Dr. Giordano next recommended getting the electronic stimulation procedure. The procedure allowed me to do a 5-day trial to make sure I would be a good candidate.  When the trial period was up and it worked for me, Dr. Giordano recommended that I do the permanent procedure.   Dr. Giordano performed this procedure, did a great job, and now I am totally pain free.  I can now stand, walk, and get on with my life.  If anyone is thinking about getting any of these procedures, I recommend contacting Dr. Giordan's office, there is nothing to lose except the pain you are experiencing, I am one of the success stories.

column3:
Physician Partners of America serves Brandon, Florida with specialized pain management solutions for patients who have exhausted traditional treatment options. Our dedicated team at the Florida Pain Relief Group understands the frustration of persistent pain that hasn't responded to conventional therapies. We focus on innovative interventional pain management techniques that provide effective relief where other methods have failed.

Interventional pain management is a specialized medical approach that targets pain at its source using precise, minimally invasive procedures. Rather than simply masking symptoms with medication, our techniques address the underlying causes of pain. Many of our treatments involve targeted injection therapies that deliver relief directly to affected areas, reducing inflammation and interrupting pain signals.

Our Specialized Treatments

Our physicians are experts in a comprehensive range of pain management procedures, including:

- Epidural steroid injections for back and neck pain

- Nerve blocks for targeted pain relief

- Radiofrequency ablation for longer-lasting results

- Spinal cord stimulation for chronic pain conditions

- Joint injections for arthritis and related conditions

Experienced Pain Management Specialists

The physicians at our Brandon clinic bring years of specialized training and experience in pain medicine. Our doctors have completed advanced fellowships in interventional techniques and stay current with the latest developments in pain management. This expertise allows us to create customized treatment plans that address each patient's unique pain condition.

For more information or to schedule a consultation, contact us at +1 813-739-7493 or visit our clinic at 1369 Providence Rd, Brandon, FL 33511. Additional details about our services can be found at https://www.physicianpartnersofamerica.com/location/florida-fl/brandon-fl-pain-relief-group/
column11:
Many chronic pain sufferers in Brandon, Florida have tried just about every therapy possible and still have not found relief. For this reason, many are skeptical when they hear about the interventional pain management techniques we pioneer here at the Florida Pain Relief Group.

The first question most people ask us is, what is interventional pain management? Simply put, interventional pain management is a discipline that focuses on pain management using a variety of pain blocking techniques. A good portion of the techniques that we use include a form of injection therapy.

I can say without a doubt that they definitely care about their patients and respect their patient decisions.  They've offered a few different treatment plans and I've tried a few and refused to do the others and they completely understand.  Also, I've seen a few different doctors from Alexis to Kristopher to Dr Medina and they all have made me feel welcome and comfortable going to them monthly for my appointments whereas before my monthly appointments were the most stressful events ever.  Additionally, the office staff are all very warm, welcoming and responsive.  Trish is by far the best though, she remembers the patients and random things that I don't expect them to ever recall which makes it feel even more like they care.

Update:  this practice is great, Jensen and Ann are amazing!!!|Everyone at this office is fantastic. Dealing with Anne is always a pleasure. Make sure you check your explanation of benefits (EOB) because they WILL overcharge you if you don't say anything. I fought to get back to this doctor, and all he did was rip me off left and right. This doctor is so not worth it on so many levels.|I've now been going here a year and a half. I see Jennifer and I absolutely adore her! I am just praying that I can remain a patient. I'm at an age now and have been through so much medically that it's very important to me to be seen at a place by someone I'm comfortable with. My last pain Dr I stayed with for 10 years because he was so good to me and definitely went above and beyond, even seeing me free and then half price because I couldn't afford the full price and now my insurance company says that if Dr. Mendia will work with them,they will do some kind of override? But they need to answer the phone. They used too...
That's the only issue I have is the staff puts the phone on voicemail and never returns the I've never had 1 call returned, not one!
Not even to a nurs They're not always kind and kindness goes a long way!
I don't want to switch Drs, I'm too ill to go far and this place is right by the hospital just a little bit over 1.5 miles from my house and so is my primary care Dr now.
I'm praying for something to work out for my well being. It took months and a change in my meds to finally after years I have been able to do yard work again.
This place is a blessing to me , I don't want to leave.
I haven't felt like anyone cares about me since my mom passed in 2018, and I feel compassionate from Jennifer and that's sooooo important to me at this point in my life! I get to stay.
I love this place and they truly treat you asn individual. Not like cattle waiting for hours for an appointment

Wonderful Care

27 Feb 2025 UPDATE
Great care with Anne m
Empathetic wouldn't want to go anywhere else.
They don't overdose patients with medications, so if that's what you're seeking to somewhere else

Jupiter Pain Management serves Jupiter, FL and surrounding areas with comprehensive pain relief solutions. Rather than simply masking symptoms, we develop individualized, comprehensive treatment strategies that target the source of pain while minimizing medication dependence.

Our team combines advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatments to address the root causes of pain rather than just masking symptoms.

Our clinic offers a wide range of interventional procedures and therapeutic options including:

  • Joint injections and nerve blocks

  • Radiofrequency ablation

  • Epidural steroid injections

Each doctor has completed specialized fellowship training in pain management techniques at prestigious medical institutions. This advanced training enables our team to address even the most challenging pain conditions with precision and care.

At ISSF, we employ a multidisciplinary approach to pain management. Conditions We Treat

Advanced Treatment Options

Florida Pain Physicians serves Jacksonville, FL and surrounding areas as a premier pain management clinic dedicated to helping patients find relief from chronic pain conditions. Since 2000, our team at Florida Coast Pain and Spine Center has established a reputation for excellence in providing comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. We combine advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to address various pain conditions affecting the neck, back, and joints.

Our clinic offers a wide range of minimally invasive procedures designed to target pain at its source. These include:

- **Epidural injections** for nerve pain relief

- **Facet joint injections** to reduce spinal inflammation

- **Radiofrequency ablation** for longer-lasting pain management

- **Spinal cord stimulation** for chronic back and leg pain

- **Dorsal root ganglion stimulation** for focused pain relief

Expert Medical Team

Our physicians bring extensive training and experience in pain management and interventional techniques. Each doctor on our team has completed specialized education in pain medicine, allowing us to offer the most current and effective treatments available. Our medical professionals work collaboratively to develop personalized treatment plans that address the underlying causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms.

Patient-Centered Approach

At Florida Pain Physicians, we understand how chronic pain affects quality of life. Our approach focuses on restoring function and improving daily activities through targeted interventions. Patients receive comprehensive evaluations before any treatment begins, ensuring we identify the most appropriate pain management strategy.

We're committed to continuing our growth to better serve Jacksonville and neighboring communities. For consultation appointments or questions about our services, contact us today.

column11: We're Florida Coast Pain and Spine Center, and we've been a leading pain management specialist here in Jacksonville, FL, since 2000. We're looking forward to growing our business to continue to serve Jacksonville and the surrounding areas. Contact us today for a consultation!

They are an Incredible group of people starting at the front desk all the way to the last lady you check out with and I'd highly recommend them to anyone who is seeking this type of medical guidance.|If I could give a 0 I would. My husband's appointment was at 2:15 and here we are an hour later and we still have not been called. When I ask when will he be seen, I was told he had 2 patients ahead of him, really?!!! My husband was told not to eat anything after 6:30 am and on top of that he had a 4 hour dialysis treatment. This was totally unacceptable on so many levels. We will be looking for another doctor office where they know not to triple book their patients. Be late for your appointment and see how much you'll be charged.|Dr. Foltz has a great team. He's a great doctor and the staff is wonderful....

.. now only if I could get through to them.  They have an answering service that actually does them a disservice. It's hard as hell to get through and make appointments.  I leave messages and we play phone tag for a week.  We should not have these kind of problems, consistently.  Update/ I believe the phone systems have been updated however it still can be an inconvenience at times during certain days.|Love Dr Jimenez and his PA Alex Pujol. I have been a patient of Alex's for over 20 years. The physician's and staff treat you like you are a family member. I have a complicated medical history and they are very patient, take time to explain everything and make sure you are knowledgable about your visit before you leave.|I do not recommend Dr. Foltz. He doesn't listen to your concerns and health needs. His goal is to take control, and make decisions without working with his patients. As of 2/18/21,  I was retaliated on due to this post. I received a certified letter from dr.foltz to reinterrate me being discharged.  He also kindly stated that he will offer me a 30 day refill of my meds while exploring another doctor.  Well, he lied about the 30 day supply of meds. I followed up with him today regarding my refill at his office. He made me sit in the lobby waiting for over 2 hours, and he had only a few patients if they were all there to see him. His nurse finally came out to tell me that my last month supply of meds was the 30 day supply, and she made a courtesy call to my PCP  to give me a 30 day supply.  I spoke with my PCP, and she informed me that no one contacted her or left a message.  This is deceitful.  , and unprofessional to treat people like this.|I have enjoyed getting to know Dr. Foltz as a physician and that he takes the time to listen to my concerns. What is so nice is that the whole staff cares and it show's from the front desk all the way thru. I know that I am in great hands with this knowledgeable staff and better yet know that Dr. Foltz is taking the time to address and treat my current concerns. Pain management can be a tricky specialty however, I have found a physician that is willing to find the right treatment for me and has taken the time and willingness to research my condition to improve my quality of life.   Florida Pain and Spine has been blessed having such a great physician.|Dr. Foltz saved my right hand and possibly my career. After coming down with an aggressive case of a painful nerve disease (CRPS) that many other doctors couldn't adequately treat, I found Dr. Foltz and his staff. They treated me with the care and concern of a family. Within two months I have the use of my hand and greatly reduced pain. I can't thank them enough. They are professional, extremely knowledgeable, and welcoming. Without them, I fully believe that I would be completely disabled and have enduring extreme pain. I can't thank them enough or say enough positive things about them. They are just the best. I am blessed to have found them.

column2: TMH Physician Partners - Chronic Pain Management
column3:
TMH Physician Partners - Chronic Pain Management in Tallahassee, Florida serves patients seeking relief from chronic pain conditions through comprehensive treatment approaches. Our specialized clinic combines advanced medical techniques with personalized care plans to address various pain disorders affecting daily life. Located conveniently in the medical district, our facility provides access to board-certified pain specialists who understand the complex nature of persistent pain.

Our pain management physicians offer targeted treatments for conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical pain. We utilize a multi-disciplinary approach that may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy recommendations, and interventional techniques. Each treatment plan is customized to address the specific needs of individual patients.

Advanced Treatment Options

Interventional procedures including epidural steroid injections and nerve blocks

Spinal cord stimulation for chronic back and limb pain

Radiofrequency ablation for joint and spinal pain relief

Medication management with focus on functional improvement

Coordinated care with physical therapy and rehabilitation services

Experienced Medical Team

Our physicians bring extensive training from prestigious medical institutions and years of specialized experience in pain medicine. They stay current with the latest advancements in pain management techniques to provide evidence-based care. Our team works closely with other specialists at Tallahassee Memorial Healthcare to ensure comprehensive treatment approaches.

Patient-Centered Approach

We understand chronic pain affects every aspect of life. Our clinic prioritizes listening to patients and developing realistic goals for pain reduction and improved function. New patients receive thorough evaluations to identify pain sources and contributing factors before treatment begins.

Visit Our Clinic

TMH Physician Partners - Chronic Pain Management

1633 Physicians Dr

Tallahassee, FL 32308

United States

Phone: +1 850-431-3276

Website: https://www.tmh.org/location/tmh-physician-partners-chronic-pain-management

We accept most major insurance plans and can verify coverage before your appointment. Contact our office to schedule a consultation with our pain management specialists.
column38: Windy Deckerhoff|Steve Stanley|Janine Raitt|Tonya Herring|Donna Stewart|Laura Teal|E J|Lalie Davis
column40:
Dr Russell is so kind, and his staff are always so kind and very professional as well.

Dr. Russell listens to your problems and helps his patients by going above and beyond; not only for pain management problems, but also other medical issues the patient is experiencing.

The office is very clean, and I actually enjoy going to see this doctor, as I know he truly cares about the health and well being of his patients.

We need more doctors like Dr. Russell as our heath care system has been falling short as far as the treatment and care of their patients.

So thankful Dr. Russell is my doctor.|I've been seeing Dr. Russell for about five or six years. During all this time Dr. Russell has taken good care of me making sure I have the medications that I need on a daily basis to get me through. With every appointment I have with him. He always makes sure to go over everything that is going on with me including any new changes in health. Dr. Russell is very good at his job and at staying on top of what is going on with me. Good doctor's area hard to come by. So I'm very glad to have Dr. Russell as my Pain Management Physician. Doctor Russell and the rest of his team there who work with him are some of the best people in their field of work. So if anyone reading this needs a good Pain Management Physician. I highly recommend Dr. Russell and his team or any of the other doctors there.|Dr. Russell is genuine and caring about his patients. He works with you to find the best way to treat your individual needs. It difficult to find a good doctor in his area of expertise in the Tallahassee area. I feel very fortunate to be one of Dr. Russell's patients.|Dr. Russell really cares about your long term capabilities of each patient. He makes sure that he addresses your issues with a great pain management plan. And not to mention the office is very welcoming with exceptional customer service.|Dr Russell is a great Dr . He spends the time needed to address all your. Concerns. The nurses and staff are nice happy bunch of people ..  makes you feel like they care .. They go beyond expectation.|I have always had great care here. I Love Dr. Russell, he has always given 100%. He goes over all of my issues and concerns at every visit, not just the first appt. like a lot of the doctors in his same profession. He does'nt judge you just because you need help. I would recommend him over any of the doctors that I have had in the past. The nurses and office personal are the best. Thank you for your care.
Laura|Always a pleasant experience when visiting Dr. Russell. He listens and responds to problems in appropriate manners. Makes you feel very happy when leaving his practice.|Dr. Russell's management of my pain has dramatically increased the quality of my life. Unlike many medical doctors in the Big Bend, Dr. Russell treats the patient, in addition to the disease. We work together on developing my individualized plan of care using evidence based research to support my treatment. He is remarkably intelligent and can explain complex issues in a non condescending manner. He will not treat you like the other Pain Mgmt physicians. I've had the displeasure of encountering a few through the 19 surgeries I've endured over the years. I can attest that most of them are pompous, arrogant, and have the bedside manners of a rock wearing a white coat. I am able to work and perform my ADLs because I am treated adequately and appropriately by Dr. Russell. He is a phenomenal doctor and a good human. I highly recommend him because he continues to carry on Dr. Pagano's legacy of treating patients with complex pain like human beings and not criminalizing or dismissing them.

column40:
The PA was negative & couldn't think straight. She said it "was is too loud" because of a child in the office. Very unprofessional.|I have been going to this office for over a year now and I love the staff! They are very over worked, but are still very nice and listen to your pain areas, along with pain level. Dr Ramos I've seen for 5 years now and he is so awesome. He is exceptionally nice, loves listening to his patients complaints, tries to figure ways to make it better, looks over your documents, MRI and CT scans are important to take with you. His PA Dana is very super sweet as well!! I'd recommend this place to anyone!|This morning I had a 7:30 am appointment with Dr. Fernando at the Lake Mary Surgery Center. I arrived about 7:15 am and was told that all her appointments for the week had been canceled yesterday. The receptionist also said that I was supposed to have been notified. Well I wasn't! I returned home and about 8:30 am I received a call . The person said that my appointment was canceled and rescheduled for Feb 9th. No apologies, nothing. If the is how you treat your patients, I will be seeking treatment elsewhere.|I was very nervous about going to a so-called "Pain Clinic" thinking it was some sort of a pill mill. After suffering with debilitating pain for over 2 years I finally went on the advice of my PCP. How wrong I was to put off going as the Dr.s there have basically given me my life back. They can do several in office procedures,  referrals to physical therapy, and offer many suggestions how to treat my pain at home without medication. They are thorough and  get to the underlying cause of your pain, they keep up with physical changes by ordering current  xrays, nerve studies , and other providers reports. Dana Vecchioni is exceptional. Her knowledge and professionalism and the lessening of pain confirm I am in the best of care. She is sincere and listens, and offers various treatments besides medication. I am confident I am in the best of hands and literally have my life back due to her and other Dr's there, care.|I have been going to this practice for over 5 years, I currently see Dr Ramos or Dana. The staff is amazing and although my Drs have changed over the years, I have always received great care. My pain level increasing and decreasing due to the nature of my disease is always taken into consideration.|Daniel is truly a BRILLIANT APRN!  He is incredibly analytical, insightful, compassionate, understanding and above all gifted with the ability to diagnose pretty much "spot on" ...he has assisted me 3times with HUGE suggested diagnosis that other specialists missed! Then down the line others found what I had was exactly what Daniel had said to me, all backed up with the tests, blood work, or images to support the diagnosis too..... a couple of answers / diagnosis I've been looking for for years!!!!!
My husband and I are very grateful for him!
Thank you, Daniel!
God bless you and may HE keep your family safe!
Fanny and Timothy|Dr.Kent is amazing and has really helped answering my questions and addressing my concerns. They aren't just about pain medication! I have Cancer and many other conditions but to look at me I look ok. Just because I don't have an arm cut off or wearing a cast doesn't mean I don't hurt any less. They cut enough out on the insides! To the woman that posted about her issues..stick to your own stuff lady! You don't know what someone else is going through. Your not in that room with them nor can you see their file.|IMO, this felt like assembly line service. After attempting for several weeks to control pain caused by disc problems, Dana increased my medication slightly. I saw Dr. Ramos on my next visit and mentioned the change. His attitude changed from pleasant to ugly and he stated that he needed to talk to Dana about that. His next statement was harsh and aimed at me - "We're here to get YOU PEOPLE off of this medication." I was not on medication when I started seeing him and was quite insulted. I have not seen him since that visit.

Affordahealth Pain Management in Davie, Florida serves patients throughout Broward County with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized clinic combines evidence-based treatments with personalized care plans to address chronic and acute pain conditions. Located conveniently at 8480 W State Rd 84, our facility offers advanced diagnostic capabilities and therapeutic interventions designed to improve quality of life without excessive reliance on medication.

At Affordahealth, we provide multidisciplinary approaches to pain relief. Our treatments include interventional procedures, medication management, and physical modalities tailored to each patient's needs. We specialize in treating back pain, neck pain, joint disorders, neuropathic conditions, and post-surgical pain. Our physicians employ minimally invasive techniques whenever possible to reduce recovery time and improve outcomes.

Specialized Detoxification Programs

Our clinic offers medically supervised detoxification programs for patients dealing with medication dependence. These programs are carefully structured to ensure safety and comfort throughout the withdrawal process. We emphasize gradual tapering methods and supportive therapies to minimize discomfort while transitioning to alternative pain management strategies.

Our Clinical Approach

Affordahealth physicians bring decades of combined experience in pain medicine. Our doctors hold board certifications in pain management, anesthesiology, and addiction medicine. Each treatment plan begins with thorough evaluation and diagnostic assessment. We prioritize functional improvement alongside pain reduction, helping patients return to daily activities with greater comfort and mobility.

Patient-Centered Care

We understand that pain affects every aspect of life. Our team takes time to listen to patient concerns and explain treatment options clearly. New patients receive comprehensive consultations to establish baseline assessments and realistic goals. Follow-up appointments monitor progress and allow for treatment adjustments as needed.

Contact Affordahealth Pain Management and Detox at +1 954-577-0177 or visit our website at http://affordahealthpainrelief.com/ to schedule your consultation. Our Davie location welcomes patients from throughout South Florida seeking effective pain relief solutions.

I just want to thank everyone here who helped me through a very traumatic time in my life. I was in debilitating pain, unable to walk for nearly 2 months and the folks here were the only people who would help me.

Luckily my pain wound down and i was able to do physiotherapy to get me functional again but i wouldnt have made it had it not been for Affirdahealth. Agsin, thank you so much for helping me. Truly doin gods work!|I just had my first Stemwave treatment on both of my knees.  I definitely feel a difference. I will be back for additional treatments so I will continue to post my experiences. Thank you AffordaHealth|I recently started at a new pain clinic in Davie Florida called Affordable Health. I very rarely leave reviews, but I just wanted to say that the kindness and customer service that is currently being provided by Affordable Pain is above and beyond.  Being a pain patient can sometimes mean getting harshly judged by doctors, pharmacists and insurance companies and quite frankly the stress of that can be significant, so the team over at Affordable Health has really stood out in contrast with so many other places.  They also provide extensive counseling about pain treatments as well as hot packs, tens units, traction and all the other ancillary pain treatment options that you're probably aware (and need) of if you also suffer from pain.  It's just nice to know there's one place you can go and get genuine care and attention and help.  Thank you Affordable Health!|I have been with Affordable for 7 months now and I was welcomed in from day 1 making me feel I was a long time patient. Able to sleep, swim, and walk all without pain!  It is wonderful!|30 yrs of back surgery one after the other and SWF Pain has helped myself and my wife to avoid major spinal surgeries.  Why it takes this long to find help with debilitating pain in the US is just unacceptable.  Thank you SWFP!!|I have been a patient with Dr Ball @SWFP Center for over 4 years now. I am grateful for his care, I believe he is very easy to talk to and direct with his explanations. The staff have been very courteous and helpful, from the front desk to the authorization desk. The OR teams are efficient right through into recovery. While I'm waiting, I ask God to bless this practice and all that they do.|Savannah at front desk, says she works in billing; I had convo re my bill.
She said you can't run a bill & gives me patient agreement.

Paid on 1/25/24 & again today 2/12/24 w/o a bill, was told 1/31/24 statement was old.
Very aggressive & unprofessional; when I said I am on a fixed income; she said she was a single parent & loudly banged something where she was sitting.
Beware its all about $.
I am a long time patient, time to find pain management that treats you w respect.|I was a patient of Dr. VALENTE for over 15 yrs..  He took over my care from a VERY bad pain doc in Sarasota w/c had sent me to who made my pain much worse.

Dr. VALENTE was willing to take over in the middle of another doctors huge mess and for this I am ever grateful to him.

As time went on I eventually got worse developing O.A, Psoriatic arthritis, had multiple orthopedic surgeries, CRPS that had spread from R leg to entire body, & other conditions.  He put me on a number of meds and I NEVER abused them.  I underwent many diff. types of nerve blocks.  All gave me relief but often short lived.

Then Dr. Ball took over the practice.  He fired EVERY employee but Dr. VALENTE.  Suddenly after more than 15 yrs Dr. VALENTE told me he was retiring soon.  THIS WAS 8 YRS ago now ( to the present 2023).  So, I was lied to as was my w/c attorney as to why he could no longer treat me.

I found a new pain doc who is awesome and listens to my issues.  I only take meds.IF ABSOLUTELY NEEDED !  But Dr. VALENTE started me on the majority.

I needed a pain Mgt doc to conduct period nerve blocks, epidurals etc..  No longer w/c..  I was scheduled to see a doc once again with SWFL PAIN MGT. ( Strictly for nerve blocks, epidurals etc. and received call days later to cancel my appt.  NO excuse other than they don't wish to see me as a patient.  I tried a few times with different docs in the group with NO success !  At the time they were closest to my home & only avail. that I trusted to place a needle in my spine.

I found a new alternative Pain Mgt doc that seems to actually care.  He has never attempted to force me to have a Spinal cord stimulator implant which is y I ended up at SWFL Pain Mgt.  The device was implanted by Sarasota doc and NEVER functioned properly.  My body rejected it !  Dr. VALENTE at the time said some people are NOT mean't to have them.  But Dr. Ball took over & that was his big push.  NO way was I going thru that Hell again.

There are many pain Mgt docs available ( if you truly have severe pain issues).  Don't get fired by a doctor for abuse of pain meds.  U will NEVER find another doctor to take over your care.  There are also MANY highly rated alternative Pain Mgt docs available in Charlotte Co, Lee Co. & Sarasota Co. With far better patient reviews.

I have NO respect for a doctor who lies to me when I've done nothing wrong.  The truth would have been better.

While at SWFL PAIN MGT the wait took forever !  When Dr. Ball took over the practice I ,& the person taking me to a room were forced to stop walking while he in public told one of his employees off.  Neither the place nor the time !

Lack of Professionalism at least on behalf of Dr. Ball is at an all time high.  Try dealing with  issues such as this after seeing patients & in a PRIVATE setting.  Next to the fact the woman he was telling off was the mother of his unborn child.

column2: Florida Regional Pain Management, PA: Shonith Manohar, MD
column3:
Florida Regional Pain Management, PA serves Jacksonville, FL and surrounding areas with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our clinic specializes in treating chronic pain conditions using evidence-based approaches tailored to each patient's unique needs. Under the expert guidance of Dr. Shonith Manohar, we offer a range of advanced interventional procedures and therapeutic options designed to improve quality of life and restore function.

Our clinic provides multiple treatment modalities for chronic pain, including:

- Interventional Pain Injections - Precisely targeted to reduce inflammation and pain

- PRP and Stem Cell Therapy - Harnessing the body's natural healing abilities

- Spinal Cord Stimulation - Advanced technology for managing persistent back and limb pain

- Radiofrequency Ablation - Minimally invasive nerve pain treatment

- Non-invasive Laser Therapy - Drug-free pain relief option

- Medication Management - Carefully prescribed and monitored for optimal results

About Dr. Shonith Manohar

Dr. Manohar brings extensive training and experience in pain medicine to Jacksonville patients. His approach combines cutting-edge interventional techniques with comprehensive care plans. Dr. Manohar stays current with the latest advancements in pain management to provide patients with effective treatment options beyond traditional approaches.

Patient-Centered Approach

At Florida Regional Pain Management, we understand how chronic pain affects daily life. Our team works closely with each patient to develop personalized treatment plans. We take time to explain conditions and treatment options in understandable terms. Many patients experience significant improvement with our multimodal approach to pain management.

Visit our clinic at 915 W Monroe St #301, Jacksonville, FL 32204, or learn more at [www.floridaregionalpain.com](https://www.floridaregionalpain.com/). To schedule a consultation, call us at (904) 737-7246.
column11: Treating patients with chronic pain with the latest treatment techniques including Injections, PRP-Stem cell, Spinal cord stimulator, Radiofrequency ablation, Non invasive Laser therapy and Medication.

Pioneer Pain Management INC serves Port St. Lucie, FL and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized clinic focuses on treating chronic pain conditions through evidence-based approaches tailored to each patient's unique needs. Located conveniently at 266 NW Peacock Blvd STE 205, we provide accessible care for residents throughout St. Lucie County seeking relief from persistent pain issues.

Our clinic specializes in treating various chronic pain conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical pain. We utilize advanced diagnostic techniques to identify the root causes of pain. Treatment options include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, interventional techniques, and regenerative medicine approaches. Each treatment plan is customized based on thorough patient evaluation and medical history assessment.

Our Specialized Approach

At Pioneer Pain Management, we believe in addressing pain at its source rather than simply masking symptoms. Our physicians have extensive training in pain medicine and anesthesiology. We employ a multidisciplinary approach combining medical interventions with physical therapy recommendations when appropriate. Patients receive comprehensive care plans designed for both immediate relief and long-term pain management strategies.

Patient-Centered Care

We prioritize patient education and involvement in treatment decisions. Our team takes time to explain pain conditions and treatment options thoroughly. We maintain open communication throughout the treatment process. Follow-up appointments ensure treatment effectiveness and allow for adjustments when needed. Our compassionate staff creates a supportive environment for patients dealing with chronic pain conditions.

Contact Pioneer Pain Management at +1 772-446-4883 to schedule a consultation or visit our website at http://pioneerpainmanagement.com/ for more information about our services. Our Port St. Lucie location offers convenient appointment scheduling for new and returning patients.

column40:
I don't even know where to begin when I have to speak about Dr. Poto. He is truly an amazing doctor. His bed side manner is always caring and loving. No matter the hour he always returns my calls as soon as possible. The way he took my pain away in my back, I am truly greatful and I referre him and his staff all the time. If you have pain of any kind this is the office to come too.|My wife and I were patients with poto for 8 years. This doctor admitted to hitting my wife's nerve while injecting her back which has resulted in her having pain in her lower area that continues years later. Poto has not seen either of us for the past 5 years and tossed us around to other staff members. Carol is a wonderful person but obviously doesn't stand up for her patients. After 7 years we came in 13 minutes late and his staff thought it would be funny to reschedule us for 2 weeks out. Our medication ran out and they couldn't care less. The staff has been changed out constantly. Poto got one staff member pregnant and she brought in a bunch of angry rude staff members. My wife and I are very disappointed with how poto has changed, he was very concerned when we were his first patients as you can see by my previous review 7 years ago. He even had us come to his home where he gave us our prescriptions and befriended us. Thankfully we found a great place to get excellent treatment closer to home. We will never forgive poto for the treatment we received and hopefully we can still get compensation for the pain and suffering my wife deals with because of his negligence.|I am very bless to have a Dr. like Dr. Poto. He genuinely cares about his patients. How I know is because I have been near death and he came to my rescue, when I couldn't get out of bed he came to my house to see about and my mom . I can't say enough about Dr. Poto. And the Office of Pioneer Pain is excellent,everyone is very friendly knowledgeable and helpful.|Dr poto is one of the best Dr i ever known, he cares like family and he always make you feel like your his only patient,I have know him for years he is always kind and gentle and listen to what you have to say, and makes a game plan for your healthcare,dosent matter what you have going he always makes the time for his patient, I love him like family and he will always be apart of our family!!!!|I've been in pain with my neck and back for years with degenerative disc disease and have been to all kinds of pain management clinics.
I finally found a doctor that knows what he's doing! Dr. Poto is the first doctor I found I can trust! When he does procedures they work and has helped with areas of pain that I have had to deal with for years.
In the past, other doctors have done the exact same procedure and I didn't get any pain relief. Now I see why, either they didn't know what they were doing or they lacked the experience doing the procedure correctly!
I wish I had found him earlier.|I cannot say enough great things about Dr. Poto, his staff and office. First the intake process is thorough. The dr reviews your records and gets to know you before you arrive. He is the most knowledgable physician I have had in a long time. Despite being brilliant, Dr. Poto is friendly and very personable. He offered solutions that no other dr in Florida offered. In the past, I researched how to be helped and only 1 specific dr in NY or AZ offered what he has offered. I do not need to travel out of state for real help. He cares. He WANTS to help you. I saw Dr. Warsch and Dr. Weidenbaum at PainCare of Florida and those two drs combined never offered or helped me as much as Dr. Poto.  We are so lucky to have a dr like him in little old PSL.|I've been a patient of Dr.Poto's since he opened Pioneer Pain Management on US 1 in Port St Lucie, Florida. You WILL NOT find a more Personable and Professional pain management Doctor anywhere in Florida. He's truly "Old School!". By that, I mean that he takes an interest in each of his patients lives and how their condition affects them daily. He then takes the time to pick a pain management plan and explains every step of his plan with his patients.
So if you're reading this to find a pain management Doctor, LOOK NO FURTHER! You've found THE BEST!!!. Good Luck to you all and I hope that you're feeling better soon...|I have been treated for my severe degenerative disc disease, spondylitis & osteoarthritis. When I met him the first visit I knew he was the one who could help me. My pain has diminished drastically. He is the most caring, understanding, & listens to you. Concerned about YOU as a person, gentle & knowledgeable doctor I have ever been to in my life, & I'm 76, so have seen many in my lifetime! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND Dr. Poto & his awesome staff! U won't b disappointed.

column2: The Institute for Florida Pain Specialists
column3:
The Institute for Florida Pain Specialists in Jacksonville, FL serves patients seeking relief from chronic pain conditions throughout Northeast Florida. Our dedicated team of pain management specialists combines advanced diagnostic techniques with comprehensive treatment plans tailored to each patient's unique needs. We believe in a "find the problem, fix the problem" mentality that addresses the root cause of pain rather than merely masking symptoms.

Our clinic specializes in treating various pain conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndrome. We utilize state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to accurately identify pain sources. Treatment options range from minimally invasive procedures to medication management and physical therapy. Each treatment plan is customized to improve function and quality of life.

Our Expert Medical Team

Our physicians bring decades of combined experience in pain medicine. Board-certified in pain management and anesthesiology, our doctors completed training at prestigious medical institutions. They stay current with the latest advancements in interventional pain techniques. This expertise allows us to offer cutting-edge treatments like spinal cord stimulation and regenerative medicine.

Patient-Centered Approach

We prioritize patient education and active participation in treatment decisions. Our team takes time to explain conditions and treatment options thoroughly. We coordinate care with primary physicians and specialists when needed. This collaborative approach ensures comprehensive pain management for optimal outcomes.

Contact Information

Located at 1604 Margaret St, Jacksonville, FL 32204, our clinic is easily accessible to patients throughout the region. New patients and referrals are welcome to contact us at +1 904-647-5266 or email referral@alifewithoutpainispossible.com. For more information about our services, visit our website at www.flpainspecialists.com.

column38: Trina Wilkes|CLARISSA WILLIAMS-WALKER|Kristin Soja|Brandon Merkle|Lynn Witherspoon|R Chance|Jerry Price|Kristavia Dickinson
column40:
Let me start by saying that the office staff is amazing. The former doctor who was amazing Dr. Geiger who left the office back in the latter part of 2023. This iswho I was seeing. After she left I was in search of another pain management facility, because I had heard from patients that Dr. Von Tobel's bed side manner was rude and condescending. I made an appointment and saw the nurse practitioner Von Tobel. After submitting a urine sample she came to me and asked me(pretty much accusing) of taking two narcotics and said it was in my urine sample. I explained to her that it couldn't be because one of the medications she was accusing me of I am deathly allergic so why would I take it. And the other medicine I hadn't had since my surgery. I told her that maybe the mistakes my urine for someone elses. She said they don't make mistakes and asked me did I take someone else's medication. I was livid. I left feeling angry, hurt and as if I didn't matter as a patient. I clearly was not being listened to.

I didn't go back, until recently. Having no choice because of unbearable pain and the fact that my insurance isn't accepted by any other pain management. So I'm basically stuck getting care by Drs who thinks I'm a pain pill seeking junkie.|Today I received a procedure for low back pain and my experience was absolutely amazing my pain relief was instant relief. I highly recommend Dr Von Tobel if you want real pain relief! He is the best Dr Vvonderful!|The Dr and his staff are great. I had injections done yesterday and it went great. I was extremely nervous and Brittany was great at calming me down and walking me through everything and staying with me the whole time. Best office I have been to in a long time. They truly care.|I visited Dr. Von Tobel probably half a dozen times in the process of receiving two minor procedures. In that time, my pain progressed significantly and remains to be debilitating in nature... but that's not even my major gripe. I was most put off by the fact that, despite a few of the staff being really awesome (you know who you are), the majority of the personnel is wildly unprofessional and seemingly oblivious. The doctor, himself, is arrogant and condescending. I never spoke with him more than a few quick and/or interrupted sentences before he jogged back out of the door. On one occasion, he told me that I needed to make better money so I could buy decent insurance, but that was hardly the only or most offensive thing he ever said to me.

Ironically, not long after, my increased income had made me ineligible for said insurance, and the replacement plan I purchased would not go into effect untol after a scheduled appointment I had with him. In the interest of attending the appointment, I asked whoever fields their calls for information about paying out of pocket for the visit. I was told that I would owe $175. That seemed more than reasonable, so I arrived on the set date. I was short on money, and asked to be invoiced for the fee, but was told in no uncertain terms that invoicing a self pay patient was simply not possible, and I'd need to pay the cost in full,  or I couldn't be seen by the doctor. So, I did just that.

Finally, long after the the scheduled time of my appointment, I was called back to provide a sample for the quick, mandatory urinalysis. From from there, I finally spoke with one of the nurses. It was then, that I was told the the doctor was not even at the office, he'd have to call me back. On my way out, I stopped to schedule my next procedure, but learned that she was not there either. I'd be waiting on two calls...

No calls ever came. When I contacted the office the following day to let them know, I was again instructed to wait on the same calls - and I got the same result. Nothing. That was weeks ago, and those calls never came. Now, imagine my surprise when I discovered that, despite being too busy to return my call, Von Tobel had found time to INVOICE ME for a $1200 piss test. Unbelievable.|My epidural that Dr. von Tobel gave me was outstanding. I would recommend this procedure to anyone with the same pain that I had. His staff is outstanding as well! If you have any problems with Pain please visit doctor Travis von tobel and his amazing staff they are a God sent miracle|Dr. Von Tobel is a legit HEALER and checks all the boxes that one would want in a Physician. He is smart, compassionate, and an excellent communicator. He is the best Doctor I have ever crossed paths with and I am so grateful that he is the one that is helping me with my back issues. Every office visit I come away impressed with the high level of customer service his staff provides. Quick shoutout to his staff members Melissa, Dani, & Chels for going above and beyond in assisting me on multiple fronts. I am forever grateful guys.|I have had chronic back pain for years and have gone to other pain physicians and all others just wanted to throw pills at you and none of the other physicians never suggested procedures to stop the pain.  I had 3 broken vertebrae. The Doctor did a procedure 3 weeks and I can I highly recommend this office. honestly say I am close to being pain free. If you are looking for relief and not pills  see these Doctors today.|Let me start by saying the staff was great but my experience with the doctor wasn't. My first appointment was in a bank that they turned into a doctor office... They asked me to fill out paperwork with pronouns and other ways to identify myself. I wrote on my application 2 or more races but when the doctor did my intake he changed it to what he identified me as. If he had done this with my pronouns I would easily have a lawsuit. After that he scheduled me for an appointment to give me a shot in my lower back. I called in before my appointment to ask additional questions because no one really told me what kind of shot it was or any side effects. When I called for some reason it rang into the doctor's office and when I asked questions he said he will answer the questions while I'm on the table during the procedure... I thought this was suspicious but I was in so much pain for so long I decided to go with it. After the procedure I was in excruciating pain for 3 days. I originally only had problems with my left side but then my right side started hurting. I decided not to follow up for obvious reasons. When my auto injury case finally settled I had a bill from this doctor for over $10,000 for 2 doctor's visits. It has been almost a month and we haven't heard how or why I was charged this excessive amount.

column2: Pain Care Florida - West Palm Beach

Pain Care Florida in West Palm Beach serves patients throughout Palm Beach County who struggle with acute and chronic pain conditions. Our dedicated team of pain management specialists focuses on developing personalized treatment plans that address the root causes of pain while minimizing reliance on medication. We combine advanced diagnostic techniques with comprehensive therapeutic approaches to help patients regain function and improve their quality of life.

At Pain Care Florida, we offer a wide range of interventional and non-interventional pain management treatments. Our specialists are experienced in treating various pain conditions including:

- Back and neck pain

- Joint pain and arthritis

- Neuropathic pain

- Sports injuries

- Cancer-related pain

Patient-Centered Approach

Our physicians take time to thoroughly evaluate each patient's condition. We believe in creating individualized treatment plans that may include:

- Physical therapy recommendations

Expert Medical Team

Our board-certified physicians bring decades of combined experience in pain management. Our medical team stays updated on the latest advancements in pain management to provide evidence-based care.

Convenient Location

This office is awful. They have charged me and my insurance for test that were not performed. I have notified my insurance carrier and the Doctors office but they still are billing me for test never performed. I actually have the documentation of the error and that I am correct.

I have spoken with several people in the billing office who say they will fix the problem. Then the following month, they bill me again. Hard to speak to the billing office, usually goes to voice mail but they do not return calls.

My next step will probably be to bring counsel into the matter to protect my credit.

I would avoid this office at all cost.|UPDATE - This office has had a change in administration/ownership resulting in Betsy no longer being there. So, DON'T bother! She was the best thing Dr. Weidenbaum had going for him. Definitely their loss.

Betsy, NP, is truly the BEST! So kind and caring. Always has your best interest at heart. Very knowledgeable.|Very welcoming and helpful office staff. Not sure what to expect but I was pleasantly surprised with the ease of securing an appointment. I was taken into the exam room a few minutes early. Dr. Reganbaum's MA was professional and efficient. Wish I could give you guys 10 stars!|Dr. Regenbaum actually takes the time and listens unlike most doctors I've visited. he provides less invasive procedures that work just as good as surgery. staff is super friendly. my back is really messed up and can't sit or stand for long that's why I love when I go to my monthly appointment the waiting time in the waiting room is less than five minuets. I highly recommend Interventional Pain Physicians of South Florida|I had an appointment with Angela for the first time and I am very pleased with her professionalism, and warm mannerism. We addressed my next steps to possibly help free me from my chronic pain and I will continue my journey.  I love telling everyone about Dr. Reganbaum's care for me and how he is ready to proceed with the next plan of action to help relieve my chronic pain and also that I don't have to take a thousand pills everyday. I tell everyone to go see him because he will help you with your pain issues. Thank you Dr. Reganbaum.|I am sweetly blown away with the care being received from Dr. Regenbaum and his team.

He dove right into my mess of diagnosis' and prognosis' and offered me help and hope. He has already provided a lumbar epidural with a neck one to come soon. His, and my, goal of not needing pain medication seems possible and probable, thank You, LORD!

His compassion from the first appointment sets him apart huge, in and of itself, but the overall experiences have been as pleasant as possible with chronic pain and added mental wellness issues. The whole crew are kind and empathetic on top of knowing their stuff. Grateful I am a new patient of Dr Regenbaum. Healing is a process most times and know there's much coming my way. Having a doctor that truly cares about my total well-being is a blessing from Above. Highly recommend!|Angela is a very kind and compassionate person. She is also a knowledgeable health professional who always listens to your questions and concerns before recommending a course of action. I highly encourage anybody needing help to contact her to address your issues and help you too.
