Pain Care of Clearwater serves Clearwater, FL with comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. Our experienced team specializes in treating chronic and acute pain conditions through an integrative approach that addresses both symptoms and underlying causes. Located at 51 S Main Ave in Clearwater, we provide compassionate care in a comfortable environment designed for healing.

Clearwater Office

Pain Care of Clearwater 51 S Main Ave Clearwater, FL 33765 Office: 727-572-6261 Fax: 727-443-2501 Hours: Monday to Wednesday, 8:30am to 4pm

Melbourne Office

Pain Care of Clearwater 3150 N Wickham Rd, Suite 9 Melbourne, FL Office: 727-572-6261 Fax: 727-443-2501 Hours: Monday to Wednesday, 8:30am to 4pm

Indian Harbor Beach Office

Atlantis Pain Care 2194 Hwy. A1A, Suite 104 Indian Harbor Beach, FL 32937 Office: 321-773-4134 Fax: 321-574-5611 Hours: Monday and Wednesday, 8:30am to 3pm

Our Approach to Pain Management

At Pain Care of Clearwater, we believe in treating the whole person, not just the pain. Our integrative method combines advanced medical techniques with complementary therapies for optimal results. We develop personalized treatment plans based on thorough evaluations of each patient's condition, medical history, and lifestyle factors.

Required Documentation

To ensure we provide the most effective treatment, we request patients bring: - Diagnostic Reports (MRI, X-rays) - Lab Reports - Surgical History - Physical Therapy Records - Previous Pain Management Information - Doctor's Progress Notes - Complete Medication History This comprehensive approach allows our specialists to develop targeted treatment strategies that address the root causes of pain while minimizing medication dependence. For more information or to schedule a consultation, please call us at 727-572-6261 or visit our website.

Huntsville Pain Management is a specialized medical clinic dedicated to comprehensive pain treatment solutions in Huntsville, Alabama. Located at 185 Chateau Dr SW, Unit 302, the practice offers personalized care for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions.

The clinic’s board-certified physicians combine advanced interventional techniques with medication management to address various pain sources. Patients receive customized treatment plans targeting back pain, neck pain, joint discomfort, neuropathic conditions, and post-surgical pain. The medical team emphasizes minimally invasive procedures when appropriate for patient comfort.

Huntsville Pain Management utilizes state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to identify precise pain origins. Treatment options include epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and physical therapy coordination. The physicians stay current with latest pain management research and techniques.

The practice accepts most major insurance plans and works with patients to navigate coverage questions. New patients typically receive comprehensive evaluations during initial consultations to establish personalized treatment strategies.

For appointment scheduling or questions about pain management services, patients can contact the clinic directly at (256) 885-1605. Additional information about treatments and physician credentials is available on their website: http://www.huntsvillepainmanagement.com/

Pain West serves the Papillion, NE area with comprehensive pain management solutions designed to improve quality of life for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. Established as a premier healthcare provider in the Omaha metropolitan region, Pain West combines multiple therapeutic approaches under one roof, offering patients convenient access to integrated care that addresses pain at its source rather than merely masking symptoms.

At Pain West, patients benefit from a multidisciplinary approach that includes professional chiropractic adjustments, customized physical therapy programs, advanced pain management techniques, and general medical services. This integrated model allows their healthcare professionals to develop personalized treatment plans that may combine various modalities for optimal results. The clinic specializes in treating back pain, neck pain, joint issues, sports injuries, and work-related injuries.

Expert Care Team

The clinic's team consists of board-certified physicians, licensed chiropractors, experienced physical therapists, and supporting medical staff who work collaboratively to address each patient's unique needs. Their practitioners stay current with the latest research and techniques in pain management to provide evidence-based care that promotes long-term healing and wellness.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Located at 701 Pinnacle Dr Suite 105 in Papillion, Pain West's modern facility is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technology. The clinic's comfortable environment is designed to put patients at ease while receiving care. New patients can easily schedule appointments by calling +1 402-505-7989 or visiting their website at http://painwest.com/.

Patient-Centered Approach

Pain West prioritizes patient education and active participation in the healing process. Their practitioners take time to thoroughly explain conditions, treatment options, and self-care strategies that can accelerate recovery and prevent future issues. This collaborative approach empowers patients to take control of their health while receiving expert guidance and support throughout their healing journey.

column40:
So far they have been very helpful and friendly. They treat me more like a person then just another patient. For that I am very grateful and they are coming up with a good game plan to help me get back on my own two feet.|Dr Kurt and their team are absolutely fantastic. From the time you walk in the door and speak to Precious behind the counter to when you leave with a true plan on how to get your body feeling better, it's a 10/10 experience. Dr Kurt and Dr Tonya truly care about their patients and making a difference in their community. Definitely recommend calling them if you are having any type of joint or back pain.|The physical therapy just wasn't what I was looking for at Pain West.  I sat there for 50 minutes doing stretches and exercises each time while the physical therapist sat mostly on his computer and/or watched sports on both TV's in the meantime.   The physical therapists and chiropractor would get together and hang out and watch sports on 2 TV's and talk sometimes.  I can't stand watching sports.  If that's your thing, cool.  To me, it's just ugh!   It would have also be nicer to have the physical therapy tables not all together in the middle of the room...some privacy would be nice.   The exercises were somewhat helpful but this wasn't what I was looking for overall.

I liked getting TPI shots in my muscles from Katie the P.A. She really is very nice!  However, my only complaint is that I didn't like that I could only get one area done per visit on the package.  I was also never informed by anyone in this entire process in the beginning that I wouldn't be able to get TPI shots in the front of my shoulder which was one of the reasons I was there so that was disappointing.

Overall,  I personally prefer al la carte services and charge my insurance as you go.  I didn't like that I had to fork out a bunch of money for services that I didn't know if I would like or not, find out that's not what I wanted and then wait for months and several phone calls later to get a refund when I decided I didn't want to go anymore.

Also, my time is precious.  For some people with chronic medical conditions, it takes a lot of energy to go to and from appointments.  I feel like it took 2 appts to get me in and get started on a package before we could actually get to work.  I found that to be very frustrating.|This place is amazing, Everyone here is professional and caring toward the patients,my care ,I received was outstanding, everything at one place for everything,I was 100% satisfied with my treatments,I would highly recommend to anyone needing treatment|Poor customer service. Bill additional charges at end of treatment of co pays that should have been collected at each visit. PT staff just sit at computer all the time.|Extremely helpful physical therapists and a bouncy medically trained PA who delivers the initially painful shots.  The male PA's have helped with the stretching of my knees so at least I can walk with less pain.  Referred by another chiropractor, I continue to go 30 minutes twice per week.  The front desk scheduler is Precious.  She is consistent and amazing! I'm not sure if I will ever graduate - the process is becoming less painful as the joints become accustomed to more weights.|I had my first massage experience here, and it could not have gone better. They made me feel comfortable and confident. The massage was thorough and very relaxing. I would definitely recommend.|Super friendly and very professional. They take great care of their clients and work well with the insurance companies.
Amy is an awesome massage therapist. She knows what needs to be done and does an excellent job of taking care of any problems that I may have. Wouldn't want anyone else to take care of me.

Montana Neuropathy and Spine Center serves Missoula, Montana and surrounding communities with specialized chiropractic and neurological care. Formerly known as Optimum Health and Wellness, our practice has evolved to focus on comprehensive treatment solutions for patients suffering from neuropathy, spine-related conditions, and chronic pain. Our dedicated team of healthcare professionals combines traditional chiropractic techniques with cutting-edge neurological approaches to address both acute pain management and long-term wellness goals.

At Montana Neuropathy and Spine Center, our goal is to help you do the things you love to do in life. Whether you're struggling with debilitating back pain that prevents you from hiking Montana's beautiful trails, or seeking preventative care to maintain your active lifestyle, we develop personalized treatment plans that align with your specific health objectives.

Comprehensive Services

Our practice offers a range of specialized treatments including:

- Neuropathy treatment protocols

- Spinal decompression therapy

- Chiropractic adjustments

- Rehabilitation exercises

- Wellness counseling

Patient-Centered Approach

Some patients come to us with pain issues while others are looking for overall wellness. In either situation, our team is committed to providing you the chiropractic care that will help you reach those goals. We take time to listen to your concerns, thoroughly evaluate your condition, and develop treatment strategies that address the root cause of your symptoms—not just mask the pain.

Contact Information

Website: [www.mtneurospine.com](https://www.mtneurospine.com/)

Phone: +1 406-317-1014

Address: 1001 SW Higgins Ave #102, Missoula, MT 59803, United States

Visit our convenient Missoula location today to begin your journey toward optimal health and pain-free living.

Meredith C. Ruland, PAC serves Missoula, Montana as a dedicated physician assistant specializing in pain medicine. With a compassionate approach to healthcare, she has established a practice focused on empowering patients through education about their pain and spine conditions. Her philosophy centers on ensuring patients fully understand their medical situations, enabling them to become active participants in their own healing journeys. Ms. Ruland emphasizes conservative therapeutic approaches while treating each individual holistically, recognizing that effective pain management requires attention to both physical symptoms and emotional well-being.

At her practice located at 500 W Broadway St, Floor 3, Missoula, MT 59802, Ms. Ruland offers specialized care for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. Her expertise encompasses a wide range of pain-related issues, with particular focus on spine conditions that can significantly impact quality of life. Rather than simply addressing symptoms, she works diligently to identify root causes and develop personalized treatment plans that align with each patient's unique circumstances and goals.

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes Ms. Ruland's practice is her commitment to patient education and involvement. She takes the time to thoroughly explain diagnoses, treatment options, and expected outcomes, believing that informed patients achieve better results. This collaborative approach fosters a trusting relationship between provider and patient, creating an environment where healing can flourish. Her attention to the whole person—considering physical, emotional, and lifestyle factors—ensures that treatment plans are both effective and sustainable.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with Meredith C. Ruland, PAC, patients can call +1 406-327-1670. Her practice is affiliated with Providence Health, and additional information about her services can be found at Providence Health's website. New patients are welcome, and most major insurance plans are accepted.

column3:
Great Plains Health Pain Management in North Platte, Nebraska offers comprehensive pain management services designed to address the complex nature of chronic pain. Understanding that pain is influenced by many factors, including psychological, biomedical, and social or environmental conditions, our multidisciplinary team takes a holistic approach to pain treatment. As a leader in pain medicine in the Great Plains region, we combine cutting-edge medical expertise with genuine compassion to deliver accurate diagnoses and successful treatment plans tailored to each patient's unique needs.

At Great Plains Health Pain Management, we specialize in treating various chronic pain conditions through innovative and evidence-based approaches. Our team of board-certified pain specialists works diligently to identify the root causes of pain, rather than simply masking symptoms. We utilize advanced diagnostic techniques and develop personalized treatment plans that may include interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and behavioral health strategies.

Our Patient-Centered Approach

We recognize that chronic pain affects every aspect of a person's life. That's why our goal with every patient we serve is to return them to a life as fully functional as possible. Our compassionate staff takes the time to listen to patients' concerns, thoroughly evaluate their conditions, and develop treatment strategies that address both the physical and emotional aspects of pain. This comprehensive approach helps patients regain control of their lives and improve their overall quality of life.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Located at 500 W Leota St, Suite 100, in North Platte, NE, our modern facility is equipped with the latest technology to provide effective pain management solutions. Our convenient location serves patients throughout Nebraska and surrounding areas, offering accessible care for those suffering from chronic pain conditions.

To schedule a consultation with our pain management specialists, please call +1 308-568-3660 or visit our website at https://www.gphealth.org/services/pain-management/ for more information about our services and treatment options.
column11: Pain is influenced by many factors, including psychological, biomedical and social or environmental conditions. As a leader in pain medicine, Great Plains Health Pain Management combines expertise and compassion to deliver accurate diagnosis and successful treatments targeted at alleviating chronic pain. Our goal with every patient we serve is to return him or her to a life as fully functional as possible.

MD Pain serves patients throughout Southeast Nebraska with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of board-certified physicians brings over two decades of specialized experience to help patients find relief from both common and uncommon pain syndromes. With three convenient locations across the region, we've established ourselves as trusted partners in pain control and management, offering personalized treatment plans designed to not only alleviate discomfort but also restore functionality and improve quality of life.

At MD Pain, we utilize advanced techniques and evidence-based approaches to address various pain conditions. Our comprehensive services include:

  • Epidural injections

  • Spinal cord stimulation

  • Joint injections

  • Medication management

  • Specialized treatment for migraines and headaches

  • Back pain management

  • Customized pain control protocols

Our Patient-Centered Approach

What sets MD Pain apart is our unwavering commitment to professional, ethical, and compassionate care. We understand that pain affects each person differently, which is why we develop individualized treatment plans tailored to each patient's specific needs and circumstances. Our physicians take the time to thoroughly evaluate your condition, explain treatment options, and work collaboratively with you to determine the most effective path forward.

Visit Our Lincoln Location

Our Lincoln office is conveniently located at 4130 Pioneer Woods Dr #4, Lincoln, NE 68506. To schedule an appointment with our experienced pain management team, please call us at (402) 858-0117. For more information about our services and other locations, visit our website at mdpain.clinic.
column11:
For patients who are looking for a pain control clinic or experienced pain management physicians, MD Pain is here for you. Our board certified physicians have over two decades of experience and are committed to providing quality care for the treatment of common and uncommon pain syndromes. Our goal is to relieve pain and restore function.

We offer epidural injections, spinal cord stimulation, joint injections, medication management, pain control management for migraines, headaches, back pain, and more. Our goal is to treat every patient with professional, ethical, compassionate care, tailored to their individual needs. We have 3 locations throughout Southeast Nebraska.

Give us a call at our Lincoln office to schedule an appointment!

Dunes Pain Specialists in Norfolk, Nebraska offers comprehensive pain management solutions for patients throughout Northeast Nebraska. Our specialized medical practice focuses on diagnosing and treating chronic pain conditions using evidence-based approaches tailored to each patient's unique needs. With a commitment to improving quality of life, our board-certified physicians combine advanced interventional techniques with holistic treatment plans to address both the symptoms and underlying causes of persistent pain.

At Dunes Pain Specialists, we provide a wide range of treatments for conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and complex regional pain syndrome. Our interventional procedures include epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and medication management. Each treatment plan is developed with careful consideration of the patient's medical history, current condition, and long-term wellness goals.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in establishing meaningful partnerships with our patients through clear communication and education. Our team takes the time to thoroughly explain diagnoses, treatment options, and expected outcomes, empowering patients to make informed decisions about their care. This collaborative approach has helped countless individuals reclaim their lives from debilitating pain conditions.

column40:
Dr bertis was very kind and he listened to me and actually heard me.  He is a spiritual man and I like that.  His staff is very kind as well.  I give them a 10 if it was on a scale.  Very kind man that has your best interest In mind.  I wild recommend him to everyone I know that suffers. He doesn't bully you like some of my dr have.  Thank God for sending me to Dr. Bertis.|The post I'm writing is from the beach in Galveston, TX. It would not be possible for me to drive all those hours and enjoy my time at the beach with my Great Dane Mouse and my Goldie girl Jessie if it wasn't for Dr Bertus and all of his super staff.
I've suffered from DDD a.d RA for more than 20 years, but with his and their help I'm able to do most of the things I want to do.
I imagine theirs is not an easy job, I appreciate all of them|This office is very kind and caring. Dr. Bertus listens to everything I have to say and is willing to help in any way he can!|I was very impressed with his professionalism and great bedside personality.  He took time to make sure that I was well informed on my situation|I do not recommend this clinic. Dr. Price is very good but the rest of the staff are incompetent and one lady that works the reception desk is just rude. They messed up the paperwork for my short-term disability multiple times and didn't send the Doctors' notes with the paperwork. I was referred back to them for a second injection by a neurosurgeon's office two weeks ago. I never got a call from them so I just called them and they said they had received the referral and I needed to come in for a consultation. When I asked why they had not contacted me the nurse said that was not her department.|Doctor Price was very thorough at my consultation visit, and explained what was going on in my back and why I was experiencing pain. I wanted to try a steroid injection in my back to try and get pain relief. He explained that there is no guarantee that it will work. Had the injection today. Wasn't near as bad as I had expected, and the actual procedure didn't take long. Waiting for the procedure was a lot longer wait.  I was able to drive myself home and have not had any problems. The entire staff were all friendly and professional. I would recommend them to a friend.|My name is actually Keisha, I have had some days at this clinic where the front desk was rude and the drs. seemed rude but those have only been a few. I've had bad experience with the injections and thanks to Dr. Carey we have figured out that I can no longer do the injections. When the pandemic happened the staff (front desk ladies) were beyond helpful getting me setup for teleahealth appointments. The nurses are very quick to call you back and email you back to answer any questions. I was seeing Dr. Carey for the longest time and she was always friendly and listened to me and answered any questions I had. She has very good bedside manners. Now I'm seeing a Dr. Stephanie from the Norfolk office and even though I was sad to not be able to see Dr. Carey anymore I feel like she left me in good hands. Dr. Stephanie is always caring, friendly, welcoming and listens to my concerns. She also explains terms very welcome. I have enjoyed my experience with this clinic and I highly recommend it. I understand that some nurses and Dr's. as well as front desk ladies might have off days especially during these trying times but most days they are friendly and caring|Dr. Is so compassionate and caring for my pain issues

column3:
Nebraska Pain Institute serves Lincoln, Nebraska and surrounding areas as the premier destination for comprehensive pain management solutions. Founded on principles of innovative care and patient-centered treatment, our institute brings together a team of highly specialized physicians dedicated to alleviating chronic and acute pain conditions through advanced medical interventions.

C. Weston Whitten, MD

Dr. Whitten leads our practice as a double-board certified Anesthesiologist and Pain Management Physician. His prestigious training at Wake Forest University, recognized as the top Pain Management Fellowship in the world, has equipped him with exceptional expertise in addressing complex pain conditions.

Douglas Spurgeon, MD

As a Board-Certified Anesthesiologist and Pain Management Specialist, Dr. Spurgeon brings valuable skills and knowledge to our multidisciplinary approach to pain treatment.

Austin Reilly, MD

Dr. Reilly completes our team of pain management experts, contributing to our comprehensive care model.

Advanced Treatment Options

At Nebraska Pain Institute, we pride ourselves on offering the widest array of pain management treatments available in Nebraska. Our multi-modal approach includes:

- Specialized Injections

- Epidural Procedures

- Radiofrequency Ablation

- Spinal Cord Stimulation

- Kyphoplasty

- Superion Implants

Visit Nebraska's Pain Management Leaders

We are conveniently located at 7350 Willowbrook Ln, Suite 200, Lincoln, NE 68526. For consultations or questions about our innovative pain solutions, contact us at (402) 488-7246 or visit our website at [www.nebraskapaininstitute.com](https://www.nebraskapaininstitute.com/?utmsource=gmbauth).

column3:
Innovative Pain & Spine Specialists serves Omaha, Nebraska and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized medical practice focuses on addressing chronic pain through advanced interventional techniques when traditional pain management approaches have fallen short. Led by Dr. Brooks and our team of dedicated specialists, we combine medical expertise with compassionate care to help patients regain control of their lives and reduce suffering from persistent pain conditions.

At Innovative Pain & Spine Specialists, we utilize a diverse range of cutting-edge interventional procedures tailored to each patient's unique needs:

  • Targeted Injections & Nerve Blocks - Precisely administered to interrupt pain signals

  • Spinal Cord Stimulation - Advanced technology that modulates pain transmission

  • Radiofrequency Ablation - Minimally invasive technique to reduce nerve pain

  • Cancer Pain Management - Specialized interventional approaches for oncology patients

Our Commitment to Pain Medicine Advancement

Beyond clinical care, our specialists actively work with physicians, legislators, insurance providers, and the public to increase understanding about chronic pain's societal impact and optimal treatment approaches. We advocate for improved access to effective pain management solutions and contribute to advancing the field through education and awareness.

Visit Our Practice

We welcome new patients at our comfortable, modern facility located at 17021 Lakeside Hills Plaza, Suite 100, Omaha, NE 68130. Schedule your personal consultation with Dr. Brooks by calling (402) 413-5010 or visiting our website at innovativepainnebraska.com. Our team is dedicated to developing personalized treatment plans that address your specific pain concerns and improve your quality of life.
column11:
At Innovative Pain & Spine Specialists, we offer cutting-edge treatments to treat chronic pain when other types of pain management may not be as effective. From various types of targeted injections and nerve blocks, to spinal cord stimulation, radiofrequency ablation, and interventional procedures to manage pain from cancer, we are able to provide patients with many options to treat their chronic pain.

Together, our pain medicine specialists are working to help other physicians, legislators, insurance companies, and the general public to understand the impact chronic pain has on society and how it is best treated. Schedule your consultation with Dr Brooks today!

Other than the pain from the procedure,  the other pain is already diminished,  while it could take 4-12 weeks to work, I can already feel improvement a day later. column2: Grand Island Pain Relief Center, P.C.
column3:
Grand Island Pain Relief Center, P.C. serves patients throughout Grand Island, Nebraska and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Founded by Dr. Prasad Birthi, our specialized medical practice is dedicated to diagnosing and treating chronic pain conditions using evidence-based approaches. Our team of pain management specialists works diligently to improve patients' quality of life through personalized treatment plans that address the root causes of discomfort rather than simply masking symptoms.

Dr. Prasad Birthi brings exceptional credentials to his role as the center's leading physician. After earning his medical degree from Bangalore Medical College in India, Dr. Birthi completed both his internship and residency in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation at the University of Kentucky Medical Center in Lexington, Kentucky. He further specialized by completing a fellowship in Pain Medicine at the same prestigious institution. This comprehensive training enables him to offer patients advanced interventional pain management techniques alongside traditional treatment approaches.

Comprehensive Services

At Grand Island Pain Relief Center, we treat a wide spectrum of pain conditions including but not limited to back and neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, complex regional pain syndrome, and pain resulting from workplace injuries or automobile accidents. Our treatment modalities range from medication management and physical therapy recommendations to advanced interventional procedures such as epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in creating individualized treatment plans that consider each patient's unique circumstances, medical history, and personal goals. Our compassionate staff ensures patients feel heard, respected, and involved in their treatment decisions. This collaborative approach leads to better outcomes and higher patient satisfaction.

Contact Information

For consultations or to learn more about our services, please contact us at (308) 675-3222. Our clinic is conveniently located at 403 Lexington Circle, Grand Island, NE 68803. Additional information about our practice, services, and patient resources can be found on our website at www.giprc.com.
column11: Dr. Birthi earned his medical degree from Bangalore Medical College in India. He completed the his internship and residency in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation and his fellowship in Pain medicine at University of Kentucky Medical Center in Lexington, Kentucky.
column38: Jordyn Johnson|Kille78|Josh Bulkley|Kim Gates|Ronald Mitchell|Sherri Ummel|Kathy Rincon|Kerry Garcia
column40:
I don't leave google reviews, maybe once or twice before. But I have to completely disagree with the 1 stars. I have had a completely different experience with Doctor Birthi. My first appointment with him yes was very quick, and I was not sure how to proceed as my insurance for some reason, although very good, continued to deny much needed injections. When this continued to be an issue he took the time to get my PT records and prove I had been going for many months longer than insurance had originally required. He was kind and empathetic. The entire staff is nice and friendly. It is a busy office, but they always work around my hectic schedule to get me in.|I truly hate to give such a low rating because 99% of my experiences with this clinic have been phenomenal. My issue is solely with Dr. Birthi. To say he is rude is an understatement. He talks at you, not with you. He will not listen to a word you say and rushes through appointments as fast as he can. He'll leave you with demands to complete invasive and expensive procedures after ignoring you having said that you have either already tried them or cannot afford them. My first experience with him lasted maybe 5 minutes and I never got a word in edgewise and I have a large medical history spanning 30+ years. I left with demands to complete $10,000+ of procedures that I was not comfortable with nor able to complete but he wouldn't know that because he interrupted me 2 words into every attempt to voice my concerns. I've been with this clinic quite awhile and cannot speak highly enough about the rest of the doctors, nurses and staff I have interacted with but the fact that they all have not only agreed with my complaints and have apologized profusely for his behavior but also the fact that he cannot retain enough staff to provide consistent services says everything that you need to know. I've been lucky if I've gotten the same doctor twice in a row. They're constantly batted back and forth between their locations just to try and cover appointments until they seemingly quit which is sad because they've been some of the best doctors I've come across.|I have been coming here for the last maybe 5 to 6 months. Every time I'm here they are always so nice and helpful even when I ask the same stupid question two or three times they still answer it as well as make me feel comfortable with what's going to happen with injections or just doing check ups. I highly highly recommend them for your needs. The staff is very nice as well.|Dr. Birthi and Shelly are great. The whole staff is fantastic. They are always attentive to my needs, willing to listen, and ready to help. Love this place.|It's never good to have to go to a pain clinic but these people are top professionals.
I've been coming to them for over a year and I've never had a bad experience.
Everyone I have worked with have been cheerful professional and patient.
I would highly recommend them if you're trying to find a professional pain clinic|Grand Island Pain Relief, Dr. Birthi has been wonderful. He and his staff always are so attentive and helpful. Kudos! Definitely highly recommended|I have been going to Dr Birthi For Several Years Now. He is a very caring Dr. And all his Staff are very Friendly and Always willing to help their patients. I recommend this Clini. 100%|I have always given 5 star rating until now. I just recently had 2 separate appts within a couple week span.  The first one i was given a UA no explanation. I did ask the receptionists why I was having to give a UA, with no response.   Not that I have anything to hide. I did indeed submit the UA. As I left that appt there was a brief oh, that UA wasn't meant for you. (Hmmmm ok) I was just there yesterday for acupuncture on my neck. I felt the doc rubbing on the back of my neck line (on my tshirt I had just literally gotten for my birthday the day before.) I asked if she had gotten ink on my shirt. She answered with no!!!!!!! I take my shower last night only to see ink stains. I'm very disappointed with how I was bluntly lied to and then no explanation for the UA. Kerry Garcia

column40:
So far they have been very helpful and friendly. They treat me more like a person then just another patient. For that I am very grateful and they are coming up with a good game plan to help me get back on my own two feet.|Dr Kurt and their team are absolutely fantastic. From the time you walk in the door and speak to Precious behind the counter to when you leave with a true plan on how to get your body feeling better, it's a 10/10 experience. Dr Kurt and Dr Tonya truly care about their patients and making a difference in their community. Definitely recommend calling them if you are having any type of joint or back pain.|The physical therapy just wasn't what I was looking for at Pain West.  I sat there for 50 minutes doing stretches and exercises each time while the physical therapist sat mostly on his computer and/or watched sports on both TV's in the meantime.   The physical therapists and chiropractor would get together and hang out and watch sports on 2 TV's and talk sometimes.  I can't stand watching sports.  If that's your thing, cool.  To me, it's just ugh!   It would have also be nicer to have the physical therapy tables not all together in the middle of the room...some privacy would be nice.   The exercises were somewhat helpful but this wasn't what I was looking for overall.

I liked getting TPI shots in my muscles from Katie the P.A. She really is very nice!  However, my only complaint is that I didn't like that I could only get one area done per visit on the package.  I was also never informed by anyone in this entire process in the beginning that I wouldn't be able to get TPI shots in the front of my shoulder which was one of the reasons I was there so that was disappointing.

Overall,  I personally prefer al la carte services and charge my insurance as you go.  I didn't like that I had to fork out a bunch of money for services that I didn't know if I would like or not, find out that's not what I wanted and then wait for months and several phone calls later to get a refund when I decided I didn't want to go anymore.

Also, my time is precious.  For some people with chronic medical conditions, it takes a lot of energy to go to and from appointments.  I feel like it took 2 appts to get me in and get started on a package before we could actually get to work.  I found that to be very frustrating.|This place is amazing, Everyone here is professional and caring toward the patients,my care ,I received was outstanding, everything at one place for everything,I was 100% satisfied with my treatments,I would highly recommend to anyone needing treatment|Poor customer service. Bill additional charges at end of treatment of co pays that should have been collected at each visit. PT staff just sit at computer all the time.|Extremely helpful physical therapists and a bouncy medically trained PA who delivers the initially painful shots.  The male PA's have helped with the stretching of my knees so at least I can walk with less pain.  Referred by another chiropractor, I continue to go 30 minutes twice per week.  The front desk scheduler is Precious.  She is consistent and amazing! I'm not sure if I will ever graduate - the process is becoming less painful as the joints become accustomed to more weights.|I had my first massage experience here, and it could not have gone better. They made me feel comfortable and confident. The massage was thorough and very relaxing. I would definitely recommend.|Super friendly and very professional. They take great care of their clients and work well with the insurance companies.
Amy is an awesome massage therapist. She knows what needs to be done and does an excellent job of taking care of any problems that I may have. Wouldn't want anyone else to take care of me.

column3:
Total Body Pain Institute serves Grand Island, NE with comprehensive pain management solutions designed to help patients reclaim their lives from chronic discomfort. Our specialized medical team understands that joint pain can significantly impact your quality of life, making even simple daily activities challenging. We've established ourselves as a leading pain relief center in the region by combining evidence-based treatments with personalized care plans tailored to each patient's unique needs.

At Total Body Pain Institute, we pride ourselves on utilizing cutting-edge technology to address pain at its source. Our radiofrequency ablation treatment offers long-lasting relief by targeting the specific nerves responsible for transmitting pain signals. This minimally invasive procedure has helped countless patients experience significant reduction in chronic pain without extensive recovery time.

Specialized Muscle Pain Treatments

For patients suffering from muscle-related discomfort, our trigger point therapy targets compressed muscle areas that often cause referred pain throughout the body. Our skilled practitioners precisely identify these trigger points and apply specialized techniques to release tension and restore proper muscle function, providing both immediate relief and long-term benefits.

Personalized Care Approach

We understand that pain management isn't one-size-fits-all. Our team takes the time to thoroughly evaluate your condition, medical history, and lifestyle factors to develop a customized treatment plan that addresses your specific pain concerns. We're committed to finding solutions that not only manage symptoms but improve your overall quality of life.

Visit us at our convenient location: 826 Diers Ave, Grand Island, NE 68803. To schedule a consultation, call us at (308) 708-2826 or learn more about our services at totalbodypaininstitute.com.
column11:
Joint pain can take a serious toll on your daily life. If you're struggling with chronic pain, you need a lasting solution. Total Body Pain Institute offers a variety of treatment options at our pain relief centers in Grand Island, NE. We use cutting-edge technology like radiofrequency ablation to stop your pain at the source.

Dealing with muscle pain? Our team also uses trigger point therapy to target areas of compressed muscle that might be causing you pain. We'll work hard to find a pain management solution that meets your needs.

column3:
Joseph P. Mulka, M.D., PhD serves Lincoln, Nebraska with exceptional ophthalmology care, combining his extensive medical expertise with advanced engineering knowledge. A Michigan native with deep academic roots, Dr. Mulka brings a unique perspective to eye care through his dual specialization in medicine and biomedical engineering. His practice offers comprehensive eye examinations, specialized treatments, and surgical interventions for patients throughout the Lincoln metropolitan area and surrounding communities.

Dr. Joseph Mulka was born and raised in Michigan, where he established a strong foundation in both engineering and medicine. His academic journey began at the University of Michigan, where he completed his undergraduate studies in mechanical engineering. Continuing at the same prestigious institution, he earned both his Masters and Doctorate degrees in biomedical engineering, developing specialized knowledge that would later inform his medical practice.

His medical education was completed at the Wayne State University School of Medicine in Detroit, Michigan, followed by a transitional year internship at St. Joseph Mercy Hospital in Ann Arbor. During his internship, Dr. Mulka demonstrated exceptional leadership skills and was appointed chief transitional year resident, overseeing fellow medical professionals while refining his clinical expertise.

Specialized Care and Services

At his Lincoln practice, Dr. Mulka applies his unique combination of engineering principles and medical knowledge to provide innovative approaches to eye care. His background in biomedical engineering gives him distinctive insight into the mechanical and structural aspects of ophthalmology, allowing for more precise diagnoses and treatment plans.

Location and Contact Information

Dr. Mulka's practice is conveniently located at 575 S 70th St #200, Lincoln, NE 68510, United States. Patients can schedule consultations and appointments by calling +1 402-436-2000. For additional information about Dr. Mulka's services, qualifications, and patient resources, visit his official website.
column11: Dr. Joseph Mulka was born and raised in Michigan. He completed his undergraduate studies in mechanical engineering at the University of Michigan. He also completed his Masters and Doctorate in biomedical engineering at the University of Michigan. He earned his medical degree from the Wayne State University School of Medicine in Detroit, Michigan. This was followed by a transitional year internship at St. Joseph Mercy Hospital in Ann Arbor, MI where he served as the chief transitional year resident.

column40: Horrible bed side manner! The nurse (Jan) that was helping Dr. Mulka was amazing! Dr. Mulka was NOT! He came in and barely introduced himself before he started. When I finally got in for my Iovera injection, nothing was explained to me, there was no deadening as the instructions I was given said there would be. Two days out my knee hurts worse than before, it is swollen. I thought this was to relieve my pain, not make it worse.|Dr. Mulka was very good with everything he did for me, and the young lady that got me ready was very-very helpful, she explained everything very well, and relieved all my fears!! 5 stars to both of them!! Nebraska Spine + Pain Center serves patients across Nebraska, with its primary location in Omaha and additional facilities in Columbus, Fremont, Grand Island, Lexington, Norfolk, and South Sioux City. As the region's most preferred spine center, we've established ourselves as the trusted destination for comprehensive back, neck, and spine care. Our team of board-certified and fellowship-trained specialists includes orthopedic spine surgeons, neurosurgeons, and pain management physicians who focus exclusively on spinal conditions, ensuring you receive expert treatment tailored to your specific needs.

At Nebraska Spine + Pain Center, our medical professionals have dedicated their careers to understanding and treating the complexities of spinal conditions. This specialized focus allows our team to stay at the forefront of innovative treatments and surgical techniques. Whether you're suffering from chronic back pain, herniated discs, spinal stenosis, or require complex reconstructive surgery, our physicians offer the advanced expertise needed to address your condition effectively.

Comprehensive Treatment Approach

We understand that each patient's experience with back and neck pain is unique. That's why we provide individualized care plans that may include non-surgical interventions, minimally invasive procedures, or advanced surgical solutions when necessary. Our goal is always to improve your quality of life while minimizing recovery time and helping you return to your daily activities as quickly as possible.

Convenient Locations Throughout Nebraska

With multiple locations across the state, we make specialized spine care accessible to patients throughout Nebraska. Our main facility in Omaha at 13616 California St, Suite 100, serves as our central hub, equipped with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technology.

If you're ready to take the first step toward relief from back, neck, or spine pain, contact us at (402) 496-0404 or visit our website at www.nebraskaspineandpain.com to schedule a consultation. At Nebraska Spine + Pain Center, we're committed to helping you get back to living your life without pain.
column11: At the region's most preferred spine center, you can trust that you are in the right place for extraordinary back, neck, and spine care. Our board-certified and fellowship-trained orthopedic spine surgeons, Neurosurgeon and pain physicians are here to offer you their expertise to get you back to your life. Working exclusively with the back, neck and spine, our spine doctors are Nebraska's trusted spine providers.

Momenta Pain Care in Omaha, Nebraska serves as the region's premier destination for comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized clinic combines traditional pain management approaches with cutting-edge regenerative medicine techniques to address both acute and chronic pain conditions. As Nebraska's leading regenerative medicine center, we pride ourselves on offering personalized treatment plans that focus on improving quality of life while minimizing dependency on medication.

At Momenta Pain Care, we understand that pain affects each patient differently. Our multidisciplinary team provides thorough evaluations to identify the root causes of discomfort, developing tailored treatment strategies that may include interventional procedures, physical therapy, medication management, and advanced regenerative options. We specialize in treating conditions ranging from back and neck pain to joint disorders, sports injuries, and neuropathic pain syndromes.

Advanced Regenerative Medicine

As pioneers in regenerative medicine within Nebraska, we proudly offer Regenexx advanced stem cell therapy and platelet-rich plasma (PRP) treatments for orthopedic conditions. These cutting-edge procedures harness the body's natural healing capabilities to repair damaged tissues, reduce inflammation, and promote long-term recovery without the risks associated with surgery. Our regenerative approaches have helped countless patients return to activities they once thought impossible.

Compassionate, Patient-Centered Care

What truly sets Momenta Pain Care apart is our unwavering commitment to compassionate care. We recognize that chronic pain affects not just physical health but emotional wellbeing and quality of life. Our practitioners take time to listen, educate, and involve patients in their treatment decisions, fostering a supportive environment where healing can flourish.

Visit Our Facility

Located at 1805 N 145th St, Omaha, NE 68154, our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art technology to provide the highest standard of care. To schedule a consultation or learn more about our innovative pain management solutions, call us at (402) 991-6559 or visit our website at momentapaincare.com. Take the first step toward a life with less pain today.

I can't say enough about the staff. God bless and have a very merry Christmas and a happy new year, From my family to yours, be safe. Thank you, Dr Piperis Dr. Reed Kim Carrie Morgan all the staff I wish you nothing but the best!|Rated the Best in Omaha for a reason. He is truly invested in providing his patients the best possible care with multiple pain relief options.  The Best!|Overall my visit to momentum Pain Care location voice very positive doctor and his staff were were very professional and helpful. I had procedures done on both of my knees and felt much better next day.|Dr.P is the Best!! Always concerned about his patient's and their well-being. He checks all avenues to help with your pain and discomfort.  So very thankful for having him as my Chronic pain Dr.|Whether I see Dr Pieperis or Reed Jarecke, I always receive the absolute  best care! You never have to wait for what seems like forever at another office. They also both take the time to really listen to what's going on and offer alternative solutions, and talking through the pros and cons of each! There are other doctors close to where I live, but I'd make the drive even if it was 100 miles one way!|I moved away and miss Dr. Piperis.  I received much better care from Dr. Piperis for my Thoracic Outlet Syndrome than I am now getting at Stanford.  Dr. Piperis is world class!|I can recomemend Momenta Pain Care, Doctor Piperis, his Medical Assistants and All the Staff to anyone! They are excellent in all they do, and their professionalism, care and compassion is above and beyond! I appreciate you All!|I am extremely satisfied with the care I received from Dr. Evans, Nancy and the staff.

For historical reference I sought treatment with Dr. Schultz at Regenexx in Bloomfield Colorado in 2012 receiving three Platelet Rich Plasma injections to my spine and remained symptom free for eight years.

In 2020 I injured my back during a lifting incident and symptoms returned. In 2023 I really injured my back repeatedly lifting 50 lb bags of wet soil. I was referred to Dr. Evans for a lumbar steroid injection. Following the lumbar epidural steroid injection I was chatting with the staff and noticed a brochure from Regenexx in Colorado. I told Dr. Evans my story. Lo and behold, Dr. Evans was affiliated with Dr. Schultz and he followed Regenexx protocol. My spine degeneration had advanced and there was no guarantee I would enjoy the same level of relief as in 2012. However, Dr. Evans agreed to try and help me once again with Platelet Rich Plasma injections.This time I received eight injections in my spine and SI joint in August 2024. It is the middle of October 2024 and my back pain has resolved.

I am going to do my part to strengthen my core, stretch, recondition my upper and lower body and never again lift that kind of weight. By the way, I am 73 yo female, living on an acreage and I am looking for an estate manager.

Midwest Pain Clinics serves patients throughout Bellevue, Nebraska and the surrounding metropolitan area with specialized pain management solutions. Founded with a commitment to addressing chronic pain at its source, our medical practice has established itself as a leading provider of interventional pain management in the Midwest region. Our board-certified physicians bring decades of combined experience in diagnosing and treating complex pain conditions using evidence-based approaches that minimize reliance on medication alone.

At Midwest Pain Clinics, we offer a wide spectrum of treatment options tailored to each patient's unique condition. Our specialists excel in minimally invasive procedures including epidural steroid injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and targeted nerve blocks. We treat conditions ranging from back and neck pain to complex regional pain syndrome, focusing on restoring function and improving quality of life without extensive surgical intervention.

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes our practice is our unwavering commitment to personalized care. Each treatment plan begins with a thorough evaluation to identify the precise source of pain rather than simply addressing symptoms. Our physicians take time to educate patients about their conditions and available treatment options, ensuring informed participation in healthcare decisions. This collaborative approach has resulted in consistently positive outcomes and high patient satisfaction rates.

State-of-the-Art Facilities

Our Bellevue clinic at 2206 Longo Dr, Suite 201, features advanced diagnostic and treatment technology in a comfortable, welcoming environment. The facility is designed to provide efficient care while maintaining the highest standards of medical practice. Convenient parking and accessibility features ensure that patients with mobility challenges can access our services with minimal difficulty.

If chronic pain is limiting your life, contact Midwest Pain Clinics today at (402) 391-7246 to schedule a consultation. Visit midwestpainclinics.com to learn more about our services and approach to pain management. Our dedicated team is ready to help you return to work, family activities, and the lifestyle you deserve.

John R. Massey, M.D. serves Lincoln, Nebraska with exceptional pain management services. As a board-certified physician specializing in interventional pain medicine, Dr. Massey brings extensive expertise to patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. His practice combines evidence-based treatments with compassionate care, offering personalized solutions that address the unique needs of each individual.

At his practice located at 4130 Pioneer Woods Dr #4, Lincoln, NE 68506, Dr. Massey provides a wide range of interventional procedures and treatment options. His approach focuses on identifying the root cause of pain rather than simply masking symptoms, allowing for more effective long-term management strategies.

Specialized Treatment Areas

Dr. Massey's expertise encompasses various pain conditions including:

  • Spinal pain (cervical, thoracic, and lumbar)

  • Joint pain and arthritis

  • Neuropathic pain disorders

  • Post-surgical pain

  • Complex regional pain syndrome

  • Cancer-related pain

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes Dr. Massey's practice is his commitment to patient education and involvement in the treatment process. He takes time to thoroughly explain conditions and treatment options, ensuring patients can make informed decisions about their care. This collaborative approach has earned him high satisfaction ratings among his patients.

Practice Information

To schedule a consultation with Dr. John R. Massey, patients can call +1 402-858-0117 or visit his profile at https://mdpain.clinic/dr-john-massey/. The office accepts most major insurance plans and offers convenient scheduling options for both new and returning patients.

With his combination of advanced medical training, specialized expertise in pain management, and compassionate patient care, Dr. Massey has established himself as a trusted healthcare provider in the Lincoln community.

When I told her who I had chosen from the recommendations of primary care, her exact response was "I have seen Dr. Massey and you will love him BECAUSE HE LISTENS". Listening is most important but you can tell he also understands the nature of chronic pain. Anxiety and severe fatigue accompany chronic pain. column2: Nebraska Medicine Chronic Pain Management at Specialty Services Pavilion
column3:
Nebraska Medicine Chronic Pain Management at Specialty Services Pavilion serves Omaha, NE with comprehensive pain management solutions for patients whose chronic pain has not responded to traditional treatments. Located on the fifth floor of the Specialty Services Pavilion, this specialized clinic is part of Nebraska Medicine's extensive healthcare network that includes more than 1,000 physicians and 40 specialty and primary care clinics throughout Omaha and surrounding communities.

Our chronic pain management program is specifically designed for individuals who have not found relief through conventional interventions. The multidisciplinary team utilizes advanced techniques and innovative approaches to address complex pain conditions, offering hope to patients who have exhausted other options.

Part of Nebraska's Premier Healthcare System

As an integral component of Nebraska Medicine, patients benefit from the organization's extensive resources, including its hospitals in Omaha and Bellevue. The clinic's close partnership with the University of Nebraska Medical Center (UNMC) ensures patients receive the most current, evidence-based treatments available in the Midwest, with access to cutting-edge research and clinical advancements.

Integrated Pain Specialists of Omaha, Nebraska serves the greater Omaha metropolitan area with comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. Our dedicated team of board-certified physicians specializes in treating chronic pain conditions through innovative, evidence-based approaches that focus on improving quality of life while minimizing medication dependence.

At the Office of Pain Management Clinic Physicians, we understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of your life. Our multidisciplinary approach combines advanced interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy recommendations, and behavioral health strategies to address pain at its source. We treat conditions including back and neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, complex regional pain syndrome, and post-surgical pain.

Our Comprehensive Approach

What sets Integrated Pain Specialists apart is our commitment to personalized care plans that evolve with your progress. Our physicians take time to thoroughly evaluate each patient, considering medical history, previous treatments, and personal goals before developing customized treatment strategies. We utilize state-of-the-art diagnostic tools and interventional techniques including epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and regenerative medicine options.

Patient-Centered Care

We pride ourselves on creating a supportive, compassionate environment where patients feel heard and respected. Our administrative team works diligently to coordinate care with primary physicians, surgeons, and other specialists to ensure a cohesive treatment approach. We accept most major insurance plans and work with patients to navigate coverage options for specialized procedures.

Visit Our Clinic

Located at 8005 Farnam Dr #204, Omaha, NE 68114, our modern facility offers convenient access for patients throughout the region. To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, call us at +1 402-316-2101 or visit our comprehensive website at https://integratedpainomaha.com/ where you can find detailed information about our treatments, physician credentials, and patient resources.

Our dedicated team of licensed professionals specializes in addressing chronic pain, sports injuries, and mobility issues through personalized treatment plans designed to improve quality of life without reliance on medication.

At Total Pain Solutions, we offer a holistic approach to pain relief that combines traditional and innovative therapies. column40:
Dr. Aguila is a man of his word and one of the smartest guys I know. He's a life long learner and blessed with a knowledge base  to help even the most difficult cases. If you are having back pain, neck pain or headaches Dr. Aguila is the Doctor to have on your side.|"Dr. Aguila is more than a surgeon, he's a life saver."
Review by Sonja Does

The Total Pain Solutions by Healing Hands of Nebraska Clinic is the best for diagnosis and surgical treatment of various neurological conditions. Dr. Aguila who specializes in comprehensive peripheral nerve, reconstructive and aesthetic surgery, completed a Bilateral Occipital Nerve Surgery for Occipital Neuralgia in April 2024. After 8 years of daily migraines and occipital neuralgia pain caused by a traumatic brain injury (TBI) and now a full month after the surgery I can already say that it has made a significant and positive change in my life.

Dr. Aguila and his staff are exceptional. Their knowledgeable and compassionate support starting from my first conversation with them and throughout the scheduling and administrative process was a pleasant experience. The reception and nurse staff whose focus on patient care from pre-operation all the way through to post-operation meetings went above and beyond my expectations as they were there to ensure my well being.
Thank you Dr. Aguila, your compassion, expertise and kindness have made a real difference in my recovery. Your humorous and honest approach made a difficult time in my life more bearable and hopeful.

I also want to express my heartfelt appreciation for the post-surgical care and support you have provided. I am happy to say that the surgery was successful, furthermore your commitment to my recovery is truly admirable. I highly recommend the services of Total Pain Solutions to anyone suffering with chronic pain of any kind.|For my first surgery I have to say that I had the best surgeon!  Dr. Aguila and his staff are phenomenal! I high recommend him for any neurological surgery!! The staff made sure I was as comfortable and well taken care of in addition to the office staff at the front desk, she is always a pleasure to see when you walk in. Healing Hands has been one of the best experiences that I've had by fare. You guys put the O in outstanding. Thank you so much!!!|I can't say enough good things about Dr. Aguila and his team. I don't wait longer than 5 minutes on average (which is rare for medical appointments) even when getting back or neck injections.  I love that they do these injections in house instead of sending you to a hospital or surgery center.  The cost is much less than you would pay most anywhere else.  When they began doing them in office (with same machines as used in hospitals) my amount went from $1582 per injection to around $300 and only had to pay my $25 copay the day of service whereas surgery centers i was paying half or all upfront the day of the procedure.   The nurses are so friendly and care about you personally, not just hurrying to get to the next patient.   I have waited 2 hours in the past at hospitals to get this injections done and wasted half a day from signing in to being released.  Today I was in and out in 41 minutes and part of that was an insurance issue not the office.  If you have went here in the past and didn't like the long waits and scheduling your procedures elsewhere I suggest you give them another chance as that has improved immensely!  I have been a patient for 10 plus years thus I have been there multiple times and you are treated as an individual.|I felt so welcomed, and well cared for. The ladies took such good care of me, and I never felt rushed. The office is clean, the Doctor was professional, thorough and kind. I have hope now, because they seemed to be interested in treating the cause of my pain instead of masking it with yet another pain medication. I would definitely recommend MY PAIN DOC PC to my friends and family.|Dr Wik is who turned my life around and given me the ability to move on and accomplish more things.  In the last 2 years my healthcare from him has been outstanding.  Dr. Wik will actually listen to you when you are in pain and not write you off as a drug seeker.  He will sit with you for an hour if that's what it takes to go through your symptoms.  He is the first doctor I've seen that doesn't give you 5 minutes then rushes out the door to the next patient.  Dr. Wik and his amazing wife Kathy (a nurse) are an outstanding team.  Working together they give their patients physical and emotional care with genuine empathy.  I'm truly blessed to have found them.|I have been going here for almost 2 years now. I absolutely love and appreciate all they have done for me. Finances have always been in issue when it comes to finding pain relief and getting a better quality of life. They will listen to you and help you come up with a solution that best fits your wants and needs. I would recommend them to anyone who is having chronic pain!|Dr Wik is amazing as are all the PAs I have seen. The front desk is a different story.  I don't understand why they have to be so rude and unwelcoming all the time. That really turns a person off.|The Spinal Steroid Injections are totally Pain Relieving!!  But when they wear off,......; Extreme Pain Returns!!!|Great doctor helping his patients become the best they can be|

column3:
CHI Health Clinic Pain Medicine (Lakeside) serves Omaha, Nebraska and surrounding communities with specialized pain management services. Located in the serene Lakeside area, our clinic combines advanced medical expertise with compassionate care to help patients find relief from chronic and acute pain conditions. Our team of board-certified pain specialists develops personalized treatment plans that address the unique needs of each patient, utilizing both interventional procedures and comprehensive pain management strategies to improve quality of life and restore function.

At CHI Health Clinic Pain Medicine (Lakeside), we offer a wide range of treatments for various pain conditions, including back and neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndrome. Our multidisciplinary approach incorporates the latest evidence-based techniques such as nerve blocks, epidural steroid injections, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation. We also emphasize non-invasive therapies and collaborate with physical therapists, psychologists, and other specialists to provide holistic care that addresses all aspects of pain management.

Patient-Centered Care

We understand that living with chronic pain affects every aspect of your life. Our compassionate team takes the time to listen to your concerns, thoroughly evaluate your condition, and develop treatment strategies that align with your goals and lifestyle. We emphasize patient education and active participation in the treatment process, empowering you to take control of your pain management journey.

Visit Our Lakeside Location

Our clinic is conveniently located at Medical Office Building One, 16909 Lakeside Hills Ct, Suite 215, Omaha, NE 68130. To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please call us at (402) 758-5742. You can also find detailed information about our providers and services on our website at CHI Health Clinic Pain Medicine. As part of the trusted CHI Health network, we are committed to delivering exceptional care that helps you return to a more active, comfortable life.
column11: CHI Health Clinic Pain Medicine (Lakeside) is dedicated to delivering high quality, compassionate care to Omaha and nearby communities. Visit us at 16909 Lakeside Hills Ct or call (402) 758-5742 for more information.
column20: Medical Office Building One, 16909 Lakeside Hills Ct Ste 215

column40:
I went for an appointment for my back. I was having bad pain for a while. Hard time bending, standing, walking ect...The Doctor I was scheduled to see pretty much questioned me on why my insurance didn't approve Mounjaro for me. I said I wasn't type 2 diabetic I am pre diabetic. He said I would benefit from Mounjaro that my weight would come off. He then proceeded to ask me if I am on a muscle relaxer I told him what I was on and how long I have been on it. Years so no it wasn't doing anything but neither did what he prescribed. But then he just told me I needed to you tube videos of carb constricting and fasting. And how he had lost 30 pounds since the beginning of the year blah blah blah. So my $50 copay and the $500 you billed my insurance went for you to talk to me about your weight loss, fat shame me and prescribe muscle relaxers that aren't working, and suggest myofascial trigger point injections in my back WITHOUT EVER touching my back .... Ummmm nooo. I have have degenerative discs, collapsing discs, bulging discs for 20 years.... It's not a stupid knot in the muscle....|I've suffered greatly because of a pain doctor here. I've been labeled because of his care management, yet the pain doctor refused to defend his own prescriptions he wrote me for years, so that got me jailed shortly after I left his practice. I still suffer discrimination from CHI thanks to that pain doctor.
Recently with my pregnancy.
Sadly it was very stressful uneducated fearful pregnancy. Hippa rules ignored, I was lied to and treated terrible ! I have tried filling gievences but resulting to a sudden emergency csection !?!
I was alone, scared, treated rudely, no time to call family nor anyone! I was sent there to get a shot but my Lincoln doctor had other plans since I had planned on giving birth in Omaha.!  I'm still trying to figure it all out !?! how completely dirty CHI really is and was to me and my baby. There are absolutely no excuses.|The doctor is only pops in sees how things are going with prescriptions and he needs to retire|I'm a little irritated with the services today, my usual Dr can find my Nexplanon and I went to a different dr same place and they couldn't find if|Receptionist is very rude!!! I felt unwelcome to say the least|It's a great place||

column3:
Momenta Pain Care in Omaha, Nebraska offers comprehensive pain management solutions under the expert guidance of Dr. Peter Piperis, MD. Our state-of-the-art facility provides personalized treatment plans designed to address chronic pain conditions through innovative and evidence-based approaches. Serving the greater Omaha metropolitan area, we combine advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to help patients regain control of their lives and reduce dependency on pain medications.

At Momenta Pain Care, we specialize in treating various chronic pain conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndrome. Dr. Piperis utilizes a multidisciplinary approach that may include interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy recommendations, and lifestyle modifications tailored to each patient's unique needs.

Our Approach to Patient Care

We believe in treating the whole person, not just the symptoms. Our team takes the time to understand your pain history, perform thorough evaluations, and develop customized treatment strategies that address both the physical and emotional aspects of chronic pain. This comprehensive approach helps maximize treatment effectiveness while minimizing side effects.

Facility and Technology

Our modern facility at 1805 N 145th St in Omaha is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technologies that allow us to provide precise interventions for pain relief. The comfortable environment is designed to put patients at ease during their visits, reflecting our commitment to creating a positive healing experience.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with Dr. Peter Piperis, please call us at +1 402-991-6559 or visit our website at https://momentapaincare.com/ for more information about our services. Our friendly staff is ready to assist you with appointment scheduling, insurance questions, and any other inquiries you may have about pain management options.
column38: J Willett|April Wagner|Allison Bailey|Garrett Kracht|Dina Sakkas-Mulkey|Linda Morgan|LaRue Miller|Larry Barnard
column40:
I've been seeing Dr Piperis and his staff for a couple years. He picked up my medical care right where we left off in another state. Doesn't over rx meds, which I love. Doesn't over do steroids, which can cause all sorts of damage and issues if used too much. He knows what he is doing and does it with care. Only issue I've ever had with them was billing issues, my insurance pays for everything and none out of my pocket but still get bills sometimes. But, they are always corrected in a quick and fashionable manner. I trust (and it is rare for me to trust drs) and highly recommend Momenta, Dr Piperis, and his staff.|I seen Dr. Piperis nurse practitioner Kristina McCutchen who I loved. How ever the billing dept. and front desk employees are not professional at all. The billing dept. doesn't know how to correctly send claims to insurance and then bills the patient. Front desk staff needs to learn HIPPA. I hear about other patients every time I went in that office.|I would NOT recommend this doctor or his office! Both the doctor and his staff accused my husband of being a drug seeker in late 2014. This was our first and only office visit after my husband was hurt at work. His office staff were talking about my husband at the front desk. They didn't say names so they were being HIPPA compliant but we could hear them talking about his case and in not so many words said he was there just to get meds. Mind you my husbands work accident was 2 weeks prior and he hadn't seen his PCP in over a year for anything other than regular check ups. NO WHERE in the provided records to them did it state he had been on pain meds for a X amount of time. Even when we were in the exam room with the doctor he gave off the vibe he didn't want to see us and did mention at one point we were just there to get drugs. We obviously sought care elsewhere.|Best pain doctor in town! Him and his staff care about your well being. Very intelligent  and the only doctor I'll trust to put a needle in my back.
Can't go wrong with this guy his bedside manner and treatment skills are definitely worth five stars.|Hands down the kindest and most thorough Doctor. Dr. Piperis diagnoses,  comes up with a plan, then treats! His bed side manner is top notch! He cares about his patient and it shows!|Was told that he would not see my daughter due to not having enough info on her medical conditions even though she was referred by her pcm doctor last month. You'd think they would be wanting to request records from her last pain doctor considering we recently moved from another state.|Dr. Piperis was very caring and really wanted to offer me some help with my pain, however that was not the case.  He did have the forsite to send me to another MD who I believe may be onthe right path to my issues. Thank you so much for your expertise and your knowledge to get me where I need to be and most of all for caring!|I suffered from lower back pain for many years. The pain at times was intense. Dr. Piperis diagnosed my condition and prescribed a course of action that alleviated my pain. This doctor and staff were  thorough and professional. Consider an appointment before you make a decision regarding your pain.
